At Prynt, we love instant photography. But with the thousands of photos stored on our phones, there’s never been an easy way to print those photos, so they become lost in our camera roll or social feeds and rarely looked at again. So we‘re here to bring those memories back to our lives, in a physical way. It is our mission to make memories tangible again for a new era of moment-makers.

That's why we created Prynt Pocket, the first-ever device to transform your smartphone into an instant camera.
column2:
>

 

Interested to get the Prynt Pocket for your iPhone? Click here.

column1: Our community of users inspire us with their creativity everyday! We’ve seen so many cool DIYs from party favors and wall decorations to scrapbooks and gift tags with hidden messages - Prynt Pocket is truly the fuel to our users creative fire. But there’s more, Prynt photos are perfect for family gatherings, birthday parties, and any other occasion you wish to snap. Here are some of our favorite Prynt moments from users.
How to re-order Zink Sticker Paper: Each Prynt Pocket will come with 1 pack of 10-sheets of paper. You can order more papers easily through the Prynt app, downloadable for free on Google Play.

You will have the choice between Packs of 20, 40, 60-Sheets of paper or you can subscribe to our Unlimited Paper Plan and print all the photos you want with no fear of missing out - because we’ll send you more papers as soon as you need it!

We were blown away by the initial response from users following the release of our first product, Prynt Case! We compiled feedback from thousands of enthusiastic backers and retail buyers to develop a list of product requests including features to add, remove, or enhance for future versions. We started from scratch and began working on our second product, Prynt Pocket, that would bring an even better instant camera experience to our users.

Team Prynt is a small team of 20 located in downtown San Francisco. Each of us from different backgrounds, we hold a shared purpose to empower the creativity in everyone. We’re excited to bring the Prynt Pocket for Android to our community.
In 2014, we successfully completed our first Kickstarter campaign earning $1.5M to launch Prynt Case for iOs and Android in the U.S., France, and United Kingdom.

Since then, we worked alongside our community to iterate and develop our second version product, Prynt Pocket for iOs, which launched May 2017. The goal was to make a device to give users the smallest instant camera experience on the market. We created Prynt Pocket for iPhone (available here), now we want to make it happen for Android users.

We want everyone to enjoy Prynt Pocket for Android! International shipping is available for backers all over the world. We've done our best to select the lowest shipping rates possible. Additional duties/taxes may apply depending on your destination country.

*Note, if your country of destination is outside the United States or the European Union, we do not cover customs and taxes which may apply in your country. We would recommend checking with your customs office to estimate these charges. If you have any questions, please feel free to reach out to our Support Team at support@prynt.co
Prynt Pocket is compatible with centered USB-C Android devices.
Want to check if your phone is compatible? Please click here.

What is the Get Home Smart Card?
The Get Home Smart Card is a Taxi Gift Card that provides a Taxi Ride for your loved ones.

The concept of the Get Home Smart Card was created as my son, Bryce, was turning 21. I was concerned about his safety and that he would not make the Smart choice of taking a Taxi home from a night out.  I wondered why there wasn't a Gift Card I could give him - that he could ONLY use for a Taxi ride. This is how the idea of the Get Home Smart Card originated.
As the idea grew, we realized there are many layers to this Taxi Card.

*  Teens started becoming a huge aspect to the Get Home Smart Card.  We realized that Teens feel they have no option but to get in a car with a friend even if they feel uncomfortable.  I did a survey at the local high school and over 89% of teens said they would NOT call their parents to pick them up if they were in an ""Uncomfortable Situation"".  This is scary! I am a single Mom of 3 kids and my older 2 kids (ages 24 and 22) told me they would have never called me!  Even though I told them they could!
*  College Kid's are a large part of our model, so they can travel safe around their campus.

*  Adults, we need to change our thought process and use Taxi's if we are going out and have any cocktails.  There are many campaigns that tell us to not drive drunk, but we are never told to take a Taxi, we need to change our own mindset.

*  Seniors will also benefit from the Get Home Smart Card, giving them a little freedom if they no longer drive and take the pressure off their children who may not be able to bring them to a doctor appointment.

The Get Home Smart Card is Patent Pending since September 2008 and Trademark.  We will have a rewards program to encourage continued use and we will connect to the nearest Taxi Member through the callers phone.  All transactions will be done through the smart phone with the Taxi Companies through our APP.

The ONLY thing that has held us back in launching is funding.  With this economy, it is very hard to get funding.  We have been creative trying to recieve funding by entering contests - we are a 2 time finalist in the Pepsi Refresh Grant Project.  We have been featured on ABC 7 Chicago Inventors Segment with Janet Davies and have been written up in all the Chicagoloand Newspapers.

One of our biggest allies is the Illinois Liquor Department Education Manager and we are waiting to find out if the Illinois Department of Transportation Division of Traffic Safety is going to give a a grant, we find out in August!

What we need the money for is the programing of the APP and the front and back end of the website.  I have been in contact with APP developers and we know exactly how it needs to be programmed and work for our business model.  All the other aspects are already done, our website, our name, our eye catching Logo.
Get Home Smart Card Impact on the Community

We will have a strong impact on the community through education against drunk driving.  In High Schools and Colleges we want to educate Teens to know they can ""Speak Up"" if they are Uncomfortable in someones car and the person is driving erratic.  This is our ""Bee Smart"" Campaign.  We will get the community involved in helping us get the word out.
We have always referred to ourselves as a Safety Minded Company and have always approached this as a Safety Campaign.
Give the Gift of a Ride and Arrive Alive!
Share us if your believe in what we are trying to accomplish.  We are passionate about our idea and truly feel we can impact lives with a safe ride.

Follow your phone into a new audio adventure: Hackney Hear uses your mobile to play interviews, features, poetry, music and new writing depending on your location.

Your movements will trigger audio clips as you walk, creating your own soundscape. A whopping 400 stories will be tagged over one of London's coolest areas swathing the Olympic borough in glorious sound wherever you go through a new smartphone GPS app.

Why us? Well, we're the team behind the award-winning Hackney Podcast - a sort of London version of Radiolab - and this is a kind of interactive radio programme, where famous and ordinary residents share their stories as music scores your journey, with the Olympic stadium on the skyline.
We'll be preserving conversations with musicians, writers, engineers, mothers, truants, hairdressers... anyone with an interesting story to tell.

Hackney Hear will be available from Jan 2012 - just as London gears up for the Olympics. There'll be an extra 500,000 vistors to the area over the summer and we aim to be THE voice of Hackney to the outside world.
No matter where you stand in the borough, there will be a glorious noise of music, stories, poetry and archive from our rich past - all channeled direct to your ears.

It doesn't take much to make a difference: every donation will add another voice to the mix. The more stories we have, the better the experience for listeners. Making 400 mini-documentaries is no small feat!

Even a tiny donation can provide travel expenses to a volunteer - and they might come back with an interview that makes grown men weep/laugh/gape. THAT's the kind of reaction we're after. And you can make it happen.
Why is this funding page in $$$ and not £££?

Well, this being an American site we've adopted their currency for this fundraising scheme and we think the project should appeal globally - you might well be over for a vacation and lured over to London's trendy East End for the day... maybe or visiting for the Olympics, or you might just want to support a really innovative project.
And the dollars shouldn't matter - IndieGoGo/PayPal will convert the currency for you. So if you were to donate $10, that would take about £7 out of your account.
Over the next few months we'll be requesting help on elements from voicework to poetry - so add yourself to our mailing list and we'll keep you in the loop: head to hackneyhear.com for details.
If you're a business or individual that would like to get involved in a more substantial way (cheques are always welcome!) then contact francesca@hackneyhear.com

Why does this soccer ball have soft fins?

Kixsports is about to introduce a new version of its KixFriction ball.  This coming version is hand sewn, comes in bright neon colors and has rounded soft rubber fins.  We came to this invention by observing the disadvantages of off pitch play with a normal soccer ball. When soccer is played in the street or a gym the ball action is not like that on a soccer pitch. The ball is fast and rolls on forever. The energy normally absorbed by grass remains in the ball. When playing in a confined space, players have to pull their punches or the ball flies off too far too fast. Futsol balls and other balls available to reduce these effects sacrifice the weight and feel of a normal soccer ball.

So we set out to make a ball that is the world standard official size and weight, and reacts absolutely normally to body contact. However our ball behaves differently when flying or rolling. We invented a ball that feels indistinguishable from a normal ball when kicked or headed. The fins on our ball are so soft that you cannot feel them in play.
The result is a soccer ball that reacts to you just like any other normal soccer ball but rolls as if rolling on grass and flies through the air only about half as far.
You can see a review of our presentation of the features and benefits of this ball at the Stanford University GSB Cool Products Expo at

The Kixsports team has been developing innovative sports gear since 2009. Our first product, the KixKube won a training product of the year award for 2010 at the NSCAA convention. This five sided goal is the first to make one-v-one soccer possible anywhere.
The Kixsports team includes NCAA coaches, product designers, world class marketers and inovation specialists.

To get the sort of quality performance we wanted we determined that the ball material must also be of high quality. After experimenting with both machine sewn and hand sewn balls we decided that hand sewn balls provide the best and longest lasting performance. So our ball is a high quality hand sewn ball with highly durable soft rubber fins

column7: >* 32 Hand sewn panels made with 2 layers of poly cotton &amp
column8:
2 layers of poly viscous.with santoprene fins
• High air retention butyl bladder.
• Highly abrasion resistant printing.
• Superior durable double stitching with excellent shape retention.
• Playable under all weather conditions

column1: So this is the other soccer ball that every soccer player needs. It makes hard court play more fun and it better prepares you for grass pitch play. Indoors or in limited spaces this ball allows full power kicking. To see more KixFriction videos on YouTube search for KixFriction

column7: >

column1: We are now ready to ramp up production of our new ball. All our testing is complete and our first shipment has sold out quickly . Our preliminary sales show that players and coaches like this ball for its action in the street, indoors, and in limited practice spaces.

We now need to fund enough inventory to prime the pump. So please help us by pledging to buy one of our balls. It will be the best soccer ball you ever buy. Its a great birthday or Christmas present for any soccer player. And please tell your friends.

Our Idea

I am a computer engineering and information sciences graduate. Also did my MBA. 

I have developed this product to stop my wife giving me headache every time we left for vacation or some small trip outside our house. Always the same questions, ""Did we turn off the kettle?"", ""Oh my gosh! I forgot the toaster on!""

We are living in the Internet age, everything is connected, we can know what is happening at the other side of the world in real time, and also we can affect it with our contributions.

Why can't we know what is happening inside our house? And why can't we control some small electrical devices (any device) with the help of new technologies?

This is how the initial spark of inspiration struck me. With the help of my Electronics knowledge and teaming up with some Electronics Engineer friends of mine I was able to develop a simple power extension plug, which has built in WIFI, and connects to internet and notifies the current position of the plug, also with the command from the web it turns off. What I did was I have connected all equipment which can cause danger to this power extension so when I am outside I login to web service and check the power status of the plug, and remotely I can turn off the electricity.

What We Need &
column2:
What You Get

I have the working prototype but it needs to be rearranged and fit into a proper good looking box. It will require some PCB designing which I can utilize my electrical engineer connections. Also for the software part of the product which will support smart devices (Iphone, Android and Blackberry 10 OS) I will need a proper server with good stable internet connection. When I get all these I will get an agreement with some producer to produce this product in Bulk and I am planning to sell it through online advertisement and through Facebook and Youtube ads.

I have two different types of perks, for each 100 USD I will send a t-shirt which will have a power plug on the back and in the front it will write Turn Me On With Your Phone.

Since I am more interested in the implementation of this idea I offer partnership to first 50, 1000 USD contributor. 

Each contributor will have their name in our project web site forever.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't do monetary support to the idea you still can contribute:

column1: • You can get the word out and make some noise about my campaign.
• Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that’s all there is to it.

NOTE : Campaign is over and we are working now on fine tuning the parts and assembling them to prepare the kits and deliver them in time.
Thank you so much to all supporters and perkers!
If you feel you're too late and would like to get a Smartrap anyway, we setup a webshop ( two languages there ) : imprime3d.fr  or Smartfriendz.com
Delivery will be february. Not so much waiting as the campaign was not over our expectations, so we're ready to produce smoothly.
We will update here with new photos and videos as we advance.

We are...

... a small designers and builders team from France .Our background is in graphics design and mobile apps development  ( w6developpement.com) and before 3d animation development ( cantoche.com) but  for years , we have been building and using 3d printers , mostly open source , self made machines.


Our vision...

... is to develop professional quality open source hardware. We want to play a role in changing the world by helping people to produce locally in a fair business model.
Our first project, the Smartrap , will be the basis of all the forthcoming projects and will be used to fabricate their parts.


The Smartrap... 

The smartrap is in constant evolution, keeping up with the latest developments in 3d printing. It is constantly improving itself. And the best thing is that you can print your own upgrade or duplicate it , triplicate...

No more waiting for upgrades from ""the company"" that  built your machine, or worse, buying a new printer every few months because the ""product"" you bought has become obsolete ! Which will happen, because 3D printing is moving fast.

What makes the Smartrap a living machine?: 

  • You wont hesitate to upgrade your smartrap as it evolves because you know it takes only one hour to disassemble and rebuild! Assembly is mostly made by snapping or fitting pieces together.

The smartrap prints its own upgrades. The updates, upgrades and replication of the Smartrap is made by your own smartrap at home, without the need for special machinery, like a laser cutting machine !
It is 100%  active open source : It means that all files and documentation  are accessible to the general public.
column2: >You can find all the information you need on
column4: >. It is already a great success ( in the most popular items ) .

column1:
The open source licence is GPL: Freely available for anyone to copy . Anyone can build Smartrap machines and make a business from it anywhere in the world.




Features:

Global

column2: >Estimated build time : less than one hour!
>NO laser cut or steel frame parts.

column1:
This campaign

was started with the intention to distribute a first batch of the model and improve it to a professional standard,
column2:
>with all the documentation and support. 

If it’s a success, everyone wins :

column1: • Us:  as we will know how many printers to build, we will be able to better meet your demands!!! The funds we get from the campaign let us continue to improve this machine.

• You : you will have a great 3d printer like never before. You will enjoy, as we already do, the benefits of a living machine, without paying for every upgrade and without the need to buy a new machine every year.

• Everyone : as the Smartrap is open source (GPL)  the model will be largely improved and all makers will have a new easy option to make a 3d printer. We hope , if everything works out fine, it will start small businesses around the world, spreading the Smartrap in every village , for family and friends. Especially in places where it's hard to find specialised tools .

What to expect 


                 

Note: At the time of delivery, the model will certainly have improved from what you can actually see. 

We are proposing different perks with the following content :

column6:
>The future

If this campaign succeeds , we will first spend all our energy in preparing, assembling and delivering the Smartraps... on time !  

On the other side, we choose to have a flexible campaign and we will of course prepare and distribute any perk ordered. The project will absolutely not be abandoned if the goal is not reached. We are learning a lot with this adventure and it is in all case a wonderful experience.

Following that, we will work on upgrades and options that you can print and install yourself, for free ! That's the real goal of our design. We are thinking about 2 printing heads, chocolate and pastry printing... well, everything for fun home use.


Thank you

Serge, funder of smartfriendz.com


Please support us by sharing! Indiegogo provided some easy sharing buttons (placed under the intro video), please use them... not wisely but a lot

This campaign was started with the intention to distribute a first batch of the model and improve it to a professional standard, with all the documentation and support. If it’s a success, everyone wins :

Everyone : as the Smartrap is open source (GPL)  the model will be largely improved and all makers will have a new easy option to make a 3d printer. We hope , if everything works out fine, it will start small businesses around the world, spreading the Smartrap in every village , for family and friends.   What is Notty?
column4:
>Notty is the first FULLY FUNCTIONAL wearable device of its kind!

 Notty is a useful and stylish accessory which will help you keep in touch with your phone activity. You can see when you receive a call, text message or e-mail.
 It’s helpful in improving your time management, as you’ll never miss an important moment and you’ll receive all your notifications on time without pulling your phone out of your pocket or purse!

  How Notty Works?

 Notty uses Bluetooth low energy protocol (BLE) to connect to your phone and instantly starts receiving notifications.
 It comes equipped with a vibration motor and a series of LEDs which help you to distinguish between your notification types. For example, you can use a red light for calls and messaging, a green light for e-mails and a yellow light for games and calendar. The vibration and light interval can be set up using the control app on your phone.
 Battery life is one of the most important aspects of a wearable device. Notty’s algorithm allows you to use it for as long as 14 days before recharging. It uses one of the smallest size rechargeable lithium-ion battery on the market.
 Notty’s improved communication range allows you to stay connected with your phone for up to 50m without any delay or interruption. It uses a set of custom aluminum antennas specialy designed for long range.
 One of the most important aspects of Notty is its build quality. It is light weight and durable due to very strong polymer plastics, able to resist the hardest shocks and waterproof for up to 100m.
 Notty comes with it’s own app witch will help you set up your notification styles and custom functions for your ring. You can also update your ring with the newest firmware update once it is available via this app.


 How is Notty Useful?

column1:
Know when you receive a phone call or anny other notification in moments without visual access to your phone, or when it's in silent mode. You will be able to concentrate at your job tasks, enjoy your meetings with friends, exercise or walk your dog without concerning that you’ll ever miss a notification.
 It works with your favorite app or game too so you’ll never miss an update on Facebook or Tweeter as Notty will let you know all the new stuff!
 Notty is waterproof and very resistant, so you can wear it when swimming or practicing your favorite sports!
 You can enjoy a night at a club with your friends and listen to your favorite music, and no matter how loud it gets, you can still know if someone is trying to reach you.
 Use it as your personal alarm in the morning, without worrying that you will disturb your loved ones.
 Even if you forget your phone in another room, and you cannot hear it ringing, Notty will alarm you immediately.

My first design uses a 3D printed model, just for functionality. I am planning on using specially crafted molds to bring you the best look and feel possible.
 Notty is not only useful, but also a discreet yet noticeable accessory. It will be a perfect match for your outfit!
 Several colors will soon be available wich which will suit both men and women, on any occasion.
 If you have a design that you think we could implement with Notty, you can send it and we will select the most popular one for our next concept.
Help Notty and Preorder

The first model took 6 months to design and 2 months of prototyping and testing. Right now, I have functional design that I can demonstrate its features to everybody. For the next step, I need your help to bring a fully functional product to the market. Your funding will go into:
 further research.
 smaller board.
 better battery.
 new design.
 boxing and shipping.
 new features implementation.
 You can support Notty by contributing to my Indigogo campaign and preorder one of the models promoted there.
 Notty will come in different sizes and colors, so before ordering be sure to specify the size and color of your ring.
Notty Real Live Tests

I have decided to share with everybody the current progress of Notty project. I will be posting constant updates in design and functionality with the intention of making this an interactive development process, where I can add/remove improve features based on your opinion.
 Here is some of the work so far:

column6: schema=youtube"" width=""580""> outdoor test
schema=youtube"" width=""580""> vibration motor test
schema=youtube"" width=""580""> underwater test

column1:
In the next version I plan on adding :
 an accelerometer for gesture recognition. You could write messages and phone numbers, or activate your favorite apps directly with your finger.
 a series of hardware buttons for controlling your favorite apps. This will also include a special feature called “panic button” witch can help you reach someone in a case of an emergency without accessing your phone.
 a curved led screen witch will scroll the contents of your notification and display the current time, temperature and gps information.
 a buzzer, just in case you can’t find your ring around the house.
 find my phone feature, based on a hardware button or a customized gesture.
 other features based on your input.

I am Tony Powers, Constitutional Conservative Talk Radio host of
“Powers to the People” 3-6PM ET weekdays on TalkRadio1230 WEZO-AM in Augusta,
Georgia and the iTalkUS On-air, Online and Wireless Radio network at http://www.iTalkUS.com
TalkRadio1230 WEZO-AM in Augusta into a Conservative beacon of hope that
will be the ""anchor,"" using our studios and facilities, to
power the iTalkUS Network on stations across the country. We’re reaching out to Constitutional
Conservatives, like you, who believe in “limited government” answerable to “We
the People” to help make this important work possible.
With decades of successful radio experience, we have a unique
plan to build an On-Air (terrestrial radio), Online and Wireless (smart phones

and smart cars) National Constitutional Conservative Talk Radio Network.

We have developed the
technology to do that without the high cost of satellite delivery to other
broadcast stations. We have also put together a strong week-day line-up of
seasoned Constitutional Conservative Talk Show Host (Chris Salcedo, Erik Rush, Edward Woodson, Joe Messina, Captain Matt Bruce, Kevin Jackson) who will be competitive
with anyone on the major networks. We’re also looking for additional weekend
programming so if you are a Constitutional Conservative Talker who’s ready to
make the next step to national syndication, contact us with a link to your work
and share this appeal with your network of friends. (For syndication info
There are literally thousands of AM radio stations
across America that are currently losing money because they lack, and can't
get, quality programming. They are in major markets and small towns that are
under the umbrella"" of other AM and FM stations that made the move
to Talk Radio early on. They are now unable to get ""competitive""
programming because only one station in a market can carry Rush, Beck, Levin or
profitable format on AM radio this leaves these stations at a tremendous disadvantage.
We can now deliver informative, entertaining and commercially
profitable Conservative Talk Radio Content to AM and FM stations
across the country that are ""desperate"" for alternative programming
at NO COST to them. What we need is the start up funds to make it happen now
a HUGE impact on the 2014 and 2016 elections.
Once we have funding for the equipment, computers, servers,
soft-ware and personnel we need to launch iTalkUS, we should be able to sign on
100 - 150+ stations to take all or part of our programming in short
order. With that kind of local ""on-air"" presence across the country
and with the right promotion we could reach millions of people listening for
Conservative Talk on AM radio. Of course most stations now have their own
online"" streaming as well, which could multiply our
reach"" by millions listening on computers, cell phones and through
blue-tooth"" in their cars (all new cars have USB ports or
The ultimate goal is to make iTalkUS.com the Conservative
News-Talk Radio ""Network of Choice"" to listeners across the country.
Unlike satellite delivered networks, we won't just be
offering programs, we want to brand and offer the entire network and bring to
radio what Fox News has brought to Cable TV but with a clear
Constitutional Conservative message. It is not our intent to be ""fair and
balanced"" but to educate the grass-roots across the Country on the Constitutional
Conservative ""limited government"" principles and moral ideals
Of course we also know that economic decay is a direct result of
the ""moral decay"" of our society and our message is one of rebuilding
the nuclear family in America which is the bedrock of the kind of moral society
that the Founders understood would be essential for keeping our Republic strong
Are you a Conservative that wants to make a real difference but
are tired of seeing your “campaign contributions” wasted on politicians that
say one thing to get elected and once in office never deliver on their
promises? Stop funding politicians and progressives in both political parties
that only care about growing government to empower themselves while enslaving
us and our children!  Start educating and empowering “We the People” with
the Constitutional Conservative truth that smaller “limited government,”
individual economic freedom, personal responsibility and morality are the
principles on which we can rebuild the greatest nation in the history of the
world. Please, invest in iTalkUS and help us create a true “Radio Free
America!” Our future, our children’s future and the freedom of generations to
come depends on what we do today. Will we meet the challenge and insure a
future of freedom and opportunity? Don’t let history record us as the
generation that lost the American Dream. Give what you can and even if you
can’t give, please share this message with others who can.
Socialism is on the march and the forces of evil would have

The simple solution to safe charging of LIPO batteries

If
you’re into drones, FPV or RC, then you have lithium batteries. In the

past several years they have become an integral part of our hobby.

It
may be rare, but they do catch on fire. That is why all manufactures
caution to charge only while attended.
As I got use to charging lithium batteries, I became more and more
careless. I like to go to the field with batteries charged, so started
charging the night before. Thankfully I was in my shop when I had my
first charging fire or my entire house would have burnt down. Others
were less lucky, like this New Zealand Homeowner:
getting the fire out and the smoldering battery out of the house, I had
an intense cleanup effort, the battery produced a very heavy black soot

that was throughout my entire house, it settled on everything.


I knew I would never charge inside again, unless there was a safe
way to do it.  I knew charging bags don’t really work, so started
thinking about the problem, I felt as a successful aerospace design

engineer I could figure out a practical solution.

The Design (Patent Pending)
So after analyzing the problem I designed an insulated double wall steel
box that contains the fire and intense heat, the smoke and soot is
filtered through a steel and fiberglass flame arrestor which also
reduces the heat of the exhaust gases.  The clean and relative cool
smoke is vented out of the box to prevent the box from exploding. The
battery still produces a large quantity of smoke but it is clean and

free of soot and will clear out quickly.

So I build a prototype with the help of a trusted manufacturer I worked with for a few years, here's what it looked:
column6:
schema=youtube"" width=""580"">


After finalizing the design after successfully testing the prototype

column1:
with many batteries, I settled for the following dimensions:

The internal box is 9.5x6.5x4 inches. The  external dimensions are 12x9x7 inches.
The flame arrester is placed in the box lid by design, as the act of
opening and closing the box ensures a clear area around the exhaust
holes to further help prevent the chance of a house fire.

Prototype testing

With this box you can charge lithium
batteries at home unattended in complete safety. To prove my point I set
the BAT-SAFE in a cardboard box full of tissue paper to verify that
even in this extremely flammable environment the box would perform as
And it worked. In the testing process, I have deliberately
overcharged dozens of lipo batteries to the point of exploding. This
included batteries of all shapes and sizes, from small to very large. As
the design deprives the fire of oxygen, the temperatures inside the
BAT-SAFE are reduced further helping to prevent a home fire.

Video link to battery blowup inside the BAT-SAFE

Ammo cans

We have also tested an ammo can just to point out why a sealed metal box doesn't provide you with safety.

Final design

In addition to preventing fires I also knew the
box needed to be light weight, easy to use, and inexpensive. The box
will be made from super thin wall steel sheet, will have a magnetic
attached charger stand, and a handle for easy transportation.  We
designed a fire proof lid seal and wire ways allow access for charging

wires.

We have finished a pre production prototype according to our drawings already, which is however not fully functional yet.


It opens and closes with one hand and will be so convenient to use that it will never be neglected.
We have successfully produced a prototype from some existing box
tooling to test out and prove our system, but with your support we
will make custom tooling to produce the perfect charging safe box.  It
will be convenient to use for charging, storage and transporting of Lipo
cells in complete safety. And we all can have peace of mind.  Please
help me produce the BAT-SAFE, and put a stop to the dangers of Lipo
<figcaption>It mustn't be your home that's in danger</figcaption>

Tooling and Production

I developed and produce a VTOL UAV (Rotormast) with the help of Mike Binder from Roban Limited,
a manufacturer located in south China. I teamed up with them on this
project again and with their help we found a reliable manufacturer, who
is fully integrated into the development process of the final design and

stands by to prepare the tooling and go into production.

The
tooling of steel sheet molds, stamp and cutting tools in these sizes is
however not cheap, please help us turn this project into reality. Please
spread the word!
If you have any questions, please feel free to get in touch either
through Kickstarter or Facebook. You could also email us at
safe@bat-safe.com and we promise we will get back to you as soon as
Most of the risks and challenges are behind us. We have completed a
successful sample in 2015, and started designs of the final product with
the help of an ISO certified manufacturer overseas. We are experienced
in development and manufacturing of consumer products and our
manufacturer is an expert in tin box production.
We will re-test the production box with over a dozen battery fire
tests to prove it is effective and rate the box with a maximum battery
We will test out all of our production features to ensure they work
as intended. Only after all testing has been completed successfully will
And we will update you with the test results.
The concept and design is simple significantly reducing the risk of the product not preforming as advertised.
In order to bring the cost down to an affordable amount, we need to
order at least 1,000 boxes from the manufacturer. To get there, we are
counting on you. Pledge right now and we will put you on the list to be
one of the first to receive a BAT-SAFE.

A camera’s most essential accessory is its tripod. The design of a tripod has not changed since the early 1800’s when photography was first invented. If our primary cameras are slim enough to be discreetly carried with us every day, why should our tripods be any different.
column9: s=438096a5c2cc5a1beb9ce841552f6651"" src=""""/>
column10:
>In 2013, turned to crowdfunding to create the Pocket Tripod. A fully adjustable tripod for your iPhone that fits in a wallet. 

We set out to make the most practical iPhone accessory that's actually with you when you need it, instead of sitting at home collecting dust.
column15:
>Thanks to your support, we successfully achieved our goal. The Pocket Tripod was manufactured and shipped to all our 2,565 backers on time. Now it's being used by thousands of people worldwide as their primary iPhone tripod.

Professional photographers use it to create stunning images on the go. 

 

The Pocket Tripod is no longer a distant concept, but a field-tested and proven product that is used by thousands of people every day.

Pocket Tripod PRO

• Rubberized universal adapters

• Carbon fiber legs

• Resilient design
column18:
showinfo=0"">

Our backers have been essential in shaping the Pocket Tripod’s future. The one thing that was requested the most was to have the Pocket Tripod compatible with phones that are in a case because removing the case would take too much time and just isn't convenient.

So we decided to make the Pocket Tripod universal. Instead of having it made specific to any iPhone, we’ve changed its design to take any device that matches its opening size. 

Each Pocket Tripod size has a wider opening than the next by an increment of 0.5 mm.
column22:
s=ab48d50a90d6d5606120344248ba6668"" src=""""/>

Fine enough to coincide with the thickness of almost any device on the market and any case.

column1: Three sizes of the universal Pocket Tripods have already been produced and have been user-tested for more than a year. With your help, we plan to make them all.
With the new universal Pocket Tripod, we've set out to create one of the most practical smartphone tripods without compromising the safety of your device.
No matter where you are, capturing that perfect time-lapse with your iPhone or Android has never been easier.

We’ve spent the past few months working with some of the top case manufacturers to test the Pocket Tripod and make sure it's compatible with their most popular cases. We’ve also shipped these universal Pocket Tripods to the backers of our first Kickstarter campaign for further user testing and feedback. Thanks to this collaborative effort, we've been able to catalogue the compatibility of many of the most popular cases on the market.
Use our Device Guide to find the best size Pocket Tripod for your phone.
Find the best-fitting Pocket Tripod size for your phone
Or use the links below to jump directly to your device or case.
iPhone 7 | iPhone 7 Plus | iPhone 6S | iPhone 6S Plus | More
Samsung | GS7 | GS7 Edge | GS6 | Note 7/6 | Note 5 | Note 4 | More
HTC | 10 | One M9 | One M8 | One M7 | One A9 | Desire 626 | More
Sony | Xperia X | Xperia Z5 | Xperia Z3 | Xperia XA | More
LG | G5 | G4 | G3 | Nexus 5X | K10 | Nexus 5 | V10 | More
Huawei | Nexus 6P | P9 | More
OnePlus | 3 | 2 | One | More
Motorola | Moto G3 | Moto Z | Moto X Play | Moto G4 | More
Nexus | Nexus 6P | Nexus 5X | Nexus 5 | More
iPhone Case | Android Case

Adopted | Apple | Case-Mate | Caseology | Casetifyb | Distil Union | Elago | Element | Incase | Incipio | jimmyCASE | Lifeproof | Lucidream eXo | Lunatik | Magpul | Moment | Olloclip | Otterbox | Pelican | popSLATE | Rhinoshield | Samsung | Speck | Spigen | Tech21 | UAG | ztylus | More
The Pocket Tripod’s unique patented design allows it to pack the functionality of a full-size photography tripod into the size of two credit cards.
Transforming it from a card to a phone tripod is as easy as a twist and flip.

The result is a robust tripod for your iPhone that’s perfect for long exposure and time-lapse photography. But also, a great stand for your iPhone on-the-go for watching movies without obstructing the screen, all while keeping your device safe from accidental spills.
The smooth adjustability of the Pocket Tripod makes it possible to use any flat surface to prop up your phone and still fit the frame.

Never again be left without a stable platform for your iPhone or Android, whether it’s to capture breathtaking time-lapse videos and light paintings, making video calls, or just to watch movies on the go.
They say the best camera is the one that's with you. We believe the same is true when it comes to tripods.

The funds we need to raise in this campaign are to pay for the cost of production of our new Pocket Tripod sizes. The cost of manufacturing the tooling has already been paid for thanks to our backers who helped us reach our goal in 2013. Since then we have gained lots of experience in producing Pocket Tripods. Having shipped Pocket Tripods to thousands of customers worldwide, we've also created an efficient delivery process.

The only factor that can create a challenge is having a large surge of demand. Having too many pre-orders - in excess of 1000 Pocket Tripods - can cause delays. This is because the production process is very labour intensive, and increasing the quantity we need may cause our manufacturer to demand more time and delay production and delivery. Each unit is individually tested after assembly, and carefully packaged. There are many sub-components that go into making a complete Pocket Tripod. A surge in demand can create delays as one or more of our suppliers try to meet the increased demand.
However, we will be in constant communication with our suppliers as well as backers, and will do all that we can to ensure the rewards are delivered on time.

Sony | Xperia X | Xperia Z5 | Xperia Z3 | Xperia XA | More
LG | G5 | G4 | G3 | Nexus 5X | K10 | Nexus 5 | V10 | More
Motorola | Moto G3 | Moto Z | Moto X Play | Moto G4 | More

Adopted | Apple | Case-Mate | Caseology | Casetifyb | Distil Union | Elago | Element | Incase | Incipio | jimmyCASE | Lifeproof | Lucidream eXo | Lunatik | Magpul | Moment | Olloclip | Otterbox | Pelican | popSLATE | Rhinoshield | Samsung | Speck | Spigen | Tech21 | UAG | ztylus | More
The Pocket Tripod’s unique patented design allows it to pack the functionality of a full-size photography tripod into the size of two credit cards.
Transforming it from a card to a phone tripod is as easy as a twist and flip.

The result is a robust tripod for your iPhone that’s perfect for long exposure and time-lapse photography. But also, a great stand for your iPhone on-the-go for watching movies without obstructing the screen, all while keeping your device safe from accidental spills.
The smooth adjustability of the Pocket Tripod makes it possible to use any flat surface to prop up your phone and still fit the frame.

Never again be left without a stable platform for your iPhone or Android, whether it’s to capture breathtaking time-lapse videos and light paintings, making video calls, or just to watch movies on the go.
They say the best camera is the one that's with you. We believe the same is true when it comes to tripods.

The funds we need to raise in this campaign are to pay for the cost of production of our new Pocket Tripod sizes. The cost of manufacturing the tooling has already been paid for thanks to our backers who helped us reach our goal in 2013. Since then we have gained lots of experience in producing Pocket Tripods. Having shipped Pocket Tripods to thousands of customers worldwide, we've also created an efficient delivery process.

The only factor that can create a challenge is having a large surge of demand. Having too many pre-orders - in excess of 1000 Pocket Tripods - can cause delays. This is because the production process is very labour intensive, and increasing the quantity we need may cause our manufacturer to demand more time and delay production and delivery. Each unit is individually tested after assembly, and carefully packaged. There are many sub-components that go into making a complete Pocket Tripod. A surge in demand can create delays as one or more of our suppliers try to meet the increased demand.
However, we will be in constant communication with our suppliers as well as backers, and will do all that we can to ensure the rewards are delivered on time.
Get Cash Back on the Projects You Love!",26.0,5,"1 Campaign

Lensta Grip is all you need to become a professional phone photographer and take photos and videos on the go wherever you are, without having to carry your bulky DSLR camersa

Check out Lensta Grip's list of features below:

 

With Lensta Grip, you can now use a classic camera button to snap photos. Forget about the shaky and blurry photos that result from tapping your finger on your phone's screen to take a photo. Shoot like a pro and get the feeling of professional cameras back.
column3:
/>

 

 

Lensta Grip is designed with comfort in mind. The ergonomic grip designed is inspired by professional camera grips, and is made to help you avoid the awkward positions you have to extend your had in to take a nice selfie or photo. This design is made to also help prevent smartphone related health conditions like selfie-wrist and selfie-elbow, which are recently rising conditions which affect the bones and nerves in the arm in elbow due to the unergonomic phone grip which is used when taking photos.
column4:
/>

 

 

 

In addition to the ergonomic and comfortable grip, Lensta Grip's design offers additional weight which is needed to stabilize your phone to prevent shaky and blurry photos.
column5:
/>

 

 

 

With Lensta Grip's comfortable and ergonomic design, you can safely take photos and videos with one hand without worrying about the phone falling off, or the need to use both your hands to make your phone stable.
column6:
/>

 

 

 

Lensta Grip is designed with extra outlets for both tripods, and hand or neck straps, so you can upgrade your photo taking experience any time.
column8:
/>

 

Remote Shutter Button Feature
column9:
/>

 

 

Choose a perk on the campaign's right side and order Lensta Grip now with the edition you want: a classic vegan leather edition with a vintage camera button, or a playful cumin colored corduroy version topped with a patent-pending donut shaped button.

Along with that, make sure to choose your preference between a fixed Grip button, or a remote and fixed one. The remote &
column10:
fixed option allows you to remove the Grip button to snap photor remotely. It also allows you to change the bluetooth battery if you needed to. 

 

Lensta Grip is easy to use. All you need to do is turn your bluetooth on and connect it to that of the grip's in order to enable the bluetooth camera button, and you're set to go. Use the shutter button remotely, or attach Lensta Grip to your phone using the universal clip.

 

Behind the Scenes

For designing Lensta, we got the help of a professional product and industrial design studio to make sure the Grip design is as ergonomic and flawless as possible.

We started to iterate on the design after 3D printing several prototypes and testing them with people, until we reached to an ideal design which we believe most people will find ergonomic and smooth. 

And as this is not Lensta's first product or manufacturing journey, we already have our manufacturing partners lined up and ready, and we already have ready-to-ship units which we'll start sending as soon as the campaign ends. We expect the journey from campaign to delivery to be smooth and fast, and we are very excited about seeing Lensta Grip in your hands. 

Here is our PCB which makes the magic happen so that you can enjoy a camera-like bluetooth shutter

Short Summary

We all saw the news
column4: s_cid=featured-3"" rel=""noopener nofollow"">story. The iPhone was in his pocket when a suicide bomb went off
column5: >. He was hit by a lot of shrapnel.
column6:
>  The iPhone deflected some shrapnel that could have easily hit his femoral artery. Great story. Respect to this man along with all members of the armed forces. 

What We Need 

The soldier wants to keep his iPhone. Who wouldn't. Needless to say, he needs a new phone. Let's make this easy for him. 

The Impact

With a few handfuls of $5 and $20 donations, we will have this money in a hurry. Let this soldier feel the love from his community. We can't do enough for our military.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please spread the word. 

About

I was hoping that we could just get a paypal address for Sgt. Frank. Nobody seems to have his direct contact info. We reached out to his sister on FB. No reply yet. I am just as suspect of these web sites as the next person but I couldn't find anything negative about this one. They will take 4% in the end and they do say that it can take up to two weeks to get the money. If we make the $500, I will personally pay his sister and then wait the two weeks to get the money back. This will be so cool. 

We assume that the sister and/ or the family will reach out to us and let us know how to deliver the money. If anything gets weird with this fund raiser, I will return everyone's money. 

I am completely transparent, live in Draper, reach out to me with any concerns. 801 706 6076.

","Power Sound by Echo is the evolution of the portable sterio-sound speaker
With over 32 hours of music playback, from two high quality speakers, the Power Sound provides the best quality sound wherever you are.

The integrated 5200 mAh power bank battery means that it will also charge any of your electronic devices (iPhones, Androids, tablets, cameras, etc). With a 2.1amp USB output, the Power Sound will charge your phone up to twice as fast as a normal charger! (wall charge USB output is typically 1amp, and laptop USB output is 0.5amp)
With all this in mind, The Power Sound is the perfect accompaniment for your festival season. You can now charge and re-group at the camp site whilst listening to your favourite tunes.

What is the puc+? The puc+ is a wireless Bluetooth MIDI

column1: interface designed to work with your existing 5-pin or USB MIDI controllers to
connect to your iPhone, iPad, or Mac.
following iOS devices are compatible but must be updated to iOS 8.2+
Mini, iPad 3 or newer, iPad Air, iPad Air 2, iPhone 5 or newer. Compatible Macs
have to have OS X 10.10 Yosemite installed and support Bluetooth LE (4.0) connectivity. To check your Mac’s compatibility
follow the steps outlined in this video: https://youtu.be/wdNHmq-llNY.
How does the puc+ work? The puc+ sees MIDI activity on the 5-pin port or USB port
and converts it to Bluetooth MIDI. Your iOS 8.2+ enabled iPhone, iPad, or Mac
running Yosemite recognizes the puc+ as an available MIDI device for your apps
audio systems? Bluetooth audio is a different
specification than Bluetooth MIDI. Bluetooth MIDI passes no audio data, just
MIDI. Bluetooth audio requires higher data buffering (increased latency) than
most users would tolerate for musical performance applications. We suggest
users use cabled audio solutions when using the puc+.
USB controllers? Yes. The puc+ is equipped with
the traditional 5-pin MIDI port for your controllers that use it, AND a micro
USB port for connecting USB controllers. The puc+ comes equipped with
a Micro USB Host OTG Cable (it’s a fancy Y cable for USB connections) to
connect up your USB controller (and even a power source if you need it.)
What’s the range of the puc+? All wireless devices are subject to conditions, but
the puc+ has routinely been tested to work up to a range of 40 feet or better
Can I use a puc+ for each of the
MIDI controllers in my rig? Yes,
Apple’s Bluetooth MIDI connectivity can discover and connect to more than one
puc+. Each of your controllers can connect to a puc+ and be available to
How is the puc+ powered? The puc+ runs on two AA batteries and can easily
operate for 8-10 hours on a full charge. The micro USB port will also accept
most standard micro USB power supplies if you’d rather an AC power solution.
controllers? If your USB controller draws
less than 300mA via the USB cable, the puc+ can power your controller. If your
controller draws more than 300mA, the puc+’s included Micro USB Host OTG Cable
can accommodate the appropriate power supply for your controller and pass the necessary
Does the puc+ require an app for
connecting to iOS or OS X? No.
Because the puc+ uses Apple's Bluetooth MIDI connectivity in iOS 8.2+ and OS X
Yosemite all of the required discovery and connection is available in the
operating system. However, a puc+ app is in the works to help handle firmware
updates and toggling the 5-pin port between Input and Output modes.
What iOS apps are compatible with the puc+? Lots. More than we can
mention here in an FAQ. Good ones too. GarageBand, Animoog, BeatHawk, NAVE,
SampleTank, Korg's iApps, Magellan, and the list goes on and on. We'll be
publishing a list of our favorites very soon.
What DAW's are compatible with the puc+? If your DAW
operates on a Mac running Yosemite, you're already compatible. Logic Pro X,
Ableton Live, GarageBand, Reaper, ProTools, Reason, etc.
MIDI input? Yes, if your controller dishes
out multi-channel MIDI the puc+ will happily pass it along. If your app or DAW
is configured to recognize multi-channel input you should expect the same
results as using a MIDI cable.
MIDI transmission? At this time we don’t publish
the exact latency figures, but it’s fast - under 15 milliseconds and optimized
for whichever platform (iOS or OS X) it’s connected to.
hardware and operating systems only? Yes,
and here's why - currently Android and Windows systems and hardware don’t
support Bluetooth MIDI connections. If and when native support for Bluetooth
MIDI connectivity becomes available for Android or any other platform, the
compatibility of the puc+ to work on those platforms can be developed.
What is the warranty? We provide a 180 day limited warranty from the date of
purchase, or in the case of this campaign delivery to the recipient. If a
defect exists and is reported within the warranty period we’ll repair, replace,
Can I change or cancel my perk?Indiegogo policy dictates that campaign owners have no
ability to adjust perk selections. That means we cannot upgrade your perk, we
cannot change your perk and we cannot cancel your perk. Please note that
contributions made on indiegogo are also non-refundable.

We know the importance of giving back and supporting a good cause.
We have chosen to sponsor the Leukemia &
column2: Lymphoma Society (LLS) because of the great work they continue to do year after year and because of the natural fit with RunSomeone, our mobile app.

column1: 10% of the monies raised above our Indiegogo goal will be donated to LLS. With your help we will also be able to include features in RunSomeone that can be used by runners that raise money for LLS and other non-profit organizations.

RunSomeone is a mobile app for runners (and starting-out and want-to-be runners) that combines your social network with your running desire and regimen to form an environment of togetherness, challenge, and motivation.

It's not just about you and your smartphone. It's about you, other runners, and the motivational social environment that RunSomeone provides.

There are many apps out there that allow you to pair up with virtual simulations. But what if you could pair up with real people instead? RunSomeone allows you to do just that. Pair up to run with real people - Anyone, Anywhere, Anytime!

Whether you are running side-by-side or apart at different times of the day, RunSomeone keeps track of everyone's running stats, compares them, reports them, and even assigns winners if you're competing.

RunSomeone is built around real people coming together to motivate each other, compete with each other, and help each other stay the course.

We are looking to raise $25,000 to create the first version of the application. If, with your help, we can raise more than that, we will add extra cool features and donate 10% to LLS. The features that we add will depend on how much money we raise beyond the $25,000.
Here are a few extra features that we could potentially add with your help:
• Features for coaches (allow coaches to manage their teams)
• Features for walkers and run-walkers (for people that walk instead of run)
• Meet-to-run features (people meeting in a local place to run as a group)
• How is this app different than other apps for runners?
• What do you mean it's a virtual running application?
• How is it motivational?
• How is it social?
• How is it social beyond the people I know?
• Can I set goals?
• In competitive mode, what are some of the race types?
• What platforms will this application be available on?
• What kind of stats will be available for my runs?
• Will measurements be shown in metric or imperial units?
• Will the app be available in other non-English languages?

How is this app different than other apps for runners?
RunSomeone is our solution to several problems that other apps may not address. At its core it targets the number one reason why so many people find it difficult to stay on a running regimen – MOTIVATION! We know that having a running partner and/or other people cheering you on are two of the best motivators. But what if you run at 5 in the morning and there’s no one around to run with or cheer you on? What if your running partner lives in another town or state? What if they live next door but your schedules don’t coincide?

RunSomeone brings you the next best thing – a place where you can meet, run, compete, and motivate each other wherever you are and whenever you run.
Back to faqs

What do you mean it's a virtual running application?
How many of us have experienced this scenario? You and a couple of friends decide to start running and get in shape but your schedules don't allow you to run together. You all say you're going to do it on your own but seldom does everyone stay the course. Or you force some schedule changes and start a promising regiment only to find that the scheduling is more challenging than the run itself and you wind up running alone. And without the motivation of people cheering you on, the workouts quickly become a thing of the past. RunSomeone allows you to stay connected with your running partners even if they are not running by your side. Simply create or join a virtual running group (or team) and everyone can run on their own schedule. RunSomeone captures everyone's running activities and creates stats for all in the group to see. Real people become your running partners on the RunSomeone app. The app compares activities, reports status, and allows you to communicate with each other for that motivational support that most of us need.
Back to faqs

How is it motivational?
RunSomeone allows you to setup goals and milestones. It keeps track of all your running activity and statistics and is always comparing against your goals. At a glance, it will show you how you are doing and prompt you when you’re falling behind (and praises you when you’re ahead).

When you team up with running partners motivation is elevated because your running stats are shared with your partners. They can see what you’re doing (and not doing) and vice-versa. RunSomeone compares your stats with those of your partners' and lets you know how you’re doing. Through the app you can send each other encouraging messages or egg each other on.

When you use the app’s “Race” features, motivation is at its peak. RunSomeone allows you to setup “Races” for two or more people to join. In this environment you either compete with each other or compete against time. For some of us, nothing is more motivating than a good ol’ friendly competition.
Back to faqs

How is it social?
RunSomeone will have a built in messaging system that will allow runners to post comments and communicate before, during, and after their runs. This can be used to discuss training regimens, ask for running advise, or share motivational messages and techniques. Integration with popular social networks such as facebook, twitter, and dailymile will allow you to share your goals and achievements with friends and family so you can keep them abreast of your training activities and have them root for you and support your cause!
Back to faqs

How is it social beyond the people I know?
With RunSomeone you are not limited to running with people that you know. Its social component allows you to partner with people around the globe. You can partner with people that are at the same running level as you or at higher levels if you're looking for greater motivation or you can join public running groups. Either way, you communicate with each other, share tips, and most importantly motivate each other along the way.
Back to faqs

Can I set goals?
Setting goals is the foundation of achievement and is the foundation of RunSomeone. You can set up a running regimen with specific goals in mind and RunSomeone will track your progress - all along prompting you with status and alerts.
Back to faqs
In competitive mode, what are some of the race types?

• Goal Race: This race type allows you to set running goals and milestones to be achieved in a given time period. For example, a race can be created where participants must run 15 miles in 1 week's time. The app will alert you of your status-to-goal and motivate you along the way. All activity is shared with all the runners of that race so you can see if you’re falling behind compared to the others. Most times this is enough motivation to get you going. When it isn’t, your friends can use RunSomeone to send you private messages to do some of their own motivating.

• Challenge race: This race is designed for runners who want the continued challenge of doing better. Perhaps looking to improve their own personal record. The goal of this race format is to run farther or faster than the others in this race. This is a round robin environment where the race will continue for as long as each competitor surpasses the previous best mark, which of course, can be your own.

• Competitive race: This race caters to the runner that is motivated mostly by competition or to those looking to obtain some friendly bragging rights. A runner can invite a friend or two to a race that is similar to a 100 yard dash in track and field. You set up the race rules and RunSomeone will track each runner’s progress and pick the winner.
Back to faqs

What platforms will this application be available on?
Our goal is to develop RunSomeone for both Apple (iPhone) and Android smartphones.
Back to faqs

What kind of stats will be available for my runs?
RunSomeone records the distance, time, pace, calories and frequency of all your runs.
Back to faqs

Will measurements be shown in metric or imperial units?
Both
Back to faqs

Will the app be available in other non-English languages?
While measurements will be available in metric and imperial units, the first version of RunSomeone will be available in the English language only.
Back to faqs

Yes. We have a list of extra features that we want to add to the application. Your donation of $100 or more allows you to vote on the feature that you want most to be added. The more you donate the more chances to vote you get. For example, donating $1,000 gets you 10 chances to vote, and at $5,000 you get to pick your favorite feature.

Elias is our managing head and lead developer with over 25 years of experience in all areas of management, web technology and development. He brings his expertise in to manage the project, help to infuse creativity and ensure that we create an amazing application.

Matthew is our resident designer with a specialty in web design and advertising art. His training allows him to bring simple sketches during a brainstorm session into a fully immersive design. With his grasp on current design trends and his young and creative ability, he brings his talents to this project to help create an awesome looking final product.
Diana is the team's marketing and promotions director. With any great product, there comes a great marketing campaign. She brings her expertise to increase market outreach and visibility.
To see the work that we've done in the past you can visit our web site and look at our portfolio at http://www.nariel.com/portfolio.asp

We are so thankful for the opportunity to share this project with you guys. We hope that we've given you enough information to see our vision and support us by making whatever donation you can afford.
","We know the importance of giving back and supporting a good cause.
We have chosen to sponsor the Leukemia & Lymphoma Society (LLS) because of the great work they continue to do year after year and because of the natural fit with RunSomeone, our mobile app.

10% of the monies raised above our Indiegogo goal will be donated to LLS. With your help we will also be able to include features in RunSomeone that can be used by runners that raise money for LLS and other non-profit organizations.

RunSomeone is a mobile app for runners (and starting-out and want-to-be runners) that combines your social network with your running desire and regimen to form an environment of togetherness, challenge, and motivation.

It's not just about you and your smartphone. It's about you, other runners, and the motivational social environment that RunSomeone provides. There are many apps out there that allow you to pair up with virtual simulations. But what if you could pair up with real people instead? RunSomeone allows you to do just that. Pair up to run with real people - Anyone, Anywhere, Anytime! Whether you are running side-by-side or apart at different times of the day, RunSomeone keeps track of everyone's running stats, compares them, reports them, and even assigns winners if you're competing. RunSomeone is built around real people coming together to motivate each other, compete with each other, and help each other stay the course.

We are looking to raise $25,000 to create the first version of the application. If, with your help, we can raise more than that, we will add extra cool features and donate 10% to LLS. The features that we add will depend on how much money we raise beyond the $25,000.
Here are a few extra features that we could potentially add with your help:
Features for coaches (allow coaches to manage their teams)
Features for walkers and run-walkers (for people that walk instead of run)
Meet-to-run features (people meeting in a local place to run as a group)
How is this app different than other apps for runners?
What do you mean it's a virtual running application?
How is it social beyond the people I know?
In competitive mode, what are some of the race types?
What platforms will this application be available on?
What kind of stats will be available for my runs?
Will measurements be shown in metric or imperial units?
Will the app be available in other non-English languages?

How is this app different than other apps for runners? RunSomeone is our solution to several problems that other apps may not address. At its core it targets the number one reason why so many people find it difficult to stay on a running regimen – MOTIVATION! We know that having a running partner and/or other people cheering you on are two of the best motivators. But what if you run at 5 in the morning and there’s no one around to run with or cheer you on? What if your running partner lives in another town or state? What if they live next door but your schedules don’t coincide?
RunSomeone brings you the next best thing – a place where you can meet, run, compete, and motivate each other wherever you are and whenever you run.Back to faqs

What do you mean it's a virtual running application? How many of us have experienced this scenario? You and a couple of friends decide to start running and get in shape but your schedules don't allow you to run together. You all say you're going to do it on your own but seldom does everyone stay the course. Or you force some schedule changes and start a promising regiment only to find that the scheduling is more challenging than the run itself and you wind up running alone. And without the motivation of people cheering you on, the workouts quickly become a thing of the past. RunSomeone allows you to stay connected with your running partners even if they are not running by your side. Simply create or join a virtual running group (or team) and everyone can run on their own schedule. RunSomeone captures everyone's running activities and creates stats for all in the group to see. Real people become your running partners on the RunSomeone app. The app compares activities, reports status, and allows you to communicate with each other for that motivational support that most of us need.Back to faqs

How is it motivational? RunSomeone allows you to setup goals and milestones. It keeps track of all your running activity and statistics and is always comparing against your goals. At a glance, it will show you how you are doing and prompt you when you’re falling behind (and praises you when you’re ahead).

When you team up with running partners motivation is elevated because your running stats are shared with your partners. They can see what you’re doing (and not doing) and vice-versa. RunSomeone compares your stats with those of your partners' and lets you know how you’re doing. Through the app you can send each other encouraging messages or egg each other on.

When you use the app’s “Race” features, motivation is at its peak. RunSomeone allows you to setup “Races” for two or more people to join. In this environment you either compete with each other or compete against time. For some of us, nothing is more motivating than a good ol’ friendly competition.Back to faqs

How is it social? RunSomeone will have a built in messaging system that will allow runners to post comments and communicate before, during, and after their runs. This can be used to discuss training regimens, ask for running advise, or share motivational messages and techniques. Integration with popular social networks such as facebook, twitter, and dailymile will allow you to share your goals and achievements with friends and family so you can keep them abreast of your training activities and have them root for you and support your cause!Back to faqs

How is it social beyond the people I know? With RunSomeone you are not limited to running with people that you know. Its social component allows you to partner with people around the globe. You can partner with people that are at the same running level as you or at higher levels if you're looking for greater motivation or you can join public running groups. Either way, you communicate with each other, share tips, and most importantly motivate each other along the way.Back to faqs

The app will alert you of your status-to-goal and motivate you along the way. All activity is shared with all the runners of that race so you can see if you’re falling behind compared to the others. Most times this is enough motivation to get you going. When it isn’t, your friends can use RunSomeone to send you private messages to do some of their own motivating.

Challenge race: This race is designed for runners who want the continued challenge of doing better. Perhaps looking to improve their own personal record. The goal of this race format is to run farther or faster than the others in this race. This is a round robin environment where the race will continue for as long as each competitor surpasses the previous best mark, which of course, can be your own.

Competitive race: This race caters to the runner that is motivated mostly by competition or to those looking to obtain some friendly bragging rights. A runner can invite a friend or two to a race that is similar to a 100 yard dash in track and field. You set up the race rules and RunSomeone will track each runner’s progress and pick the winner.

column1: CHARGEKEY is the world’s most portable USB charging cable for iPhone and Android (Micro USB). It’s the size of a house-key so it fits on your keychain and is always with you when you need it. It works just like your standard usb cable for charging your smartphone from any USB port.
“The New NOMAD CHARGEKEY Is Like A Jumper Cable For Your Phone”

“A year ago the guys at NOMAD released a small, portable USB cable for iPhones and micro USB devices. Now they’ve launched the CHARGEKEY, a super-small “cable” for charging your device via any USB port.”
“The makers of the CHARGECARD—that wallet-friendly credit card-sized sync cable for smartphones—are back with a new product called the CHARGEKEY that's instead designed to hang out on your keychain.”

Tiny CHARGEKEY for iPhone 5 is always handy and ready to go...If you're anywhere that there's an open USB port, you can plug in your iPhone (or iPad -- the CHARGEKEY is designed to withstand up to 3.1 A of current) to top it off.""
“The CHARGEKEY Might Be The Smallest Lightning Charger Possible”
“...impressively small CHARGEKEY, a teeny tiny USB-to-Lightning adapter that – yes – hooks onto a keyring.”

We are using a trusted manufacturer who currently manufactures our first product, CHARGECARD. We’ve already initiated the tooling for CHARGEKEY and we expect to ship on November 30th, meaning your CHARGEKEYS will arrive before December 10th.
Does CHARGEKEY allow for data transfer?
Yes. CHARGEKEY works just like a standard USB cable to charge and sync your phone.
CHARGEKEY is durable. It’s made from high grade Makrolon® polycarbonate and Versollan™ high performance polyurethane elastomer (TPU).
How fast will my phone charge when charging with CHARGEKEY?

CHARGEKEY will charge your phone as fast as any other cable will. The rate of charge actually depends on which USB port you’re connected to. Some USB ports emit fewer or more amps, which does affect charging time. For example, your phone will charge faster when connected to a 3.1 amp USB port than when connected to a 1.0 amp port.
Do you ship to my country?
Yes. We ship to everyone in every country everywhere in the world. We have a lot of shipping experience and we will make sure that we get you your CHARGEKEYS.
Please send us a message or email us at chloe@hellonomad.com
We design products for the 21st century nomad. We’re a team from San Francisco working hard to dream up and build out tools for the 21st century nomad.
Since you’re reading this, there’s a good chance that you’ve got quite a bit in common with us and with this 21st century nomad.

And who exactly is a 21st century nomad? It’s us and it’s you. It’s anyone who’d rather live more than own more. Anyone who’d rather invest in experience than waste money, energy and time on useless stuff. Anyone who looks at their smartphone as a tool helping them intertwine work, life and adventure.
Like any good nomads, we started NOMAD on the run while living between a basement, a garage, a boat and the open road.
We’re focused on building simple solutions to simple problems, problems that shouldn’t slow us or you down from living like a 21st century nomad.
CHARGECARD and CHARGEKEY are just the start of our modern, minimalist, mobility movement.",11.0,1,"1 Campaign
