                             Have you Seen This?

I love music and love hanging out with my friends. My friends and I share the same taste in music. More often than not, I find myself handing over one of my earbuds to my friends. As much as I love my friends, I cringe at the thought of sharing my earbuds. I knew that there had to be a solution. I searched everywhere for two in one earphones.                    
                                                         Nothing, Nada, Zip!
I searched thoroughly to make sure there was nothing else out there like a dual pair of earphones. That was when Sparkbudz was born!

Sparkbudz magnetically detaches into two separate sets of earphones connected by one cord: one for you and one for a friend.  Then, it attaches back into one single set of earphones for when you are alone. The wires also light up to the beat of your music.

                                                               About Myself

I'm Brittany Evans an 18 years old a student at Riverside City College majoring in Communications. I am the inventor and founder of Sparkbudz. I have been working on this project for about two years now. During this time I worked diligently to make sure this project was something not only I would love but the consumers as well.

This project is important to us because, once we reach our funding goal, we will not only be able to sell online but also have Sparkbudz in stores. As a backer, you will share the excitement, realizing that you helped contribute to make our dream into a reality.
What you will help us Achieve
As a backer you will help us achieve the following...
• Making the wiring and the earphones smaller and more compact

Once we are funded, we will be able to manufacture, package and distribute the product. Alone, that takes a lot of money. As a college student, I can really use your help with the funding for this project.  

               What We Need &
column2:
What You Get

To start off we need to raise $100,000. That means we need around 3,000 backers to help us reach our goal.

column1: • $30,000 is going towards packaging and distribution
• $30,000 is going towards Shipment, Putting the product into retail and online
In return each backer will receive a thank you gift for their contribution.
If we don't reach our entire goal
The remainder of the money will go towards a more reasonable route to help manufacture the product. From there, we will sell the product online as well as advertise on social media.

Our Progress

Here is a timeline to show the progress we have made from September 2013 to August 2014.
To help bring this project from a drawing and into reality, I would like to give Cinfinity International a Thank you!

The prototype of the earphones will not be the finished product. Instead, the finished product will be smaller and more sleek. Here are some mock ups I made to show you how the finished product will look when you receive it in person.

column2:
Challenges

Like with anything that is worth having and doing, their will be risk involved.  I have been working on this project diligently with Cinfinity for two years and together, we are working hard to make sure this product is completed. I am looking for a manufacturer to help execute this project. We know this project can be completed in a timely manner. The challenge will be the lighting in the cord
column3: we expect to have this issue resolved before delivery.

column1:
Other Ways You Can Help

Thank you for your support, other ways to help us are as followed:

• Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
  • Follow us on Facebook/Sparkbudz and www.Sparkbudz.com

column2:
>BACKER BONUS!

We at Cogent Computer Systems, Inc have decided to sweeten the pot for our campaign backers! When we reach our campaign goal of $25,000 we will upgrade all of the Cerberus MPC1 units sold with an extra 500GB of Hard Drive storage for FREE! This will even include the Cerberus Barebones! So spread the word and help yourselves while helping us reach our goal.


The World's Best, Smallest, Fanless, Quad-Core x86 Mini-PC

Cerberus MPC1 is ideal as a Home Theater PC, Small Office PC or Whole House Media Server. Cerberus MPC1 consumes less than 25W and runs fanless for the ultimate in reliability.  At just 4"" x 6"" x 1.5"" Cerberus fits anywhere you decide to put the full power of an x86 PC.  Run any flavor of Linux, Windows XP/7/8 or even Chrome OS. No other Mini-PC combines x86 quad core, 2.5"" Drive plus M.2 SSD Socket, 802.11AC Gigabit WiFi and 8GB DDR3L-1600 memory in a fanless package this small.

column1: What Does This Technology Mean for You?

column2: >No fan means ultra-silent operation for your Living room, Bedroom or Home Office.
>x86 means running full Windows applications, still the
>2.4Ghz Quad Core means high performance for Media Streaming, x86 Apps and smooth web browsing experience.

>The 2.5"" Drive means you can store up to 100 full length Blu-Ray movies using inexpensive hard drives, or use a 2.5"" SSD for the fastest speed,  increase the Operating System and Application boot and load times of your unit by 10 fold!
>The M.2 SSD means you can get the performance you need while using the 2.5"" hard drive for massive storage.
>802.11AC Gigabit WiFi with Dual Antenna means you can serve movies, music and more to every device throughout your house.
>Wired Gigabit Ethernet lets you connect to a whole house Gigabit router directly, saving bandwidth for all your other devices.
>Smaller than a Paperback Book means Cerberus MPC1 goes where

column1:
What about Office/Work use?

Today's shared, open space, Eco-conscious offices require special attention to work space, sound level, and power consumption. Cerberus MPC1 delivers the high performance you need while also being the quietest, most space efficient PC you can buy.  The low power consumption combined with Gigabit Wired Ethernet makes Cerberus MPC1 suitable for Power over Ethernet (PoE) installations.  Or go completely wireless with the 802.11AC Gigabit WiFi plus Bluetooth 4.0.  Unplug Cerberus MPC1 and bring it to your next presentation!  Smaller than a laptop and easy to connect to a projector.


All this starts at $349 ($299 if you grab our Barebones Special)!
column7:
>Bringing the World's Content Home

Why is Cerberus MPC1 so well positioned for home use?  Because all the latest trends tell us that we are becoming more mobile, more technologically connected, more data hungry.  When we're out in the world we're moving fast, creating and
column9: >content at a rapid pace, not worrying about what comes next. But when we finally
column11: > to slow down a bit, come home to watch and listen, to absorb and learn, to share, or
column13: > be entertained, how do we do that?
column16:
>Yesterday's closed world solutions

There is an abundance of single point, closed solutions that fulfill a part of the mission. They can only stream from a few sources, have lousy or no web access.  Or they require a laptop (don't burn your lap).  Maybe you've even tried a big, noisy, power hungry PC (turn up the volume)!
column17: >Cerberus MPC1 combines the best of each, then goes beyond.  Cerberus MPC1 offers
column18: >the size and silent operation of a streaming
column19: > box, the compute power and the storage of a desktop PC and the ability to connect with all your other devices in your house via high speed wireless.  Add USB and Bluetooth Peripherals
column20: > such as HD Camera and Stereo mic for video chat and impromptu Karaoke

• Play games with your friends, on-line or local multi-player games, on any PC supported game platform, including Chrome Apps, Windows 8 Apps, and more
• Share your content at Gigabit speed to other TV's and devices including tablets and phones anywhere in your house
• Store and serve up content from the internal 500GB Hard Drive (expandable up to 2TBytes), or use the internal Solid State Drive (expandable up to 480GB) for Ultra-Fast Access, or both!

• Add an HD Camera and Stereo Mic for HD Video Calling on the big screen (and show off those new bunny slippers you got for your birthday)
• Put one in your bedroom and watch TV with Bluetooth Headphones while your significant other sleeps peacefully, no fighting!
• Remotely Control and Stream Content to/from your iOS/Android Phone or Tablet

Connectable to all Devices!

Cerberus MPC1 will be proudly manufactured here in Rhode Island, USA in

column1: our in-house IPC-610 Certified SMT Production Facility.  On-shore US
manufacturing allows us to maintain the highest quality control and
reliability standards.  And gives us the ability to provide the

dedicated customer support you demand.

Cerberus MPC1 merges the performance, functionality and flexibility of a standard PC, with that of a Media Streaming Box and Media Server into a very quiet, very ECO-friendly device. This knockout combination is housed in a very small, rugged enclosure made from Aeronautics Grade 6063-T5 Machined Aluminum.  Cerberus MPC1 delivers on all the tasks you need from a Modern Multimedia Center PC:
• High Performance, Low Power Quad Core 2.4Ghz x86

column2: >Desktop Class 3D GPU for a solid mid-range PC gaming experience

column1: • High-Speed Network Access via 802.11AC Gigabit Wifi (backward compatible with 802.11b/g/n) along with Gigabit Wired Ethernet
• High Definition Video via Dual HDMI with 7.1 Surround Sound Audio Streaming
• Expandable Storage via 2.5"" Hard Drive and Solid State M2-Sata Socket
• Peripheral Expansion via Dual USB2 and Dual USB3.0
• Wireless Expansion via Bluetooth 4.0 for Remote Control and Audio Streaming
• Supported OS's include Linux/Ubuntu, Windows 8.1, Chrome OS and Windows 7
• Boot from the 2.5"" Hard Drive or from the Ultra-Fast SSD
• Windows Media Center and XBMC are fully Supported
• Paperback book size enclosure is 153mm x 110mm x 38mm (6"" x 4.33"" x 1.5"")

Open Choices, Open World

For the more technically inclined, you can choose everything about the software that runs on Cerberus MPC1. From the OS, to the programs, and the peripherals you install. You might want to Multi-Boot Windows, Ubuntu, or ChromeOS. You may choose Windows Media Center or XBMC, or both!.  With Cerberus MPC1, you choose the applications and peripherals that are installed, as you would any PC.

We know you're out there, so get ready to transform your computing experience from cramped and solitary to expansive and social!  Your support in funding this campaign will make all of this become a reality.

column1: Help make this project successful so everyone can join the Open World of Cerberus MPC1.

FAQ

1. What is Cerberus and why do I need it?

Cerberus is a small Multimedia PC that brings full computing capability right to your TV. Streamline your home or office by replacing noisy desktop PC's, streaming boxes and eliminate the need to connect a laptop to your TV. Excellent for media streaming, web surfing and serving media to and from all your devices, you'll find yourself filling all of your computer needs right from the living room couch. Connectable to all of your devices via Gigabit WiFi or Bluetooth 4.0, Cerberus can even be controlled from your smartphone eliminating the need for a keyboard and mouse. Our fanless design provides silent operation that is perfect for home use as well as the office.

2. How is Cerberus cooled without a fan?

column2:
25W allows us to passively cool the Cerberus MPC1. The processor is thermally coupled directly to our extrusion dispersing all the heat required to make our unit comfortably warm to the touch.

3. How can I upgrade my RAM and Hard Drive?

>We've got you covered! Cerberus has been designed so you can access the RAM memory, Hard Drive and the SSD socket all from the bottom of the unit. Just remove the bottom panel and you can upgrade to 16GB RAM, a 2TB Hard Drive or 480GB SSD. If you're a media junkie like we are, you can find the perfect combination for your storage needs.
column4:
>Yes! We have provided you with 2 HDMI ports to support your dual display requirements.

column1: BACKER BONUS!We at Cogent Computer Systems, Inc have decided to sweeten the pot for our campaign backers! When we reach our campaign goal of $25,000 we will upgrade all of the Cerberus MPC1 units sold with an extra 500GB of Hard Drive storage for FREE! This will even include the Cerberus Barebones! So spread the word and help yourselves while helping us reach our goal.The World's Best, Smallest, Fanless, Quad-Core x86 Mini-PCCerberus MPC1 is ideal as a Home Theater PC, Small Office PC or Whole House Media Server. Cerberus MPC1 consumes less than 25W and runs fanless for the ultimate in reliability.  At just 4"" x 6"" x 1.5"" Cerberus fits anywhere you decide to put the full power of an x86 PC.  Run any flavor of Linux, Windows XP/7/8 or even Chrome OS. No other Mini-PC combines x86 quad core, 2.5"" Drive plus M.2 SSD Socket, 802.11AC Gigabit WiFi and 8GB DDR3L-1600 memory in a fanless package this small.
What Does This Technology Mean for You?
No fan means ultra-silent operation for your Living room, Bedroom or Home Office.
x86 means running full Windows applications, still the gold standard.
2.4Ghz Quad Core means high performance for Media Streaming, x86 Apps and smooth web browsing experience.

The 2.5"" Drive means you can store up to 100 full length Blu-Ray movies using inexpensive hard drives, or use a 2.5"" SSD for the fastest speed,  increase the Operating System and Application boot and load times of your unit by 10 fold!
The M.2 SSD means you can get the performance you need while using the 2.5"" hard drive for massive storage.
802.11AC Gigabit WiFi with Dual Antenna means you can serve movies, music and more to every device throughout your house.
Wired Gigabit Ethernet lets you connect to a whole house Gigabit router directly, saving bandwidth for all your other devices.
Smaller than a Paperback Book means Cerberus MPC1 goes where you want it.

What about Office/Work use?Today's shared, open space, Eco-conscious offices require special attention to work space, sound level, and power consumption. Cerberus MPC1 delivers the high performance you need while also being the quietest, most space efficient PC you can buy.  The low power consumption combined with Gigabit Wired Ethernet makes Cerberus MPC1 suitable for Power over Ethernet (PoE) installations.  Or go completely wireless with the 802.11AC Gigabit WiFi plus Bluetooth 4.0.  Unplug Cerberus MPC1 and bring it to your next presentation!  Smaller than a laptop and easy to connect to a projector.All this starts at $349 ($299 if you grab our Barebones Special)!Bringing the World's Content HomeWhy is Cerberus MPC1 so well positioned for home use?  Because all the latest trends tell us that we are becoming more mobile, more technologically connected, more data hungry.  When we're out in the world we're moving fast, creating and consuming content at a rapid pace, not worrying about what comes next. But when we finally decide to slow down a bit, come home to watch and listen, to absorb and learn, to share, or just be entertained, how do we do that?Yesterday's closed world solutionsThere is an abundance of single point, closed solutions that fulfill a part of the mission. They can only stream from a few sources, have lousy or no web access.  Or they require a laptop (don't burn your lap).  Maybe you've even tried a big, noisy, power hungry PC (turn up the volume)!  Cerberus MPC1 combines the best of each, then goes beyond.  Cerberus MPC1 offers the size and silent operation of a streaming box, the compute power and the storage of a desktop PC and the ability to connect with all your other devices in your house via high speed wireless.  Add USB and Bluetooth Peripherals such as HD Camera and Stereo mic for video chat and impromptu Karaoke sessions.   Connect a Blu-Ray player/recorder to the high speed USB3 port, or... I think you get the point, right? Cerberus MPC1 does all this and more...Today's open world solution:Cerberus MPC1From the comfort of your couch, bedroom, den, dorm room, etc Cerberus MPC1 will bring the world to your HDTV.   Cerberus MPC1 allows you to:
Stream movies and TV shows from the web, any source, anywhere, any time
Access your email, your work content, run all your PC Productivity Apps such as MS Office, CAD, Web Design, Photo Editing, etc
Read, Update and Post your Social Content, Twitter, Facebook, Tumblr, etc
Play games with your friends, on-line or local multi-player games, on any PC supported game platform, including Chrome Apps, Windows 8 Apps, and more
Share your content at Gigabit speed to other TV's and devices including tablets and phones anywhere in your house
Store and serve up content from the internal 500GB Hard Drive (expandable up to 2TBytes), or use the internal Solid State Drive (expandable up to 480GB) for Ultra-Fast Access, or both!
Wide-spaced USB ports let you use those fat dongles that don't fit anywhere else.
Add a Blu-Ray Player/Recorder via USB3 or Network Attached Storage via Ethernet
Add an HD Camera and Stereo Mic for HD Video Calling on the big screen (and show off those new bunny slippers you got for your birthday)
Put one in your bedroom and watch TV with Bluetooth Headphones while your significant other sleeps peacefully, no fighting!
Remotely Control and Stream Content to/from your iOS/Android Phone or Tablet

column2: Elle Wanna Be Belles of the Inaugral Ball D.C. Trip!

column1: I just learned yesterday via a message from the Director of Volunteers for the Presidential Inaugural Committee that I am being offered an opportuity to serve the President, First Lady and their guests at the Inaugural Ball the evening of January 21st.  It would be a once-in-a lifetime chance and a great first-time trip for both Johnella and myself to tour D.C., the Capitol, the monuments and museums and be a part of history.

• I am a City and County of San Francisco employee for the past dozen years and have been a strong Obama supporter ever since he wrote the book, ""The Audacity of Hope"". I believe he is a leader of our times, who's leadership style fosters openess, bipartinship and truly relating to the working class and middle class families, women, and all minority groups.

• I helped raise funds, campaign and even did a couple of nights of phone banking for the president this time around and got to meet, get to know and  learn what the constituents care about right now in America and how they believed voting for Obama's second term was the right choice.
• Recently, I was named one of the ""100 Most Influential Filipinas in the U.S."" by the highly respected Filipina Women's Network/FWN

• Also awarded November 2012, as a member of the decade by the board group I advise The Young Filipino Professional Association.  Helping, supporting and uplifting the board and its members for nearly a decade.

This trip would be a celebration of the inspirational work that POTUS has done so far and again, continued support for what he has to do for the next four years.  Also, as a daughter of a Naval Officer and a woman who has continued the tradition in my family as a public servant, I would be honored to serve the committee, the President and his supporters at the inaugural ball and to celebrate his great presidency.

Most of all, I think it would be a wonderful, teachable moment for my daughter, Johnella, enriching her world and also be highly educational for her.  I would like to think when she grows older, she can picture herself as someone who can hold public office or be the President of the United States as well. Also, it would be poignant day of rememberance, on MLK Jr. Day, too for my biracial daughter.
To help us get there, I am asking you to help me fund my travels expenses due to the short amount of time I need to make it over there across the country.
Figuring out last minute flight details, hotel accomodations, meals, snacks, bus/metro/cab fare and incidentals I need about $2000 for this dream inaugural trip to Washington D.C for us.
To help me reach my goal, you'll get cool, commerative gifts, that I will pick-up while on my travels. They would be:

Again, this would be a once in a lifetime event for me, not to mention, honestly, I haven't had a real vacation from career and being a mommy in a little over 5 years (as old as my kid!), so this would be welcome personal time with me, as I celebrate Obama's presidency and the first family plus spend, real bonding time with Jah Jah :)  Thanks so much in advance for anything you can contribute to my dream trip again to the Presidential Inauguration!
If you can't donate in my trip fund, you can help do the following and thanks so much in advance if you do!
Please spread the word to your own network, via Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn or email.
You can use the Indiegogo share tools.
Help us get there and thanks for your time!

Eleanore and Johnella

","Johnella & Elle Wanna Be Belles of the Inaugral Ball D.C. Trip!

I just learned yesterday via a message from the Director of Volunteers for the Presidential Inaugural Committee that I am being offered an opportuity to serve the President, First Lady and their guests at the Inaugural Ball the evening of January 21st.  It would be a once-in-a lifetime chance and a great first-time trip for both Johnella and myself to tour D.C., the Capitol, the monuments and museums and be a part of history.

I am a City and County of San Francisco employee for the past dozen years and have been a strong Obama supporter ever since he wrote the book, ""The Audacity of Hope"". I helped raise funds, campaign and even did a couple of nights of phone banking for the president this time around and got to meet, get to know and  learn what the constituents care about right now in America and how they believed voting for Obama's second term was the right choice.

Also awarded November 2012, as a member of the decade by the board group I advise The Young Filipino Professional Association.  Helping, supporting and uplifting the board and its members for nearly a decade.

This trip would be a celebration of the inspirational work that POTUS has done so far and again, continued support for what he has to do for the next four years.  Also, as a daughter of a Naval Officer and a woman who has continued the tradition in my family as a public servant, I would be honored to serve the committee, the President and his supporters at the inaugural ball and to celebrate his great presidency.

Most of all, I think it would be a wonderful, teachable moment for my daughter, Johnella, enriching her world and also be highly educational for her.  I would like to think when she grows older, she can picture herself as someone who can hold public office or be the President of the United States as well. Also, it would be poignant day of rememberance, on MLK Jr. Day, too for my biracial daughter.
Elle's & Jah Jah's Trip Essentials & Our Gifts for Your Donations
To help us get there, I am asking you to help me fund my travels expenses due to the short amount of time I need to make it over there across the country.
Figuring out last minute flight details, hotel accomodations, meals, snacks, bus/metro/cab fare and incidentals I need about $2000 for this dream inaugural trip to Washington D.C for us.
To help me reach my goal, you'll get cool, commerative gifts, that I will pick-up while on my travels. They would be:
For $50, an inaugural wine glass set

Again, this would be a once in a lifetime event for me, not to mention, honestly, I haven't had a real vacation from career and being a mommy in a little over 5 years (as old as my kid!), so this would be welcome personal time with me, as I celebrate Obama's presidency and the first family plus spend, real bonding time with Jah Jah :)  Thanks so much in advance for anything you can contribute to my dream trip again to the Presidential Inauguration!
If you can't donate in my trip fund, you can help do the following and thanks so much in advance if you do!
Please spread the word to your own network, via Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn or email.
You can use the Indiegogo share tools.
Help us get there and thanks for your time!

If you wanted to transfer battery charge from your tablet/ipad to your phone, could you? Think about it. Your phone is about to die, but your tablet/ipad has plenty of battery charge left. Why not just transfer battery to your phone?
We’ve all been out with friends or family and have encountered a phone about to die. What if you could transfer battery life even if they have a different model phone?

You will now have the same abilities as your local cell phone store. We’ve developed a product that will allow you to do just that. Transfer and Backup: contacts, text messages, photos, music, videos, calendars, notes.
You can even find your keys or find your phone, all from a device that fits on your keychain.
It's amazing how two simple words can create so many different outcomes and emotions.
""What if...we could transfer battery power from one smartphone to another...""
""What if...you could find your lost phone by just pushing a button...""
""What if...you could regain ownership of your privacy again...""
""What if...you never had to pay for someone to transfer your information again...""
""What if"" became our statement to create greatness.

""Not our fault or our problem"", that seems to be what has become the relationship between the consumer, cell phone service providers, and the manufactures of the devices you own. Leaving you the consumer to clean up the mess of missing or deleted data, frustration in transferring from one device to another, or simply having questions left unanswered. If you have ever been frustrated or dreaded changing devices, the Charge Share Keylink is your solution! Having worked over a combined 30 years in the telecommunications field ourselves, we have seen first hand thousands of people angry and frustrated as their digital lives unraveled before their eyes. Most people can honestly say they keep their private and most important information on their phones. We've become accustomed to entrusting complete strangers to handle the task of transferring our most valuable and personal information. Unfortunately, that system has many flaws and it opens you up to having your privacy violated and your information lost or misused. We want to put the control and ease back into your hands with Charge Share Keylink. The Charge Share Keylink was developed for simplicity. With the constant theme of making sure it was developed to be 'so easy, our moms can use it', the hardware and software combination ensures that almost anyone at any technical level will enjoy the benefits it has to offer.
The Charge Share Keylink was developed for people who:
• Would like to be able to transfer battery charge from their smartphone, tablet or laptop to another smartphone, tablet or laptop
• Lost information due to failed software updates (contacts, photos, text messages, notes, calender)
• Lost information due to a defective phone
• Had to go to a store to have their information transferred
• Have duplicate contacts due to multiple email accounts syncing
• Emails pictures one by one to their computer
• Have gone through the agony of having to wipe out and then start from nothing to set up a device
We now leave you with some considerations.
What if we told you this will work with most smartphones, no matter the carrier or network.
What if your information could be restored to your exact specific settings, even if a failed software download occurs, right down to the specific ring tone that you had set.
What if you never had to worry about a complete stranger transferring and going through your most personal information again.
How Can Charge Share Enhance Your Life

Power Transfer- For the first time ever, you will now have the ability to take battery charge from a smartphone, tablet, or laptop and transfer it to another smartphone. You will also have the ability to charge a single smartphone or multiple devices from any laptop, desktop, and any vehicle equipped with USB connection. You can even use your current home or car micro USB charger with your Charge Share Keylink. This will allow you to charge multiple devices at once.

Data Transfer- Simple and easy, our application and hardware will never leave any of your personal information at risk by empowering you with the most content transfer features to date. Ability to make the transition from your old phone to your new phone a breeze. You will have the ability to transfer contacts, text, pictures, videos, music, calendar, notes and complete folders all in the privacy of your home, office, or on the go. You will have the ability to pick and choose which items you want to transfer, instead of the being forced with all or nothing. You will have the ability to transfer without internet connectivity, to ensure security and complete content transfer, making it the world's most secure transfer.

Total backup- You will now have the ability to backup all contacts, text, pictures, videos, music, calendars, notes and folders to or from your laptop, desktop or tablet. This will serve as a hard copy of all your most personal information. This will also include a folder called Time Capsule in which content that is locked and in this place can not be deleted. Never become a victim of lost data due to software updates or user error again. You will have the option to backup your information to your hard drive, encrypted cloud storage, or both! This will also give you the ability to delete or merge duplicate contacts, social media accounts, and keep track of email logins and passwords from your smartphone, laptop, tablet or desktop.

Bluetooth Search- Using Bluetooth (A2DP)- Charge Share will help make the panic of a misplaced phone or tablet a thing of the past. Charge Share has been designed with a built-in panic button that will send out a distress signal to your devices that are connected via Bluetooth. ALR will send a command to your smart devices to turn the volume up to the highest volume, vibrate and enable a flashing pattern on your screen. Giving you every opportunity to locate your device, even if it is set to silent or vibrate. The Charge Share Keylinks compact design was made in order to be used on key rings. ALR is reverse compatible, enabling you to have the ability to send a panic signal from a smartphone, tablet, or connected laptop to sound off your Charge Share Keylink and assist in the search of your missing keys. No more need to panic for your misplaced items that always go missing at the wrong times. (Range of Bluetooth is between 30-100 feet).

The Charge Share Keylink that is shown in the video and photos is a working prototype. In order to ensure we could be confident in what was possible, we had to develop a prototype from spare chargers and smart device parts. It had to be small, it had to be useful, and it had to be able to work. It was constructed from scratch and consistently tested to ensure the functionality we strived for. We are pleased to say it exceeded all expectations, and paired with our software that has been developed, it is nothing short of spectacular. Both the software and hardware have patents pending. Now it's time to take it to the next stage and get this into your hands.

Keep in mind that it is not a representation of the final product. We are pleased to say that your Charge Share Keylink will be sleek and slim as we will be able to trim up to 30% for the final production model.
Here is a video of the VP of Development from our software collaborator of Glowtouch Technologies:
Your Charge Share Keylink will be completely developed, refined, and crafted out of high quality semi-gloss plastic. All Charge Share Keylinks will be treated with a scratch resistant finish.
Reliable and field tested components complete the internal composition to ensure your satisfaction and guarantee product longevity.
Internally, Charge Share Keylink (hardware) comes complete with
• (2) micro usb connectors (compatible most Android, Windows, Blackberry devices)
• (2) 30 pin connectors (compatible with the Iphone 3g, Iphone 3gs, Iphone 4, Iphone 4s, Ipod, first generation Ipad, Second generation Ipad)
• (2) usb female ports (1 standard and 1 micro. Accepts connection from devices that have usb ends, and connectors not offered on charge share device)
• (1) usb male connector (allows connection to computer/laptop)

We are collaborating with GlowTouch Technologies to help complete and finalize our software. GlowTouch specializes in application and mobile application development, system integration, and website design. Our software is more than 50% complete and will only be expedited once funding has been fulfilled.
• Software developed to support: Apple, Android, Blackberry, Windows
• Compatible with: Android 3.1 and higher, Apple iOS 5.1 and higher, Blackberry 4.0 and higher, and Windows mobile 6 and higher
• Will allow cross communication between multiple OS platforms
• Assist in proper and safe data transfer between smart devices
• Assist in proper and safe battery transfer between smart devices
• Provides easy management solution for consumers of all their smart device information

The development and concept of Charge Share has been ongoing for years. We have secured collaboration agreements with global leaders who excel in technology, design, application, and software development. There are mutual agreements and understanding that this project will be developed with simplicity and consumer satisfaction as the top priority. You will not be disappointed! With your support, we will deliver the beauty of Charge Share to the world. We are very close to production for hardware devices and your pledge contributions will help Mammoth Designs fund:

Coming from the telecommuncations field we already understand beneficial this product can be for you. The retail cost for just the connections alone would be more than $180 in most stores, and that is not including bluetooth or a rechargeable battery.

Our software that will be paired with the hardward to complete the package. You will enjoy a control over your smart device not thought possible. Help fund one of the biggest start up projects in history and enjoy the benefits of being in control of your personal information.

We are offering two different models of the Charge Share Keylink. One with Bluetooth and Battery and the other model WITHOUT. Please be sure you're pledging for the right one to fit you specific needs. If you order the one WITHOUT Bluetooth and Battery, please keep in mind that the bluetooth search and emergency battery boost will not be available.

We want to make sure that those who've made donations/pledge for our projects truly understand how thankful we are. We will be giving our software for free (up to 5 devices) upon completion for those who've contributed for making our vision a reality. It's our way of saying thank you for believing in us!
Shipping within the U.S. will be free. Please add $15 dollars to ship outside of the U.S. Bulk shipping will only be possible within the United States.
Mammoth Designs Logo Options

Even if you're not in the financial position to make a donation. You can help us by spreading the word! Your voice is greater than any marketing campaign we could design. So share, tweet, talk about our project and help us change the world. The Indiegogo share tools make it quick and easy for you to help us be viewed all across the world!

If you wanted to transfer battery charge from your tablet/ipad to your phone, could you? Think about it. Your phone is about to die, but your tablet/ipad has plenty of battery charge left. Why not just transfer battery to your phone?
We’ve all been out with friends or family and have encountered a phone about to die. What if you could transfer battery life even if they have a different model phone?

You will now have the same abilities as your local cell phone store. We’ve developed a product that will allow you to do just that. Transfer and Backup: contacts, text messages, photos, music, videos, calendars, notes.
You can even find your keys or find your phone, all from a device that fits on your keychain.
It's amazing how two simple words can create so many different outcomes and emotions.
What if...we could transfer battery power from one smartphone to another...""
""What if...you could find your lost phone by just pushing a button...""
""What if...you could regain ownership of your privacy again...""
""What if...you never had to pay for someone to transfer your information again...""
""What if"" became our statement to create greatness.

Not our fault or our problem"", that seems to be what has become the relationship between the consumer, cell phone service providers, and the manufactures of the devices you own. Leaving you the consumer to clean up the mess of missing or deleted data, frustration in transferring from one device to another, or simply having questions left unanswered. If you have ever been frustrated or dreaded changing devices, the Charge Share Keylink is your solution! Having worked over a combined 30 years in the telecommunications field ourselves, we have seen first hand thousands of people angry and frustrated as their digital lives unraveled before their eyes. Most people can honestly say they keep their private and most important information on their phones. We've become accustomed to entrusting complete strangers to handle the task of transferring our most valuable and personal information. Unfortunately, that system has many flaws and it opens you up to having your privacy violated and your information lost or misused. We want to put the control and ease back into your hands with Charge Share Keylink. The Charge Share Keylink was developed for simplicity. With the constant theme of making sure it was developed to be 'so easy, our moms can use it', the hardware and software combination ensures that almost anyone at any technical level will enjoy the benefits it has to offer.
The Charge Share Keylink was developed for people who:
Would like to be able to transfer battery charge from their smartphone, tablet or laptop to another smartphone, tablet or laptop
Lost information due to failed software updates (contacts, photos, text messages, notes, calender)
Lost information due to a defective phone
Had to go to a store to have their information transferred
Have duplicate contacts due to multiple email accounts syncing
Emails pictures one by one to their computer
Have gone through the agony of having to wipe out and then start from nothing to set up a device
We now leave you with some considerations.
What if we told you this will work with most smartphones, no matter the carrier or network.
What if your information could be restored to your exact specific settings, even if a failed software download occurs, right down to the specific ring tone that you had set.
What if you never had to worry about a complete stranger transferring and going through your most personal information again.
How Can Charge Share Enhance Your Life

Power Transfer- For the first time ever, you will now have the ability to take battery charge from a smartphone, tablet, or laptop and transfer it to another smartphone. You will also have the ability to charge a single smartphone or multiple devices from any laptop, desktop, and any vehicle equipped with USB connection. You can even use your current home or car micro USB charger with your Charge Share Keylink. This will allow you to charge multiple devices at once.

Data Transfer- Simple and easy, our application and hardware will never leave any of your personal information at risk by empowering you with the most content transfer features to date. Ability to make the transition from your old phone to your new phone a breeze. You will have the ability to transfer contacts, text, pictures, videos, music, calendar, notes and complete folders all in the privacy of your home, office, or on the go. You will have the ability to pick and choose which items you want to transfer, instead of the being forced with all or nothing. You will have the ability to transfer without internet connectivity, to ensure security and complete content transfer, making it the world's most secure transfer.

Total backup- You will now have the ability to backup all contacts, text, pictures, videos, music, calendars, notes and folders to or from your laptop, desktop or tablet. This will serve as a hard copy of all your most personal information. This will also include a folder called Time Capsule in which content that is locked and in this place can not be deleted. Never become a victim of lost data due to software updates or user error again. You will have the option to backup your information to your hard drive, encrypted cloud storage, or both! This will also give you the ability to delete or merge duplicate contacts, social media accounts, and keep track of email logins and passwords from your smartphone, laptop, tablet or desktop.

Bluetooth Search- Using Bluetooth (A2DP)- Charge Share will help make the panic of a misplaced phone or tablet a thing of the past. Charge Share has been designed with a built-in panic button that will send out a distress signal to your devices that are connected via Bluetooth. ALR will send a command to your smart devices to turn the volume up to the highest volume, vibrate and enable a flashing pattern on your screen. Giving you every opportunity to locate your device, even if it is set to silent or vibrate. The Charge Share Keylinks compact design was made in order to be used on key rings. ALR is reverse compatible, enabling you to have the ability to send a panic signal from a smartphone, tablet, or connected laptop to sound off your Charge Share Keylink and assist in the search of your missing keys. No more need to panic for your misplaced items that always go missing at the wrong times. (Range of Bluetooth is between 30-100 feet).

The Charge Share Keylink that is shown in the video and photos is a working prototype. In order to ensure we could be confident in what was possible, we had to develop a prototype from spare chargers and smart device parts. It had to be small, it had to be useful, and it had to be able to work. It was constructed from scratch and consistently tested to ensure the functionality we strived for. We are pleased to say it exceeded all expectations, and paired with our software that has been developed, it is nothing short of spectacular. Both the software and hardware have patents pending. Now it's time to take it to the next stage and get this into your hands.

Keep in mind that it is not a representation of the final product. We are pleased to say that your Charge Share Keylink will be sleek and slim as we will be able to trim up to 30% for the final production model.
Here is a video of the VP of Development from our software collaborator of Glowtouch Technologies:
Your Charge Share Keylink will be completely developed, refined, and crafted out of high quality semi-gloss plastic. All Charge Share Keylinks will be treated with a scratch resistant finish.
Reliable and field tested components complete the internal composition to ensure your satisfaction and guarantee product longevity.
Internally, Charge Share Keylink (hardware) comes complete with
(2) micro usb connectors (compatible most Android, Windows, Blackberry devices)
(2) 30 pin connectors (compatible with the Iphone 3g, Iphone 3gs, Iphone 4, Iphone 4s, Ipod, first generation Ipad, Second generation Ipad)
(2) usb female ports (1 standard and 1 micro. Accepts connection from devices that have usb ends, and connectors not offered on charge share device)
(1) usb male connector (allows connection to computer/laptop)

We are collaborating with GlowTouch Technologies to help complete and finalize our software. GlowTouch specializes in application and mobile application development, system integration, and website design. Our software is more than 50% complete and will only be expedited once funding has been fulfilled.
Software developed to support: Apple, Android, Blackberry, Windows
Compatible with: Android 3.1 and higher, Apple iOS 5.1 and higher, Blackberry 4.0 and higher, and Windows mobile 6 and higher
Will allow cross communication between multiple OS platforms
Assist in proper and safe data transfer between smart devices
Assist in proper and safe battery transfer between smart devices
Provides easy management solution for consumers of all their smart device information

The development and concept of Charge Share has been ongoing for years. We have secured collaboration agreements with global leaders who excel in technology, design, application, and software development. There are mutual agreements and understanding that this project will be developed with simplicity and consumer satisfaction as the top priority. You will not be disappointed! With your support, we will deliver the beauty of Charge Share to the world. We are very close to production for hardware devices and your pledge contributions will help Mammoth Designs fund:

Coming from the telecommuncations field we already understand beneficial this product can be for you. The retail cost for just the connections alone would be more than $180 in most stores, and that is not including bluetooth or a rechargeable battery.

Our software that will be paired with the hardward to complete the package. You will enjoy a control over your smart device not thought possible. Help fund one of the biggest start up projects in history and enjoy the benefits of being in control of your personal information.

We are offering two different models of the Charge Share Keylink. One with Bluetooth and Battery and the other model WITHOUT. Please be sure you're pledging for the right one to fit you specific needs. If you order the one WITHOUT Bluetooth and Battery, please keep in mind that the bluetooth search and emergency battery boost will not be available.

We want to make sure that those who've made donations/pledge for our projects truly understand how thankful we are. We will be giving our software for free (up to 5 devices) upon completion for those who've contributed for making our vision a reality. It's our way of saying thank you for believing in us!
Shipping within the U.S. will be free. Please add $15 dollars to ship outside of the U.S. Bulk shipping will only be possible within the United States.

Even if you're not in the financial position to make a donation. You can help us by spreading the word! Your voice is greater than any marketing campaign we could design. So share, tweet, talk about our project and help us change the world. The Indiegogo share tools make it quick and easy for you to help us be viewed all across the world!",11.0,0,"1 Campaign

>Hi. It’s over two years since I started working on the JFK app,
almost fifteen since I started creating the JFK wallchart, and almost fifty since I became fascinated by the assassination of John F Kennedy – well, maybe not quite fifty, but you know what I mean...

column3: >WHO KILLED JFK? won’t be just ‘another app’. As the video says, it will contain many thousands of words of information, hundreds of images and video clips – and will be stylish, attractive and easy to understand. Designed specifically to help you closely study the world’s most enduring conspiracy mystery in time for the 50th anniversary in November. The WHO KILLED JFK? app will be informational, educational and entertaining for both new recruits and seasoned researchers.
>The WHO KILLED JFK? app is at an advanced prototype stage (as you can see in the video), but we still need your help to get it completed. Which is why we chose Indiegogo to reach you.

>Depending on how much you kindly contribute, we’ll send you a pdf or hard copy of the wallchart that inspired the app, a copy of the JFK-related eBook thriller, HUNTINGDOG, or the app itself – providing, of course, that we receive enough funds to complete it!
>If you can't contribute yourself but like the project please share with your friends or anyone you know who may be interested in helping out.

>If you need any further information about the WHO KILLED JFK?
app, just email me at hugh@jfkapp.com.

column1: Hi. It’s over two years since I started working on the JFK app,almost fifteen since I started creating the JFK wallchart, and almost fifty since I became fascinated by the assassination of John F Kennedy – well, maybe not quite fifty, but you know what I mean...

WHO KILLED JFK? won’t be just ‘another app’. As the video says, it will contain many thousands of words of information, hundreds of images and video clips – and will be stylish, attractive and easy to understand. Designed specifically to help you closely study the world’s most enduring conspiracy mystery in time for the 50th anniversary in November. The WHO KILLED JFK? app will be informational, educational and entertaining for both new recruits and seasoned researchers.
The WHO KILLED JFK? app is at an advanced prototype stage (as you can see in the video), but we still need your help to get it completed. Which is why we chose Indiegogo to reach you.

Depending on how much you kindly contribute, we’ll send you a pdf or hard copy of the wallchart that inspired the app, a copy of the JFK-related eBook thriller, HUNTINGDOG, or the app itself – providing, of course, that we receive enough funds to complete it!
If you can't contribute yourself but like the project please share with your friends or anyone you know who may be interested in helping out.
If you need any further information about the WHO KILLED JFK? app, just email me at hugh@jfkapp.com.

CEO at BNY NET : Mr. Oscar Sebastian

Born in Mexico, he has been involved in several projects around the world always at the background of them. 

He now feels is the time to have a project of his own,( he started this project in 2012. )

Favorite phrase: ""Im Carrying My Mustard Seed"" (you will definitely hear him say it).

After looking at mobile phone industry we noticed there are still some gaps in terms of what an OS can do and how it works, the Hardware, and most importantly the monthly plans from the carriers worldwide.

This is where BNY NET comes in.

Delivering a solid Operating System, offering features not present in today's market together with what you already expect a new phone should have.

""Smart Smartphone"" with strong specifications for a reliable device.

At a great value, thanks to the cooperation of service providers.

Thanks to people like you, we will all get to see the 1st BNY Smart Smartphone !!

Please visit our website for more information about us:

www.bnynet.com 

BNY Phone General Specs:

BNY OS

3.5"" Super AMOLED Full HD Touch Screen

Waterproof (5mts)

1.7Ghz Octa-Core

64GB Memory

3GB RAM

8MP Back Camera / 2MP Front Camera

3000 mAh battery


We Need Your Help.

As you can probably imagine, coming up with an Operating System and a new mobile phone is no easy task at all.

The funds needed are to surround ourselves with the right people that will push our name forward, Marketing &
column3:

Internet Certificates, Cloud Servers Services, Application and Software Licenses, etc. (just to name a few).

We would like to show how much we value your contribution by giving you the very first BNY Phones, or the chance to win one of them. You will be part of the history of this venture !

""So everybody would know that few stood against many""

See You Soon !

BNY NET will help people communicate internationally as well as locally.

We will offer great services at affordable prices.

If we are able to meet our deadline and our forecast. BNY NET will launch before Christmas 2014 in USA. 

Expanding early February into, Mexico, Brazil, India, Thailand.

Tell everybody you know there is a Blue Bunny on the way! 

and dont forget to Follow The Blue Rabbit...

column6: >Mobility and Safety in one Cool Form Factor

column1: The Lifeboat is a real solution born out of real needs. The need for enhanced mobility and the need for increased personal security.

Even though we use power banks, we often forget to charge the power bank apart from forgetting to carry it with us. Further, the higher the capacity of the power bank, the less we remember to keep it charged for use in time.
And, in the end, sometimes, all we need is a little bit of battery life to tell our families we are on the way home.

column2: >Lifeboat was created as a way to keep our loved ones secure.

column1: We cannot count on bracelets and other Bluetooth accessories or even Panic Button Apps on the mobile phone. In a real emergency, there will not be any time or presence of mind for fumbling or fiddling around trying to get things to work. Further, even low energy Bluetooth connections will end up sapping the mobile phone power not counting the reliability of the connection or the app.
Keeping the above issues in mind, we have made the Lifeboat to be the most convenient and easiest panic button functionality to use.

column6: > Why is the Lifeboat on Indiegogo?

column1: The Lifeboat is on Indiegogo not just to raise funds for production. The Lifeboat is here to earn your love and support to make it a reality.
We look at this Indiegogo platform as an amazing opportunity to interact with potential users from all around the world, learn from the early adopters and prove ourselves worthy of your trust.

column2: >The first designs and the prototype are already completed. The patents have been applied for.

column1: That's the final prototype above next to a standard matchbox to view in perspective.

column2: >The funds we raise in this campaign will go towards the following:

column1: Indiegogo offers convenient (for you) payment options only with flexible funding.

column2: >As you may understand, the funding limit on this Lifeboat campaign does not cover the entire cost of the production and the limit has been kept lower on purpose. More than just the funding, we are looking at the number of orders as a measure of popular acceptance.

column1: That aside, we will complete this project on our own regardless of the funding received.
We hope by now that you understand the Lifeboat is a labor of love for us.

We, Vajra InfraTech Pvt. Ltd., (http://www.vajrainfratech.com) are a company in the business of specialised B2B (Business to Business) IT solutions since 7 years. We have clients all over the world and our products are known in the logistics and fleet management sectors.

This may be our first foray in to the world of B2C (Consumer / Retail) electronics. But we are not new to the manufacturing process and are experienced in the area of GPS Vehicle and Asset Tracking hardware.

Honestly, the only risks we perceive at this stage are delays due to any holdups in the import of certain components and delays due to the certification process, especially the MFI approval (for the lightning connector option).

column6: >Manufacturing in Hyderabad, India, i.e., Home Base

column2: >Our strength is that the entire process is being undertaken at our home base from design to manufacturing to packaging. Thus, ensuring our total control on the manufacturing process which is familiar territory for us.

>Hyderabad, India is a fast-growing technology hub with some of the world's leading technology companies based here. We are happy to be in such a a vibrant hub for electronics manufacturing and ancillary activities and hence, we are absolutely confident of producing a quality product and delivering on time.
>We look forward to interacting with you through this Indiegogo campaign. Please also feel free to write to us at staysafe@lifeboat.today :-)

column1: Lifeboat: The Ultimate Mobile Phone Accessory
Mobility and Safety in one Cool Form Factor
Personalised Control with the Mobile App
The Lifeboat is a real solution born out of real needs. The need for enhanced mobility and the need for increased personal security.

Even though we use power banks, we often forget to charge the power bank apart from forgetting to carry it with us. Further, the higher the capacity of the power bank, the less we remember to keep it charged for use in time.
And, in the end, sometimes, all we need is a little bit of battery life to tell our families we are on the way home.
Lifeboat was created as a way to keep our loved ones secure.

We cannot count on bracelets and other Bluetooth accessories or even Panic Button Apps on the mobile phone. In a real emergency, there will not be any time or presence of mind for fumbling or fiddling around trying to get things to work. Further, even low energy Bluetooth connections will end up sapping the mobile phone power not counting the reliability of the connection or the app.
Keeping the above issues in mind, we have made the Lifeboat to be the most convenient and easiest panic button functionality to use.
Why is the Lifeboat on Indiegogo?
The Lifeboat is on Indiegogo not just to raise funds for production. The Lifeboat is here to earn your love and support to make it a reality.
We look at this Indiegogo platform as an amazing opportunity to interact with potential users from all around the world, learn from the early adopters and prove ourselves worthy of your trust.
How will the funds be utilised?
The first designs and the prototype are already completed. The patents have been applied for.
That's the final prototype above next to a standard matchbox to view in perspective.
The funds we raise in this campaign will go towards the following:
Indiegogo offers convenient (for you) payment options only with flexible funding.

As you may understand, the funding limit on this Lifeboat campaign does not cover the entire cost of the production and the limit has been kept lower on purpose. More than just the funding, we are looking at the number of orders as a measure of popular acceptance.
That aside, we will complete this project on our own regardless of the funding received.
We hope by now that you understand the Lifeboat is a labor of love for us.

We, Vajra InfraTech Pvt. Ltd., (http://www.vajrainfratech.com) are a company in the business of specialised B2B (Business to Business) IT solutions since 7 years. We have clients all over the world and our products are known in the logistics and fleet management sectors.

This may be our first foray in to the world of B2C (Consumer / Retail) electronics. But we are not new to the manufacturing process and are experienced in the area of GPS Vehicle and Asset Tracking hardware.

Honestly, the only risks we perceive at this stage are delays due to any holdups in the import of certain components and delays due to the certification process, especially the MFI approval (for the lightning connector option).
Manufacturing in Hyderabad, India, i.e., Home Base

Our strength is that the entire process is being undertaken at our home base from design to manufacturing to packaging. Thus, ensuring our total control on the manufacturing process which is familiar territory for us.

Hyderabad, India is a fast-growing technology hub with some of the world's leading technology companies based here. We are happy to be in such a a vibrant hub for electronics manufacturing and ancillary activities and hence, we are absolutely confident of producing a quality product and delivering on time.
We look forward to interacting with you through this Indiegogo campaign. Please also feel free to write to us at staysafe@lifeboat.today :-)

You've got a new personal assistant that helps you get things done more quickly and conveniently.  All you have to do is ask.

Control all of the connected devices in your office — with your voice, right from your desk.

column1:
Intuitive Control

Swipe up to go up. Swipe down to go down. It's that easy!
column11:
schema=youtube"" width=""580"">


Training Mode

The companion mobile apps will help you use a sit-to-stand desk the right way.  It rewards you for every time you complete a task, so standing is not only a healthier way to work but also a fun, positive and natural part of your day!

column1: Complete your desk with these gorgeous aluminum monitor arms — available in both Single and Dual.
• Matching colors with desk frame: Black, White, and Grey
• 2 easy setup options: clamp-on or bolt-through

How much weight can the desk hold?
360 pounds!

Why is there a $99 shipping fee?
The shipping reflects us shipping the 120 pound desk to anywhere in the continental US.

Why is there a $299 international shipping fee?
The shipping reflects us shipping the 120 pound desk to anywhere in the world.

What materials are used in ERGO?
Frame is made from high-grade industrial steel. Table top options are: engineered bamboo or wood (heavy duty MDF &
column2:
wood veneer).

How do I choose my table top and frame color?
We’ll send you an email with a link to our order management website after the campaign closes. The system will collect your shipping address and your preferred wood top &
column3:
frame color.

When will I receive my desk?
We'll start shipping in August 2015 through October 2015.

What is the minimum and maximum height of the table?
The minimum height is 24 inches and maximum height is 50 inches for the table.

Does the DIY Maker Kit include the memory pad?
Yes, it’s all included! The lift motors and memory pads.

Is there a shipping discount if I buy multiple units?
Unfortunately no, the units are 120 pounds each and ship individually, the shipping reflects the price of each unit.

Do you offer other options for the power cord (i.e. 220V)?
Yes, whatever country you’re in, we’ll send the correct power cord for you.

How long is the power cord to the Autonomous desk?
The power cord is 10ft long.

column1: Sitting for long periods has its own health risks.  ERGO is designed to to fix this problem.
• What are the risks of sitting too much?
• Too much sitting raises risk of death, even if you exercise
• The health hazards of sitting
• Sitting: The Most Unhealthy Thing You Do
ERGO is almost complete. All desks shown on our crowd-funding campaigns and in the product video were built on our production line.

1. Inventory risk: While we're already producing 600 desks, we don't know yet what the interest level from our backers is yet. Throughout the campaign, we'll monitor the number of orders closely and adjust our production as quickly as possible.

2. Supply chain risk: While we're confident that we have everything under control, component delays and unexpected shortages can occur. If this happens, we’ll be sure to keep you informed and work to quickly solve the problem.

3. International shipping: We'd love to send ERGO all over the world, but shipping this 120-lb desk is pricey. When shipping to certain countries or areas, it could cost substantially more than what we anticipated. When this happens, if the cost difference is high, we'll need your help to pay additional shipping.

1. Inventory risk: While we're already producing 600 desks, we don't know yet what the interest level from our backers is yet. Throughout the campaign, we'll monitor the number of orders closely and adjust our production as quickly as possible.

2. Supply chain risk: While we're confident that we have everything under control, component delays and unexpected shortages can occur. If this happens, we’ll be sure to keep you informed and work to quickly solve the problem.

3. International shipping: We'd love to send ERGO all over the world, but shipping this 120-lb desk is pricey. When shipping to certain countries or areas, it could cost substantially more than what we anticipated. When this happens, if the cost difference is high, we'll need your help to pay additional shipping.",42.0,7,"6 Campaigns

column3: >Buoy Tags will help you mark your territory.

>As a longtime user, I'm thrilled with Apple's ongoing success, but with that success comes common ownership of the infamous white headphones and chargers. Without a way to tell them apart, people often lose them, fight over them or resort to an untidy solution such as permanent marker to keep track of them.

column2: >We've done all the legwork here. All the prototyping, research and tooling are in the bag. What we need now is your help bringing Buoy Tags to the masses by getting a larger order in with our manufacturer.

>When you decide to back our project at the $10 level and above, you will receive the corresponding number of Buoy Tags 3 packs for the perk you choose. The more you buy, the more opportunity you have to save off the $12 retail unit price. Each pack contains the following:
>3 tags specifically sized for Apple earbuds, magsafe adapter and iPhone/iPad charger
>Pre-cut printed inserts with letters, colors and symbols for customization

column3: >If you love the clean, effective solution Buoy Tags affords and you're tired of dealing with the task of sorting through the piles of white cables in your life—share, share, share
column4: >. Tell your friends. Tell your family. Thanks so much for your support.

column2: >Q: How do I customize my Buoy Tags?

>A: There are inserts printed with letters, colors and symbols included inside the packaging for quick easy customizing. If you'd like to go a step farther, our website has downloadable templates available in Word, Photoshop and Illustrator format.
>Q: Will Buoy Tags fit the new lightning charger?
>Q: Will Buoy Tags affect the way I wind up my cables or get in the way?

>A: Not at all. They're designed to be small and unobtrusive, yet obvious enough to be seen. I've used them on my cables daily since we finished our first prototype last year and couldn't be without them.
>Q: Do Buoy Tags fit Android cables or other chargers?

>A: Buoy Tags were designed to fit the diameter of Apples basic three. That said, there are a lot of other cables roughly the same size. You're welcome to give it a shot with other cables, but we can't guarantee anything.
>Q: Are you guys going to get these to us for Christmas?
>A: That's the plan. We're gonna do everything in our power and have no reason to doubt you'll have your orders by Christmas with time to spare. Yay!

column1: ","Buoy Tags will help you mark your territory.

As a longtime user, I'm thrilled with Apple's ongoing success, but with that success comes common ownership of the infamous white headphones and chargers. Without a way to tell them apart, people often lose them, fight over them or resort to an untidy solution such as permanent marker to keep track of them.

We've done all the legwork here. All the prototyping, research and tooling are in the bag. What we need now is your help bringing Buoy Tags to the masses by getting a larger order in with our manufacturer.

When you decide to back our project at the $10 level and above, you will receive the corresponding number of Buoy Tags 3 packs for the perk you choose. The more you buy, the more opportunity you have to save off the $12 retail unit price. Each pack contains the following:
3 tags specifically sized for Apple earbuds, magsafe adapter and iPhone/iPad charger
Pre-cut printed inserts with letters, colors and symbols for customization

If you love the clean, effective solution Buoy Tags affords and you're tired of dealing with the task of sorting through the piles of white cables in your life—share, share, share. Tell your friends. Tell your family. Thanks so much for your support.
Q: How do I customize my Buoy Tags?

A: There are inserts printed with letters, colors and symbols included inside the packaging for quick easy customizing. If you'd like to go a step farther, our website has downloadable templates available in Word, Photoshop and Illustrator format.
Q: Will Buoy Tags fit the new lightning charger?
A: Yup. Quite nicely in fact.
Q: Will Buoy Tags affect the way I wind up my cables or get in the way?

A: Not at all. They're designed to be small and unobtrusive, yet obvious enough to be seen. I've used them on my cables daily since we finished our first prototype last year and couldn't be without them.
Q: Do Buoy Tags fit Android cables or other chargers?

A: Buoy Tags were designed to fit the diameter of Apples basic three. That said, there are a lot of other cables roughly the same size. You're welcome to give it a shot with other cables, but we can't guarantee anything.
Q: Are you guys going to get these to us for Christmas?
A: That's the plan. We're gonna do everything in our power and have no reason to doubt you'll have your orders by Christmas with time to spare. Yay!",12.0,0,"1 Campaign

About qutebrowser and this campaign
The campaign has now ended. If you missed it and still want shirts or stickers, please contact me, I might still have some left.
The development will start on 6th of May, and I set up a development blog where I'll blog daily-ish updates.
My name is Florian Bruhin, also known as The Compiler. I am the main developer of qutebrowser, a web browser with a keyboard-focused user interface inspired by the vim editor.

qutebrowser is a very active project with a big community: More than 60 people have contributed over 250 changesets (pull requests), and hundreds of people are actively using it. In the past 2.5 years, nearly 7500 changes (commits) were uploaded.
It is currently based on the QtWebKit rendering engine which is getting dated and has various issues, described in more detail below.

With this campaign, I hope being able to work full-time for a month (or more!) on qutebrowser. The goal is to add support for the newer QtWebEngine backend, which is based on the Chromium project (like Google's Chrome browser).

This will make qutebrowser fit for the modern web and solve dozens of existing issues. In addition, it will bring lots of overall security, stability and performance improvements compared to the current QtWebKit backend.
QtWebEngine enforces HTTP Strict Transport Security, which ensures HTTPS is used on websites that support it, protecting you from downgrade attacks.
The current backend also has other known security issues that are fixed in QtWebEngine, which is updated much more regularly.

There are various qutebrowser stability issues for which QtWebKit is to blame. With QtWebEngine, all those problems will be gone, and so will be crashes experienced by many users on Twitter or Facebook.

QtWebKit got removed in Qt 5.6. While most Linux distributions will keep it around for a while, some are expected to drop it (or have already done so). This means qutebrowser will not run on those platforms anymore. With QtWebEngine, qutebrowser will be ready for the future, as QtWebEngine is very actively developed and will probably be so for years to come.
I plan to keep QtWebKit support for the time being, as some Linux distributions (Debian/Ubuntu) don't package QtWebEngine as of yet.
Since the qutebrowser code will work with two different engines, it'll be easier to add support for additional backends. I'll definitely keep an eye on Mozilla's Servo for the future.

Goal

My goal is to raise 3000€ to work on QtWebEngine support in qutebrowser full-time for a month.
Depending on where you live, this probably sounds like a lot of money.
Living in Switzerland is rather expensive, and what
column2: >you'd probably consider quite a good salary is really modest here.

column2: >believe are a quite reasonable combination of various sources), that amount

column1: If I raise less or more money, I'll be able to work full-time on qutebrowser for a shorter or longer period of time, up to around 2.5 months.
• 3000 EUR is my goal, which means I'll be able to work 4 weeks (20 days) full-time on qutebrowser.
• If I only raise 1500 EUR, I'll be able to dedicate 2 weeks to qutebrowser
• If I raise 6000 EUR, I can work on qutebrowser for a full two months!

I'll also need to find a good trade-off between the (extra) money raised and the quality of stickers/t-shirts I can purchase. They become a lot cheaper in higher quantities - and if there is some extra money, I might choose to invest it in better t-shirts/stickers rather than working a day or two more.

For any pledge level starting with €5, you'll be listed in a ""backers"" file which will be linked from the README.
For €20 and above, you'll get 5 qutebrowser stickers to stick to your laptop, or anywhere else!
For €60 and above, you'll get a qutebrowser t-shirt as well as 5 stickers. The t-shirt will be black or dark blue.
Both the t-shirt and the stickers will have the the qutebrowser logo on them, as well as ""qutebrowser.org"" and maybe its slogan, ""a vim-like browser"".

column4: >, you'll sponsor a whole day of qutebrowser development, and you'll get a t-shirt and stickers as well. I'll organize a WebRTC/Google Hangout session with you (or IRC/mail if you prefer), to talk about what you like/dislike about qutebrowser, or anything else you'd like to talk about. You'll also be listed as a day sponsor in the backers file, optionally with an URL of your choice.

column1:
For €300, you'll also get a WebRTC/Hangouts session (or IRC/mail if you prefer), and I'll talk to you about what qutebrowser issue is bugging you the most. I'll then (within reason) prioriti[zs]e that issue, and try to fix it as soon as possible after QtWebEngine support is implemented. Of course, you'll also get a t-shirt and stickers. You'll also be listed as a gold sponsor in the backers file, optionally with an URL of your choice.

For the stickers and t-shirts, a small shipping fee is added (except for the €150/€300 perks). I can ship the stickers for 2€ worldwide. Shipping for the t-shirt is 5€ within the EU and 10€ worldwide, to be sure I can cover my costs.

I'll also keep a public development blog, with the goal of posting an update with the current state and what I've worked on every 1-2 days.

QtWebEngine support will be a lot of work, and a lot could possibly take more time than I estimate. I hope to get the biggest chunk out of the way, but it's certainly possible not everything listed in the issue will be implemented after the month. I'll of course continue to work on qutebrowser (like I am already) in my free time after the campaign, focusing on getting QtWebEngine up to speed!

I've never printed and shipped t-shirts or stickers on this scale before, so I'll probably need some time to find a company which I can trust to provide a good quality. This is why the estimated shipping date is set to August, to ensure I have plenty of time to ensure neither you nor I am getting ripped off.

I'll probably have time from June to mid-September to work on qutebrowser, but I'll also have some other obligations (like the python testing sprint, from which qutebrowser will indirectly benefit too). This means there might be some small breaks in between. I'm confident I can make room for 1-3 months of development time (starting in June/July/August) without any issues though.

If the total amount raised is significantly more than 9000€, I'll work on qutebrowser 3 months this late summer and use the rest of the money to work on qutebrowser full-time during my university semester break next year.

Please spread the word about this campaign, e.g. on Twitter, Reddit, Hacker News, or wherever you think it'd fit in without annoying people!
Short link: https://igg.me/at/qutebrowser

Short Summary

 K so I found out some guy got 55k for a damn potato salad (fuck me right?) so I was thinking hey would be pretty awesome if I could get some help building my dream car! I have a 99 civic LX that I want to be built into a awesome machine!

What We Need &
column2:
What You Get

Break it down:

  • I need money to help with my engine build and suspension,need a h22a engine swap,tranny,control arms,turbo,ecu,susoension,sway bars,paint,hood scoop,body kit ect.
  • If I get a donation over $2000 I will personaly drive to you (in north America) and take you for a rip! smaller donaters will get my autograph ( YAY!) on a piece of the car left over from the build! (Woooo!)
