column4: >a device that will make you go ‘Why aren’t we funding this already?’
>let your car talk back to you through Fuel Book

column1: BackerJack -    ""Fuel Book piles on the features to make your car a smarter ride""
IndianWeb2 -    ""traffic is the biggest dread of a driver and this tiny device makes sure that its users don’t have to face this dread anymore""
Atmel -    ""a plug-and-play device that can transform any ‘dumb’ vehicle into a smarter ride""
Times of India -    ""gadgets make car owners smarter""
YourStory -    ""we're asking what a car really is for the first time in generations""

Fuel Book comprises of a self-installable plug and play device and an app (Android, iOS and Windows phone) which together creates a Smart environment through the diagnostic port of the car (which can be found using the Fuel Book app). Once you connect the Fuel Book device to the car, launch the App and connect (through Bluetooth) to the device to open a new world of possibilities with your car such as Fuel Analysis, Diagnostics, Tag, Accident Prevention, Locating your car, Finding you a parking location, Opening of Doors/Trunk, Even starting your cars Engine all from a tap on your phone !

Did you miss the Indiegogo Campaign?

Not to worry! Go to http://www.myfuelbook.com and enlist yourself in the pre-order queue.

Thank you,
The Fuel Book Team

Smart Environment with Apps:

We found Fuel Book to have a greater potential, hence have launched an open SDK and App store for developers to create Fuel Book powered App’s and Accessories (imagine a rear view camera which also acts like a security cam).

column4: >Here are some of the features (Fuel Book Apps as we like to call it) which are readily available with Fuel Book and also provides visual data to the HUD.

column1: Fuel Book will let you know at which point you'll run out of fuel based on your car's status and also display nearby ATM's and Fuel Stations (Gas Stations) before you run dry. It also sends a notification to your smart watch (tested with Android Wear and Pebble) so you can always stay updated. Fuel Book also add's new Fuel Stations into the map, e.g.
column2: a person has filled up at a fuel station not available in the map, due to the rise in Fuel, fuel book knows you've filled up and prompts you to rate the Fuel station experience.

column1: Through Fuel Book's self-diagnostics feature users can diagnose their car and look into what's the problem such an exhaust clog, type of engine trouble, etc. It also provides the ability to generate a approx. cost evaluation for solving the problem if any exists.
You can easily create custom dashboards and share it with the Fuel Book community or download hundred's from the Fuel Book App store to add life to that plain old needle in your car.
The Tag feature is targeted towards those travelling in groups so that you can know whether they are ahead or trailing behind.

The Fuel Book black box is like an aeroplanes black box. If you ever meet with an accident you can utilise Fuel Book as an alibi as it records your driving speed, gear shifts and break's every second. It also notifies the registered emergency number along with the GPS coordinate through an SMS or another Fuel Book user if your in the tag mode.

Wanted to take a path but not sure how the road is going to turn out ! Well with the Social Terrain Mapping of Fuel Book, all road bumps and speed breakers are stored through the experience of other Fuel Book users who had travelled previously through the same route. The Fuel Book notifies the driver to slow down when the Bump/Speed breaker is near and makes a noise if the user travels at a speed of 60 during night time.

With Smart Horn you can now know what's the hold-up on the Traffic Jam by sending a message to the user in the front asking what's the holdup. We're targeting smart horn at the hospital segment by equipping Fuel Book's in Ambulances to notify users in the path taken by the Ambulances to make way.

The AI Engine is a backend driver analysis feature which runs silently in the Fuel Book’s background and sends user driving characteristics data to our 128bit encrypted cloud storage. In a layman’s perspective Fuel Book will know based on the driving data weather you will make a turn to the left or the right, or at what point in time you will accelerate and hit the brake.
By using the data, our AI engine analysis Fuel Book powered vehicles coming your way or near you  provides a Smart caution notification if it senses trouble.
Fuel Book’s AI Engine saves lives. We've completed beta tests with cab drivers and are now ready for a full launch.

column5: >Parked your car in a massively huge parking lot and have no clue where it is? well with Fuel Book you can utilize the park track feature to pin point the exact location of where you parked last and also the history of parks so that you can always go back if you had lost something along the way. Park Track also has an option to Publish your parking space along with attributes to know if it’s a Free parking space or not (with the cost) so that another user searching for a parking space can easily find the way.

column1: Haven't you always wanted to challenge your neighbor based on your driving skills, mileage, location discovery, etc. Well with Fuel Book you can do that and so much more by even utilizing these points for Fuel Book store purchases and earning badges along the way.
Fuel Book SDK's and Fuel Book powered Accessories:
What we as a team have done is just the start, were inviting Developers and Hardware enthusiasts to develop and build Fuel Book App's and Accessories so that the possibilities are endless.
You can even unlock/start the engine/open the boot of your car with a knock on your phone or Smart Watch!

Fuel Book can receive simple alerts and notifications from if this then that (ifttt.com) or our web based RESTful endpoint. More adventurous developers can use the Fuel Book SDK and Hardware API, with its Arduino-like abstractions and simple C structure, to gain complete control of the car.
With the HUD, you can save battery on your smart phone and keep your eyes on the road all the time.

• During our testing we found certain cars have the diagnostics port enclosed behind a cover and it was even harder to get the GPS Lock hence we've placed the GPS on the HUD rather than the Fuel Book device since the GPS Lock time is 15 x Faster
• The HUD will also save your phone's battery by not using the phone's inbuilt GPS and using the ping location provided by the HUD
• You can custom design the HUDs appearance with the Fuel Book App and place the Apps whose notifications you wish to see
<li>The HUDs Smart Assistant will respond to when asked with the hot word ""Fuel Book"", e.g
column2: ""Fuel Book"" ""Where Am I"" (or) ""Nearest hotels in the area""

column1: • The colorful ePaper display with ambient sensor allows the HUD to be the brightest at any given time of the day

• Boosted with a 2000 mAh battery the HUD is capable of providing 5 continuous days of vigorous usage and up to 10+ days on casual usage and with the solar cells in place you ca have a tangle free experience on drive.
• The Smart Sensor automatically turns the HUD on only when the Car is started
• You needn't be connected to the Fuel Book device for displaying device data such as Speed, Fuel Status and Diagnostics
• RAM (128 Kilobyte memory) | 102 kilobyte OS | 26 kilobyte sensor data (7 days Sensor Data Store)

• iPhone 3GS, 4, 4S, 5, 5S, 5C and 6 running iOS 5 + or any iPod Touch with iOS 5+.
  • Android devices running OS 2.3 and up. We tested ours with Android Lollipop (5.0)
  • ‎Windows Phone 8.1 +

column2: Android wear devices (Apple watch app development in progress)

column1:
Current Status 

The Fuel Book device which you see in the video is a real, working prototype.
With your support, we can power cars worldwide with Fuel Book. While we're close to entering production, your contribution will help fund:
Q. I have an idea for a Fuel Book App can you make it ?
• Sure, leave it in the comments section and we'll take things forward and provide you the credits in the App store for the feature idea.
Q. Do I need batteries for the device ?
• No you do not require any batteries.
Q. Is my car compatible with Fuel Book ?

• Fuel Book works with all cars sold in US since 1996 and in India since 2002 and with Fuel Book's port finder, you will always know where to find the diagnostics. If your still unsure, leave us a comment and we'll get back.
• We haven't looked at developing for Blackberry but if you have an OS in mind, do comment it and we'll let you know.
Q. Does it have an inbuilt Sim card slot ?
• No. It uses your phone's data service to perform cloud based analysis
Q. Can I disable any feature of Fuel Book ?

• All Fuel Book features are in the form of an App in the Fuel Book store, features which you dont like can be uninstalled as per your wish except Diagnostics, Rewards Points, Fuel Analysis and Dashboard
Q. Can Fuel Book store my Car service history and provide me with a notification when the service date is near ?
• Fuel Book's car management allows you track services, diagnostics logs and also notifies you when your service dates are near.

column2: >Our journey to Fuel Book was covered by Chennai Live 104.8 FM do listen to it and leave a comment if you have more queries about us.

column3: >Q. Why do we need the funds ?

column2: >Today Fuel Book has completed its prototype and we require the funds for Production Tooling, Bluetooth certification and large scale production, hence we've opted for crowd funding, for we want to build the product from the ground up with you.","We've been Hunted (Product Hunt) -   www.producthunt.com/posts/fuelbook

column1: CryBytes  -   ""a device that will make you go ‘Why aren’t we funding this already?’""
Chennai Live 104.8 FM  -   ""let your car talk back to you through Fuel Book""
BackerJack -    ""Fuel Book piles on the features to make your car a smarter ride""
IndianWeb2 -    ""traffic is the biggest dread of a driver and this tiny device makes sure that its users don’t have to face this dread anymore""
Atmel -    ""a plug-and-play device that can transform any ‘dumb’ vehicle into a smarter ride""
Times of India -    ""gadgets make car owners smarter""
YourStory -    ""we're asking what a car really is for the first time in generations""

Fuel Book comprises of a self-installable plug and play device and an app (Android, iOS and Windows phone) which together creates a Smart environment through the diagnostic port of the car (which can be found using the Fuel Book app). Once you connect the Fuel Book device to the car, launch the App and connect (through Bluetooth) to the device to open a new world of possibilities with your car such as Fuel Analysis, Diagnostics, Tag, Accident Prevention, Locating your car, Finding you a parking location, Opening of Doors/Trunk, Even starting your cars Engine all from a tap on your phone !
Did you miss the Indiegogo Campaign?Not to worry! Go to http://www.myfuelbook.com and enlist yourself in the pre-order queue.Thank you,The Fuel Book TeamSmart Environment with Apps:

We are excited to introduce the Avanca D1 Switch Headset: the first wireless sports headset that matches with any outfit. It's ultra-light, it's highly flexible and it's equipped with the best technology available to keep you going during a workout. Best of all, it has a unique color system so you can adapt the headphones to your style.
column5: >
column8: >Need a reason to get the D1 Switch? We give you 10!

column2: >Bloggers love our headset

column1: Our team has a combined experience of more than 60 years in product design, innovation, marketing and sales and we've partnered up with the finest engineers to create the D1 Switch Headset.

column6: schema=sketchfab"" width=""100%"">

column1:
With a weight of approximately 3 match-boxes and an extremely flexible design, our headset offers 100% freedom of movement. You easily adjust the headset to the shape of your head and ears. 

You will not be bothered by a headset that slips off your head all the time or tangled cables getting in your way. Whether you are running, working on your burpees, practicing yoga or riding a bike, the D1 Switch is your ultimate workout buddy.


The stylish in-ear earbuds are carefully designed to rest comfortably inside your ears and to maximize the sound output. The headset comes with 3 different sizes of earbuds, so you can make it fit exactly to your needs.
column2: >
column3: >First-class sound experience
column6: >The Avanca D1 Switch Headset isn't only the coolest, lightest and most versatile sports headset, it also offers you the best audio experience possible. Our headphones are equipped with state-of-the-art technology. An ultra-broad frequency reach and the finest speaker driver give you the warm, deep and full sound experience you need to keep you going during a workout. We know an excellent bass beat is key during a run, bootcamp or heavy workout, so we partnered with top sound quality engineers to create the perfect sound. The D1 Switch is the best buddy for your bass-loving ears.
column9:
>We included the last generation Bluetooth® 4.0 BlueCore® CSR 8645™ with aptX®. A Bluetooth® connection is a bit like a data pipeline between your device and the D1 Switch Headset. This pipeline has a maximum width, so it can sometimes be difficult to flow large audio files through it. The aptX® technology solves the problem by reducing the size of the audio files so they can be squeezed through the wireless pipeline, but without affecting the sound quality. 

The perfect fit and 3 in-ear tips of the D1 Switch create passive noise cancelation. Sounds of traffic and voices will be reduced to a minimum, giving you an optimal balance of the best sound experience and awareness of what's going on around you.

Nothing kills a workout more than a low battery. The D1 Switch Headset offers up to 6 hours of non-stop music and audio coaching. Even during a marathon training run or a killer workout you will be accompanied by your favorite songs and audio coaching. The maximum talk time is 8 hours. When the battery is low, simply use the included Micro USB cable to charge the battery within 1-2 hours.

column2:
>Compatible with all Bluetooth devices

Our headset can be used with any Bluetooth device. Connect your smartphone, tablet or MP3-player in less than 20 seconds. You don’t need any additional software. The Bluetooth 4.0 BlueCore® CSR 8645™ chip enables a stable and safe connection.

If your device supports Near Field Communication (NFC), things get even better, as the D1 Switch can be connected using NFC as well. Please note that the D1 Fixed versions (without switchable covers) do not support NFC as they are equipped with a CSR 8645™ chip. You'll need to use Bluetooth in order to connect your smartphone or tablet.

The D1 Switch Headset remembers your connected device(s), so the next time you start to workout you will be ready to go in a few seconds. With a wireless reach of 10 meters / 33 feet you don’t have to worry about a deteriorating sound experience.

column4: >The D1 Switch Headset is extremely easy to operate. We've integrated two control panels. One to control the volume and a second one to forward or rewind songs. By separating the volume control from the song control, you don't have to worry anymore about accidently moving forward to the next song, when you were actually looking to pump up the volume.
column11: >The headset automatically switches from music to call mode when someone is trying to reach you. Using the single touch control you can answer incoming phone calls without taking off your headphones.
column14: > Encryption keeps your calls completely safe and the high-quality microphone
column17: >enables you to speak at a normal volume. No need to scream or talk into your phone like a walkie-talkie!

column2: >Switchable Colors for Ultimate Freedom of Expression

column1: The Avanca D1 Switch Headset is the world’s first wireless sports headset that adapts to your style in every way you can imagine. Match your headset to your outfit by simply swapping the covers of the headset.

Whether you want a stylish soft color or a glamorous golden look: anything is possible with the D1 Switch Headset. We offer a variety of 19 colors as a kick-off here on Indiegogo, but we promise you we will add many more colors if you decide to back us and we reach our funding goal.

The idea for the D1 Switch Headset was born after we talked with sport bloggers and fans of Avanca about our D1 Sports Headset, our wildly popular headset with fixed covers, also available on Indiegogo (and ready for immediate shipment). We realized the days you are going for a run in your old baggy sweatpants are over. The D1 Switch Headset offers a perfect solution to those who want to be fashionable and sporty at the same time!

column12:
>

The Avanca D1 Switch Headset is ideal for outdoor and sports activities in any weather condition. The IPx5-rating protects the ear buds from dust, rain and heavy sweating. The flexibility of the headset makes it easy to fold and store in your bag or pocket. We will include a free carrying pouch with any perk.

column4: >Designing the world’s most fashionable sports headset isn’t a one man show. It’s a team effort. That’s why we reach out to you on Indiegogo to help us make the next move. Support our project so we can finalize the design of the D1 Switch Headset. In return, you'll get a discount of at least 35% off the future retail price. We've created 4 great D1 Switch perks to choose from. Claim yours and be part of this exciting project.

>Can't wait until April 2016? Get one of the D1 Fixed Headset perks (without switchable covers), ready for immediate shipment. Note the Fixed versions are really fixed and are not compatible with the color system. You can claim as many perks as you want.

>Tim, our founder and CEO quit his job in 2008 to pursue his dream: to create and sell innovative products with a stunning design and excellent performance. All our products share one feature that is the driving force behind everything we do: they are functional innovations.

>A passion for Brazil inspired Tim to name the brand Avanca, derived from the Portuguese word ‘avançar’ which means ‘moving forward’. He asked Nathalie, our marketing director, to join him. They started from Tim's living room and moved to a 14 metre / 150 square feet office a couple of months later. In 2016, our team will pack moving boxes for the 5th time. Our company grows each day, but we strongly hold on to the spirit and vibe we had back then in that living room.
>In the past 7 years
column7: > we expanded our business to over 60 countries and successfully introduced dozens of products. These products aren't something we create on our own. Customer and blogger feedback and review panels have always been our focus.

column4: >With this Indiegogo campaign we take our customer focus to the next level. We love to hear your ideas and thoughts. If you have any questions or comments, drop us a message at indiegogo@avanca.nl or use the comment section!

column7: >Jan Paul Hagg,

column1: Sjoerd de Ridder, Product Designer
Wouter Vellekoop, Product Designer
Nadine Zwartepoorte, Brand marketer

column4: >  Jesper Baumgarten, Brand marketer

column1: When will the Avanca D1 Switch headset be ready for shipment?
In April 2016. Our goal is to ship all the Avanca D1 Switch headsets to contributors before Spring 2016, just in time for the running season.
Every Avanca D1 Switch headset comes with a Micro-USB charging cable for the rechargeable battery.

The package includes a carrying pouch to store your headset safe. The pouch is also easy to carry the Avanca D1 Switch with you anytime and anywhere you go. The Avanca D1 Switch headset comes with three sizes of in-ear tips, so you an make it fit exactly to your needs. And last but not least, you’ll find a variety of colored caps of your color-set choice in the box.  See the perks to find out which color-sets are available.
Do I need to add shipping costs to my contribution?
We’ve automatically added shipping costs for shipping all over the world.
You’ll receive two years extended warranty on the Avanca D1 Switch headset.
Any plans for an upgraded version with more colors, or any stretch goals in mind?
Yes, definitely! Please keep an eye on your inbox, as we’ll send out surveys to know which color you think is missing, and we might produce it in the future.
What will the price be when the funding is over?
It depends on the perk you claim. The FULL version (with all 19 colors included) will have a future retail price of 239 dollars, so you get a stunning 90 dollar discount.
What types of mobile devices will Avanca D1 Switch headset work with?

The Avanca D1 Switch headset can be used with any Bluetooth device, including iPhone and smartphones of Samsung, Sony, HTC, Huawei, LG, etc. Connect your smartphone, tablet or MP3-player in less than 30 seconds. You don’t need to install any additional software.
Is the Avanca D1 Switch headset weatherproof?

Yes, the Avanca D1 Switch Headset is all weather proof, you can use it when it’s raining without any problem. The IPx5 rating protects the headphones against rain and heavy sweating. Note the D1 Switch Headset is
column4: > not waterproof, so unfortunately cannot be used for swimming or surfing.

column1: How long will the Avanca D1 Switch headset battery last?

The D1 Switch Headset offers up to 6 hours of non-stop music and audio coaching. Even during a marathon training run or a killer workout you will be accompanied by your favorite songs and audio coaching. The maximum talk time is 8 hours.
How do I charge the Avanca D1 Switch headset?

Each Avanca D1 Switch headset is shipped with a standard micro-USB charging cable. You simply plug your headset into an USB port on your computer or wall outlet (note a USB adapter is not included) to fully charge the Avanca D1 Switch headset in less than two hours.
What's the wireless range of Avanca D1 Switch headset?
The Avanca D1 Switch headset offers a reliable connectivity within a wireless range of 33 ft. (10m.).

With a combined experience of more than 60 years in innovation, product design and marketing, we are confident the Avanca D1 Switch Headset will be ready in Spring 2016. Please note that, as with any crowdfunding project, the delivery timeline of the product may be changed. There is no risk for the D1 fixed black and white editions, as they are already designed, produced and ready for shipment.

The D1 Switch Headset is extremely easy to operate. We've integrated two control panels. One to control the volume and a second one to forward or rewind songs. By separating the volume control from the song control, you don't have to worry anymore about accidently moving forward to the next song, when you were actually looking to pump up the volume.Built-in mic for callsThe headset automatically switches from music to call mode when someone is trying to reach you. Using the single touch control you can answer incoming phone calls without taking off your headphones. Encryption keeps your calls completely safe and the high-quality microphone enables you to speak at a normal volume. No need to scream or talk into your phone like a walkie-talkie!
Switchable Colors for Ultimate Freedom of Expression

The Avanca D1 Switch Headset is the world’s first wireless sports headset that adapts to your style in every way you can imagine. Match your headset to your outfit by simply swapping the covers of the headset.

Whether you want a stylish soft color or a glamorous golden look: anything is possible with the D1 Switch Headset. We offer a variety of 19 colors as a kick-off here on Indiegogo, but we promise you we will add many more colors if you decide to back us and we reach our funding goal.

The idea for the D1 Switch Headset was born after we talked with sport bloggers and fans of Avanca about our D1 Sports Headset, our wildly popular headset with fixed covers, also available on Indiegogo (and ready for immediate shipment). We realized the days you are going for a run in your old baggy sweatpants are over. The D1 Switch Headset offers a perfect solution to those who want to be fashionable and sporty at the same time!

Weather-proof. Sweat-proof. Excuse-proof.The Avanca D1 Switch Headset is ideal for outdoor and sports activities in any weather condition. The IPx5-rating protects the ear buds from dust, rain and heavy sweating. The flexibility of the headset makes it easy to fold and store in your bag or pocket. We will include a free carrying pouch with any perk.

Designing the world’s most fashionable sports headset isn’t a one man show. It’s a team effort. That’s why we reach out to you on Indiegogo to help us make the next move. Support our project so we can finalize the design of the D1 Switch Headset. In return, you'll get a discount of at least 35% off the future retail price. We've created 4 great D1 Switch perks to choose from. Claim yours and be part of this exciting project.

Can't wait until April 2016? Get one of the D1 Fixed Headset perks (without switchable covers), ready for immediate shipment. Note the Fixed versions are really fixed and are not compatible with the color system. You can claim as many perks as you want.

Tim, our founder and CEO quit his job in 2008 to pursue his dream: to create and sell innovative products with a stunning design and excellent performance. All our products share one feature that is the driving force behind everything we do: they are functional innovations.

A passion for Brazil inspired Tim to name the brand Avanca, derived from the Portuguese word ‘avançar’ which means ‘moving forward’. He asked Nathalie, our marketing director, to join him. They started from Tim's living room and moved to a 14 metre / 150 square feet office a couple of months later. In 2016, our team will pack moving boxes for the 5th time. Our company grows each day, but we strongly hold on to the spirit and vibe we had back then in that living room.

In the past 7 years we expanded our business to over 60 countries and successfully introduced dozens of products. These products aren't something we create on our own. Customer and blogger feedback and review panels have always been our focus.

With this Indiegogo campaign we take our customer focus to the next level. We love to hear your ideas and thoughts. If you have any questions or comments, drop us a message at indiegogo@avanca.nl or use the comment section!
Tim Haaksma, Founder & Owner of Avanca
When will the Avanca D1 Switch headset be ready for shipment?
In April 2016. Our goal is to ship all the Avanca D1 Switch headsets to contributors before Spring 2016, just in time for the running season.
Every Avanca D1 Switch headset comes with a Micro-USB charging cable for the rechargeable battery.

The package includes a carrying pouch to store your headset safe. The pouch is also easy to carry the Avanca D1 Switch with you anytime and anywhere you go. The Avanca D1 Switch headset comes with three sizes of in-ear tips, so you an make it fit exactly to your needs. And last but not least, you’ll find a variety of colored caps of your color-set choice in the box.  See the perks to find out which color-sets are available.
Do I need to add shipping costs to my contribution?
We’ve automatically added shipping costs for shipping all over the world.
How about the warranty and support?
You’ll receive two years extended warranty on the Avanca D1 Switch headset.
Any plans for an upgraded version with more colors, or any stretch goals in mind?
Yes, definitely! Please keep an eye on your inbox, as we’ll send out surveys to know which color you think is missing, and we might produce it in the future.
What will the price be when the funding is over?
It depends on the perk you claim. The FULL version (with all 19 colors included) will have a future retail price of 239 dollars, so you get a stunning 90 dollar discount.
What types of mobile devices will Avanca D1 Switch headset work with?

The Avanca D1 Switch headset can be used with any Bluetooth device, including iPhone and smartphones of Samsung, Sony, HTC, Huawei, LG, etc. Connect your smartphone, tablet or MP3-player in less than 30 seconds. You don’t need to install any additional software.
Is the Avanca D1 Switch headset weatherproof?

Yes, the Avanca D1 Switch Headset is all weather proof, you can use it when it’s raining without any problem. The IPx5 rating protects the headphones against rain and heavy sweating. Note the D1 Switch Headset is not waterproof, so unfortunately cannot be used for swimming or surfing.
How long will the Avanca D1 Switch headset battery last?

The D1 Switch Headset offers up to 6 hours of non-stop music and audio coaching. Even during a marathon training run or a killer workout you will be accompanied by your favorite songs and audio coaching. The maximum talk time is 8 hours.
How do I charge the Avanca D1 Switch headset?

Each Avanca D1 Switch headset is shipped with a standard micro-USB charging cable. You simply plug your headset into an USB port on your computer or wall outlet (note a USB adapter is not included) to fully charge the Avanca D1 Switch headset in less than two hours.
What's the wireless range of Avanca D1 Switch headset?
The Avanca D1 Switch headset offers a reliable connectivity within a wireless range of 33 ft. (10m.).

With a combined experience of more than 60 years in innovation, product design and marketing, we are confident the Avanca D1 Switch Headset will be ready in Spring 2016. Please note that, as with any crowdfunding project, the delivery timeline of the product may be changed. There is no risk for the D1 fixed black and white editions, as they are already designed, produced and ready for shipment.",42.0,1,"1 Campaign
We have started shipping out our fulfilment packages for our Indiegogo Combo Pack contributors.
We really appreciate your help in making our Silverline Care Pack a reality. Do send us photos of your seniors enjoying our Silverline Care Pack on your mobiles!
Look out for more details on our Android release at our site http://silverline.mobi and reach out to us at hello@silverline.mobi!

Wonderful news! It is with great joy that we announce the release of
our Silverline Care Pack in the iOS App store.

It has been hard work and we have been successful with some things more
than others. Thank you for staying with us through our hard and good
times. Our Silverline Care Pack will not have been a reality had it been
without your support, financially and otherwise.

A. Our team is now hard at work on the Android release, which we hope
to release in December. Check http://silverline.mobi/ for details.

B. We are working on how our app could be used with connected sensors to
enhance the lifestyles of our seniors.

C. Now that our iOS app is finally ready, we will be moving on to fulfilling
our promises and delivering phones to our combo pack supporters. Contributors should be able to see their names in the credits on our webpage at http://silverline.mobi/indiegogo/.

D. We will continue to work on bug fixes and improved functionality for our
app, some of which will be appearing in the Android version when it
is available.
1. Join the effort! If you haven’t already, download our latest app at https://itunes.apple.com/sg/app/silverline-care-pack/id641458230?mt=8.

2. Spread the message! Share what you find useful about our app to with your
friends, especially with those who are seniors.

3. Report if you find anything breaking to hello@silverline.mobi and we get
on it as soon as we are able to.

4. Secure your communications channel! Sign up for our updates, if you have
not already, at http://silverline.mobi/contact-us/.

So we're offering the $149 COMBO PACK as a cheap and easy way to get both an iPhone3GS and updated Silverline apps. Just insert your own SIM card - then you're ready to go. Get your $149 COMBO PACK quick - only 50 are available!

column5: >is a new project that creates apps specifically designed for seniors. We have spent the last 18 months working with underserved seniors, providing them with donated second-hand smartphones and building apps to address their needs. It’s been amazing to see how this new technology has improved the quality of their lives. But we’re just scratching the surface. Now we want to bring this concept to all seniors - to our parents and grandparents - so they too can benefit from the smartphone revolution.

column3: >Are the Silverline Apps available for download at the iTunes Store?

column4: >No, the apps are currently distributed only to our beneficiaries in Lions Befrienders and Willing Hearts. But with your support we can change that!
>Are the Silverline Apps available for Android devices?

>We are focussing on delivering the best possible experience for the iOS platform right now. But we hope to begin work on Android versions of the apps, targetting the Samsung Galaxy SII and other similar models, later this year.
>Can I use the Silverline Apps in my country / language?

>Silverline apps will work anywhere in the world. While we will be launching the apps in English and Mandarin for both UI and Content, we hope to translate to other languages according to demand. Tell us which languages you’d like us to work on and we’ll do our best.

column3: >WE ARE A CLOSELY KNIT TEAM
column5: > of with experience in design, user experience, mobile app programming, advertising, business strategy and community organizing. We are passionate about creating simple technology to help seniors lead healthier and happier lives.

column4: >The wonderful team at OGILVY in Singapore have volunteered countless hours and amazing talent to make Project Silverline and this crowdfunding campaign a reality. We have enjoyed working side-by-side, serving seniors at local charities, developing the apps functionality and design, and delivering the refurbished phones to the seniors. Thank you!

>SINGAPORE TELECOMMUNICATIONS LIMITED, Asia's leading communications group, has generously supported Project Silverline every step of the way: helping us to understand the needs of seniors, encouraging their customers to donate second-hand smartphones to underserved seniors, and providing 1,000 free voice and data plans to those who received the donated second-hand smartphones.

>BUUUK worked with us to develop the existing Silverline apps. They tackled complex problems with a creative flair, deep thinking and cutting-edge technology. They also spent months constant testing and re-testing the apps until they met the need of seniors. We are excited to work with them again to build future Silverline apps.

>LIONS BEFRIENDERS SERVICE ASSOCIATION strives to aid in the social, psycho-emotional and physical well-being of the lonely seniors through community participation. Their team and beneficiaries have been a joy to work with throughout the app testing process.

>WILLING HEARTS works with the underprivileged, the needy, and other marginalised members of society, and guides them towards rehabilitating and reinstating themselves. Their work with underserved seniors has been our constant inspiration.

>SPW ENTERPRISE IT is an independent facility that specializes in refurbishing used IT products via an ethical, sustainable and data-secure process. They did an excellent job managing the collection, refurbishment and distribution of smartphones through our charity program.

>
MODUS LINK is a leader in executing value chain strategies for the world’s largest technology and consumer goods companies. They will be managing the collection, refurbishment and distribution of donated smartphones worldwide as we expand our charity program to the USA, UK, Australia, Hong Kong and other countries.

>Silverline Mobile is a project of NEWTON CIRCUS PTE LTD, a tech start-up based in Singapore. We believe that doing good is good business. We are entrepreneurs - we conceptualize, prototype, fund and scale innovative businesses that have a positive impact on people, planet and profit.

>

It has been hard work and we have been successful with some things morethan others. Thank you for staying with us through our hard and goodtimes. Our Silverline Care Pack will not have been a reality had it beenwithout your support, financially and otherwise.

Crowd-funding takes off in Asia - Silverline Crowd-funding campaign featured on BBC!
Oh my goodness, you did it! You really did it! $54,001! We can't quite believe it.
Check out all the campaign updates here, and make sure to watch our latest video. None of this would be possible if it weren't for your generosity and support. Thank you SO so much!
Now, if you'll excuse us, we have a LOT of work to do! And we've never been more excited...
Thanks to the massive support from all of our fans, we SMASHED our $7,000 Dollar-4-Dollar matching campaign and we are SO close to hitting our goal! Just $5,500 in 3 days!
Please help us achieve (and maybe even exceed!) our goal so we can continue improving the lives of seniors through custom-designed smartphone apps.
i) Buying secondhand iPhone 3GSs so underserved seniors from Willing Hearts and Lions Befrienders can enjoy Silverline apps.
ii) Developing new and improved Silverline apps for seniors around the world.
We're all counting on your support in these last 3 days.  Thank you, and please contribute now!

Thanks to your support, our Dollar-4-Dollar Matching campaign was a huge success!  We'll be receiving the $7,000 from our generous anonymous donor and updating the campaign page soon.  Meanwhile, as at 15th April, the grand total raised to bring the smartphone revolution to seniors stands at over $43,000!  Great job!

In celebration of reaching 100 supporters and 50% of our total goal, we're offering a great new reward - the $149 COMBO PACK - featuring a refurbished, unlocked iPhone3GS (8GB or 16BG) with all updated Silverline apps pre-installed!

You told us that many of your older friends and relatives don't have iPhones, but they would love to use Silverline apps. So we're offering the $149 COMBO PACK as a cheap and easy way to get both an iPhone3GS and updated Silverline apps. Just insert your own SIM card - then you're ready to go. Get your $149 COMBO PACK quick - only 50 are available!

Silverline is a new project that creates apps specifically designed for seniors. We have spent the last 18 months working with underserved seniors, providing them with donated second-hand smartphones and building apps to address their needs. It’s been amazing to see how this new technology has improved the quality of their lives. But we’re just scratching the surface. Now we want to bring this concept to all seniors - to our parents and grandparents - so they too can benefit from the smartphone revolution.

All the Silverline apps can be used anywhere in the world - and are optimized for the United States, United Kingdom, Australia, Hong Kong and Singapore. The apps are currently available in English and Chinese (Mandarin), and will soon be available in other languages too.
United States Dollars (USD) are used for all contribution levels.

DISCOVER allows users to snap pictures of where they are or interesting things they see and documents them in a time orientated photo album. Each image is geo-tagged and time stamped automatically with the user given the option to describe each image. It is a wonderful way to document and share their activities through the day.

WELL BEING provides simple reminders for taking medicine, drinking water and doing exercise. It allows users to monitor their moods and watch videos providing simple health tips to implement in their daily routines. We are continuing to work with health authorities to create additional apps focused on keeping seniors happy and healthy.

INSPIRE features daily headlines and human interest stories delivered in text, picture and video formats. These stories keep users informed of current events and raises their spirits through feel-good stories and uplifting quotes.
CONNECT presents the contact list in a user-friendly and visual format. Using pictures of the contact as well as their name in text provides simple navigation to the visually impaired.

Simple icons for EMERGENCY assistance are just a tap of the finger away. In the case of a fall being detected or the phone remaining idle for more than a certain period of time, a message will be sent to ensure there is nothing wrong. If the message is not verified, a message will be sent to a caregiver's phone notifying them of the situation.

The Discover, Well Being, Inspire, Connect and Emergency apps you see above were developed to meet the needs of underserved seniors in Singapore. Our first users loved them, and we know you will too. So we kept the core functionality and re-designed them for all seniors by providing tailored content, more features and an improved look and feel.

We have our eye on the future, and we are excited to continue developing apps to improve the lives of seniors. Here are the next suite of apps we’ll be creating if we reach our funding goal. Of course, these apps are just the beginning. With your support, we will develop dozens of new apps over the next few years.

GO & EXPLORE - our Discover app gets seniors out of the house and snapping away on their cameras. But how do they go further afield? Maps on smartphones today are unusable by the elderly - labels are too small and controls are too fiddly. Our Go & Explore app will create custom map layers with senior-friendly features such as digital breadcrumbs, geo-fencing and clearly marked places of interest to help get seniors get out and get active!

PERSONAL SECURITY - we believe it's important for seniors to feel secure both in the home and when out and about. How to go beyond simple movement detection and fall detection without sacrificing battery life? We think the answer is in wearables and will be working with hardware partners to use Bluetooth to pair with special bracelets that incorporate accelerometers and dedicated alert buttons.

HEALTH & WELLBEING - we have a dedicated app for health and wellbeing, but we know that there is much more to do! We want to build improved reminders and a simplified medication tracking system that can handle the complicated medication regimes of senior citizens.

CONNECTING WITH FAMILY - the most highly requested feature we’ve received is the ability to easily share photos and other memories. We want to make it simple to transfer images from your phone or connected social media accounts and have them appear directly on your loved one’s device. We’re also working hard on messaging systems that make it easy to communicate without poking about on tiny on-screen keyboards.
Silverline’s CARE PACK provides an underserved senior with everything he or she needs to take full advantage of the new apps and smartphone:
A secondhand iPhone 3GS sourced from a professional refurbisher who ensures the phone is fully functional and cleaned of the previous owner’s data
A year-long data and voice plan
All CURRENT AND FUTURE Silverline Apps, including Inspire, Connect, Well Being, Discover and Emergency and all future apps as they become available.

We are providing the initial round of care packs to beneficiaries served by Lions Befrienders and Willing Hearts in Singapore. SingTel will provide the data and voice plan, and local volunteers will provide the training. We are working with other charities, volunteers and telecoms in USA, UK, HK and Australia to provide care packs to beneficaries in those countries too.
The Silverline apps are designed to run on older hardware, starting with the iPhone 3GS. We believe there’s plenty of life left in old hardware!

We've built the first suite of apps and received rave reviews from the first users. We’ve also created an amazing charity program in collaboration with SingTel and local charities. Now we need your help to take the next steps.
Funds contributed under the SUPPORTER PACK, APP PACKS, FAMILY PACK, CUSTOM PACK and CHAMPION PACK will be used to develop future Silverline apps.
Funds contributed under the CARE PACK, COMMUNITY PACK and SUPER COMMUNITY PACK will be used to provide underserved seniors with the apps and a refurbished smartphone.
Of course, reasonable costs will be used to provide contributors their rewards as listed.

SpringwiseApp Suite Designed To Aid Elderly Smartphone Users
Are the Silverline Apps available for download at the iTunes Store?
No, the apps are currently distributed only to our beneficiaries in Lions Befrienders and Willing Hearts. But with your support we can change that!
Are the Silverline Apps available for Android devices?

We are focussing on delivering the best possible experience for the iOS platform right now. But we hope to begin work on Android versions of the apps, targetting the Samsung Galaxy SII and other similar models, later this year.
Can I use the Silverline Apps in my country / language?

Silverline apps will work anywhere in the world. While we will be launching the apps in English and Mandarin for both UI and Content, we hope to translate to other languages according to demand. Tell us which languages you’d like us to work on and we’ll do our best.

WE ARE A CLOSELY KNIT TEAM of with experience in design, user experience, mobile app programming, advertising, business strategy and community organizing. We are passionate about creating simple technology to help seniors lead healthier and happier lives.

The wonderful team at OGILVY in Singapore have volunteered countless hours and amazing talent to make Project Silverline and this crowdfunding campaign a reality. We have enjoyed working side-by-side, serving seniors at local charities, developing the apps functionality and design, and delivering the refurbished phones to the seniors. Thank you!

SINGAPORE TELECOMMUNICATIONS LIMITED, Asia's leading communications group, has generously supported Project Silverline every step of the way: helping us to understand the needs of seniors, encouraging their customers to donate second-hand smartphones to underserved seniors, and providing 1,000 free voice and data plans to those who received the donated second-hand smartphones.

BUUUK worked with us to develop the existing Silverline apps. They tackled complex problems with a creative flair, deep thinking and cutting-edge technology. They also spent months constant testing and re-testing the apps until they met the need of seniors. We are excited to work with them again to build future Silverline apps.

LIONS BEFRIENDERS SERVICE ASSOCIATION strives to aid in the social, psycho-emotional and physical well-being of the lonely seniors through community participation. Their team and beneficiaries have been a joy to work with throughout the app testing process.

WILLING HEARTS works with the underprivileged, the needy, and other marginalised members of society, and guides them towards rehabilitating and reinstating themselves. Their work with underserved seniors has been our constant inspiration.

SPW ENTERPRISE IT is an independent facility that specializes in refurbishing used IT products via an ethical, sustainable and data-secure process. They did an excellent job managing the collection, refurbishment and distribution of smartphones through our charity program.

MODUS LINK is a leader in executing value chain strategies for the world’s largest technology and consumer goods companies. They will be managing the collection, refurbishment and distribution of donated smartphones worldwide as we expand our charity program to the USA, UK, Australia, Hong Kong and other countries.

Silverline Mobile is a project of NEWTON CIRCUS PTE LTD, a tech start-up based in Singapore. We believe that doing good is good business. We are entrepreneurs - we conceptualize, prototype, fund and scale innovative businesses that have a positive impact on people, planet and profit.
Please reach out to us at hello@silverline.mobi",39.0,0,"1 Campaign

Introducing Monkey Holder

The laptop and the smartphones are both great working tools, especially combined together.
• Minimal setup for digital nomads and mobile working.

column2:
>Why carry around extra monitors, if you already have one in your pocket?

Monkey Holder promises to boost your productivity by up to 50% and allows for efficient multitasking. Attach the Monkey Holder to the back of any laptop, and you’re ready to work wherever you are!. No more frustrating experiences of being limited by the laptop’s single small screen.

It’s lightweight, portable, convenient, patented and feels ""invisible""

Enjoy ergonomic comfort anywhere and anytime.

We have tried many phone holders for desktops on the market, but we are not satisfied with them. They are often a burden to carry around and sometimes you may forget to bring it or even lose it.
column3: >Compatible With All Desktop Extending Apps!
column4:
/>

Now you can work fast and efficiently. Multi-tasking between your phone and laptop comfortably. The nightmare of bad postures and small workspaces is over.
column5: >
column6: >Step 1 - Place Your Laptop Down
column18:
>

Monkey Holder is made using high end aluminium material and neodymium magnets. It is strong enough to attach firmly most smartphones and tablets in the market.  
With a thickness of 3.5mm is thinner and lighter than your smartphone.
We have tested Monkey Holder in many laptop models and many brands.

Al thought it has been specifically designed for Apple, it fits perfectly on others models, especially in gaming laptops.

Are you wondering if the MonkeyHolder is safe for your phone? The answer is YES!
We designed MonkeyHolder to be safe and strong.
column48:
>  

The product is ready. We finished the tests, packaging and everything else. Now we need your help to fund our first large factory production. 

We invested in tooling, patents, and everything necessary to bring something that's innovative and of good quality into the market.

This is our team. We have needed many engineers to be able to tame the monkey but in the end the product is ready and soon you will have it on your laptops.
column51: >We’d love it if you guys could tell your friends, family, and the rest of the world about MonkeyHolder.
column53: >
column55:
>

Time is always the most challenging part when trying to bring a product to the market. As there are so many procedures to be managed. However we believe that our experienced team can mitigate all the potential risks in this journey. And we will strive for excellence, project planning, from production to order and shipping.

If there’s any obstacle, we will definitely keep you posted. Thanks for believing in us!

>Thousands of people have received their
Jelly 2 and they ALL LOVE it!
column20:
s=1d6aef0a4bd8058b0e806c25c1acda2d"" src=""""/>


Packed with a 3-inch screen, 2 times longer battery life, upgraded camera system and GPS sensors, Jelly 2 brings more hit features than the previous Jelly while still maintaining a credit card size. This 4G mini smartphone is designed to act as a companion device to your regular cell, one that you can more easily use for nights out, exercise, or when taking a break from your full-sized smartphone.

Check this unbiased Jelly 2 Hands on Review from Android Police. Thanks so much for Ryne Hager’s awesome work!
column113: s=5359ca5006f0f36944e49e3a244f0aca"" src=""""/>
column131:
s=12dc4b2209bdbf65ce33cb60273bb555"" src=""""/>

Even upgraded to a larger screen, Jelly 2 still maintains an incredibly small size, almost the same as the first generation Jelly. It delivers a superior visual quality with 326 PPI that lets users enjoy movies, games, and more with vibrant colors and sharp details.

 3-inch Display 




 

With a 3-inch screen, Jelly 2 gives you a higher screen-to-body ratio and a larger display area which allows you to swipe, scroll, and navigate with ease. Experience music, movies and games like never before and take your immersion to the next level in an unbelievably mini size.
column138:
s=3f1d63d8fdd96b7e5767f8b2e838f398"" src=""""/>
 

With a 2000 mAh battery, Jelly 2 delivers 2 times longer battery life than the original Jelly. You can easily power through the day and more. Stream music, shows, movies, and more for hours and know you have battery life when you need it most.




 

Jelly 2 supports a new global satellite positioning system that is a huge step up over previous efforts. Upgraded to a “GPS+Beidou+Glonass” system with 5 type of sensors, it offers greater satellite coverage and a strong, stable signal for better position accuracy and navigation routing.
column146:
s=63f828823ecc0371d0bb93d29c314306"" src=""""/>





The high-resolution rear camera takes photos that spring to life. Photos have more pixels per inch, so even when you enlarge them they remain clear and undistorted. With the 8MP front camera, you can capture beautiful selfies from any distance. 


 

  • Android 10


​


Jelly 2 is made to run the latest Android 10 operating system. No duplicate apps, no clunky UI skins, and software that doesn’t slow you down. Just the best phone for Android lovers.

column1:
Programmable Key
 




With Jelly 2's programmable key, you can customize any favorite functions with a shortcut button. Taking photos, setting an alarm, opening App, or any function you'd like to open in a simple tap.

Global LTE Support
 



Bring your Jelly 2 on holidays or business trips overseas. It offers global LTE bands that have over 6 types and 38 bands. Surf and be connected using the local high-speed 4G network.
 

  • NFC Function
column9:
s=e0f672ea358b98cbd4810be44d0969dc"" src=""""/>


With a robust NFC feature, you don’t need to worry about forgetting a payment card or being caught out without cash. To use the convenience of NFC, all you need is your phone for shopping, paying and electronic access.

 

  •  MicroSD Card Slot
column17:
s=95efa3f8f7fe043e32cfecc9896e85d5"" src=""""/>


Jelly 2 comes with a MicroSD card slot that allows you to expand the storage and easily move files, photos, or music from device to device without having to rely on Wi-Fi or costly cellular data transfers.

 

  •  Dual SIM Cards
column25:
s=0e4873575dc61c3133fa182f1eb5fe16"" src=""""/>


Dual SIM Cards lets you have both a business number and a personal number on the same smartphone. Communicate seamlessly with your networks for work or pleasure with Jelly 2.

We have achieved our crowdfunding goal in time. Many thanks to all backers of our campaign! For those, who missed the chance to get Juggglow balls, we are continuing to accept contributions.
Juggglow combines the art of juggling with mobile technology by connecting your smartphone to the juggling balls via Bluetooth Smart.
You can control the color effects of the glowing balls and share your juggling achievements with your friends.
These balls were originally designed for professional jugglers on the stage.
But also beginners will benefit from the a variety of tutorials, games and statistics to improve their juggling skills.
The mobile app will be available free of charge for Android and iOS
We have already made the step from prototyping to pre-production.
Your support will help us to go into mass production.
You will also help us to further improve and extend our mobile app with new features and games.
Connect up to 7 juggling balls to your smartphone via Bluetooth Smart and start sharing your juggling activities and achievements online with your friends.
Compete with your friends in several juggling games and meet different challenges to obtain achievements and unlock new features and games.
Integrated super bright LEDs make the balls glow in any colors, which can be set by the smartphone app or by motion sensing.
Improve your juggling skills with the help of juggling tutorials and statistics of your juggling activities such as catching and fall counters.
Juggglow pushes the traditional old beanbags to the next level of fancy glooming and wireless linked juggling balls.
Therefore, we integrate the newest wireless technology, acceleration sensors and microprocessor intelligence in our juggling balls.
On the one hand Juggglow can help beginners at any age to learn and practice juggling.
On the other hand Juggglow can pimp your professional juggling performance with various definable color and gloom effects.
An easy to use application for your mobile phone or tablet lets you interact with your juggling balls e.g. by choosing any color or visualization effects.
Furthermore, you can play with or compete with your friends in many different challenges and battles.
Battle your friends in various juggling games

Rising Battle
The players juggle in turn. All successful throws are counted until the player makes the first mistake. This number represents the value to be beaten by the next player. The players that can’t beat their predecessor get a penalty point. If players reach a defined maximum of penalty points they are excluded from the battle.

Juggling Time
In each round the players have to juggle a certain period of time, which is randomly chosen by the app. If players drop a ball or juggle too long or too short, they get a time penalty. The player with the least time penalty wins the game.

Touch the Sky
While juggling, the player has to throw the balls in different heights, which are requested by the smartphone app via voice output. If the requested height is not reached within a certain amount of throws the game is lost. The player with most throws at the correct height wins the game.

More than 100 challenges
The Juggglow app includes a fancy achievement system with more than 100 challenges to improve your juggling skills. Several funny challenges will help beginners to learn juggling in an easy way. But also intermediate and professional jugglers will get one’s money’s worth. And to reach the title “God of Juggling”, you have to conquer nearly impossible tasks.

Better yourself
The acceleration sensor of the balls will be used to measure the catching and dropping impulse, flying time and height, and the spin of the balls. With this information the Juggglow app can analyze your juggling activities and illustrates your statistics in several diagrams such as your best daily juggling results or your average height deviation.
• Gesture control for stand-alone mode without Juggglow app
• FREE Juggglow app available for iOS (requires version 7.1 or later) and Android (requires version 4.3 or later)

The Juggglow balls are developed by the research group Embedded Systems in close cooperation with the Bachelor’s Degree Program Hardware-Software-Design and the Master’s Degree Program Embedded Systems Design. The research group at Hagenberg Campus belongs to the research area Information and Communication Systems of the University of Applied Sciences Upper Austria (FH OÖ Forschungs &

column2: id=8A71E5"" rel=""noopener nofollow"" target=""_blank"">

column1: What happens to my money if the goal of 10,000 euro couldn't be reached?
We will produce all ordered balls, even if we could not reach our goal. That's why we have chosen the flexible funding.
Do I need a smartphone or tablet for Juggglow?

The Juggglow balls have a stand-alone mode and can be used without a smartphone or tablet. You can choose different colors or color effects via gesture control. For the great fun and for getting all features of Juggglow, we recommend to link the balls with your smartphone or tablet.

Connect any USB compatible power adapter to the micro USB port of the ball. The delivery will include a micro USB cable, but no power adapter. You can also charge the balls by connecting it to your computer, but it will take a little bit longer than with a power adapter, because the ball won't be recognized as an USB device.
Are shipping costs included in the prices of the perks?

No, you have to add the stated shipping costs depending on your country. Thus choose the custom button on the additional gift field and enter the shipping costs for Austria, for EU countries or for worldwide shipping.
What shall I do if I forget to pay for shipping?

Click on the CONTRIBUTE NOW button and manually enter the shipping costs depending on your country and the initial perk you have chosen. Enter the same personal information as you did for your initial perk, thus we can combine your shipping perk with your initial perk.
What's about the availability of the API documentation for the Juggglow balls?

We will provide the API (application programming interface) definitions free of charge for iOS, Android and desktop computers (Windows) in July. With the help of the API, you can implement your own stage show with fancy color effects and catch and drop detection.
Jonglieren neu erleben mit Juggglow
Juggglow vereint die Kunst des Jonglierens mit moderner Funktechnologie, um dein Smartphone mit den Jonglierbällen zu verbinden.
Über dein Smartphone kannst du verschiedenste Lichteffekte für die Bälle einstellen, deine Erfolge mit Freunden teilen.
Diese intelligenten Jonglierbälle wurden für den professionellen Einsatz auf der Bühne entwickelt.
Aber auch Jonglieranfänger werden von einer Vielzahl an Lernhilfen, Spielen und Statistiken profitieren.
Die App für dein Smartphone stellen wir kostenfrei für Android und iOS Geräte zur Verfügung.
Wir haben schon den Schritt vom Prototypen zur Vorserie geschafft.
Mit eurer Unterstützung bringen wir die Jonglierbälle zur Serienreife.
Zudem können wir mit eurer Hilfe die Juggglow-App mit weiteren Funktionen und Spielen ausstatten.
Mehr Details findest du auf unserer deutschsprachigen Webseite oder in der englischen Beschreibung

You can also charge the balls by connecting it to your computer, but it will take a little bit longer than with a power adapter, because the ball won't be recognized as an USB device.
Are shipping costs included in the prices of the perks?

No, you have to add the stated shipping costs depending on your country. Thus choose the custom button on the additional gift field and enter the shipping costs for Austria, for EU countries or for worldwide shipping.
What shall I do if I forget to pay for shipping?

Click on the CONTRIBUTE NOW button and manually enter the shipping costs depending on your country and the initial perk you have chosen. Enter the same personal information as you did for your initial perk, thus we can combine your shipping perk with your initial perk.
What's about the availability of the API documentation for the Juggglow balls?

We will provide the API (application programming interface) definitions free of charge for iOS, Android and desktop computers (Windows) in July. With the help of the API, you can implement your own stage show with fancy color effects and catch and drop detection.
Juggglow vereint die Kunst des Jonglierens mit moderner Funktechnologie, um dein Smartphone mit den Jonglierbällen zu verbinden.
Über dein Smartphone kannst du verschiedenste Lichteffekte für die Bälle einstellen, deine Erfolge mit Freunden teilen.
Diese intelligenten Jonglierbälle wurden für den professionellen Einsatz auf der Bühne entwickelt.
Aber auch Jonglieranfänger werden von einer Vielzahl an Lernhilfen, Spielen und Statistiken profitieren.
Die App für dein Smartphone stellen wir kostenfrei für Android und iOS Geräte zur Verfügung.
Wir haben schon den Schritt vom Prototypen zur Vorserie geschafft.
Mit eurer Unterstützung bringen wir die Jonglierbälle zur Serienreife.
Zudem können wir mit eurer Hilfe die Juggglow-App mit weiteren Funktionen und Spielen ausstatten.
Mehr Details findest du auf unserer deutschsprachigen Webseite oder in der englischen Beschreibung",22.0,0,"1 Campaign

Have you ever tried to create an App?

I think that many people have thought about it and many have looked into building an app but quickly became totally confused and very intimidated by what they saw.

Pull out your smartphone. You probably have an app for navigation, your social networking, your favorite game, and a music app. But what if you could create great apps for all the great ideas you think about or the times you have said ""That was my idea
column2: I thought of that before!"" – If only you knew how!  YOU could be the one to build apps for your favorite restaurant, boutique, hair salon, home safety plan, inspirational quotes, or for your kids’ school.... There probably isn’t an app for many of those things, and the list goes on. See what I mean? The app market is WIDE OPEN!

column1: With no knowledge and no simple instructions out there, it IS like learning a foreign language.
{The next two bullets are the main idea of this campaign}

• What if there was a real platform that would let anyone build apps with absolutely NO Programming or NO Coding Knowledge? A platform that doesn't require any special computers, just your web browser!

• Well we have just that! The iDockMobi Team wants to bring everyone to a new platform, exactly like that, and introduce them to building apps independently and for free! Everyone can familiarize themselves with the tools and LEARN AT YOUR OWN PACE for FREE! What's going to make our platform more special or better? FREE to learn first, then our Point &
column2: Click, STEP by STEP Video Instructions along with superb customer support.

column1: Check out these two videos of what it would be like working on the Platform:

The market for developing apps is still largely untapped, making it perfect for anyone looking for an opportunity to make a career change. Think of the stay-at-home mom, the out-of-work dad, or someone who wants to start a freelance app business!

From the owner: My desire to help others stems from when I was learning to build apps, there was very little support out there. I needed other app builders to help me with my small obstacles – like where is the doggone file after I download it?! Or I’m typing in this code perfectly but why won’t it work the way the instructions say?! I needed a simple platform and a guide because starting from scratch easily gets frustrating and easily overwhelming. All the books and how-to-videos that promised easy instructions, didn’t give the basics from A-Z in layman’s terms because, frankly, “tech geeks” do not speak the same language as people who are new to app development.

The problem for people with no or very little background in apps becoming developers is three-fold: 1) Learning programming language like “Objective-C” and “Python” and “Ruby”… is TOO HARD! 2) You need support from people who have encountered the same problem you’re facing, and 3) There is no clear helpful Step-by-Step guide to help you simply get the hang of it! At this point, it's so easy to just Give Up! Just like we have done with so many other ventures, It's Too Hard!

I was one of many people who found themselves in between jobs and struggling to make ends meet on a monthly basis. I knew for a while that I would have to come up with something to become dependent on myself and not depend on a paycheck from someone else, especially in this weak economy and awful job market. If you’re reading this, you’re probably feeling the same way! You may also be a business owner who is looking to have an app built but don't want to spend the $10,000 or more on someone else to make one for you! All of you can be like me, I am now an App Developer who develops apps for download in the App Store, Google Play and Amazon Kindle. I design apps for client businesses and personal use.

My reason for this campaign: I have a team of people who have been trained by me personally and a Platform that we are developing that we are ready and prepared to provide to users to use, learn, design, and create apps for FREE!  On this Platform you will be able to try out and learn app building with no time limits and NO COST and see if it's for you!

The biggest plus is that this platform REQUIRES NO CODING KNOWLEDGE at all. It will include strong technical support from a very knowledgeable team should you need them and plenty of step-by-step, click-by-click instructions for people who have no idea what they are doing. I’ve discovered that many people are afraid of building apps because of the difficulty in learning the many programming languages and with this platform, that difficulty is erased as no programming language is necessary. With the step-by-step instructions that we are creating those fears will be eased. Users will learn quickly because it uses point-and-click techniques and plain language. You will be able to create apps not only for Apple iPhone and iPad but also for Google Play’s Android Market and Amazon Kindle all on the same platform!

And for those of you who do know some Objective C, JavaScript, jQuery, and or HTML5, don't worry as there is the capability to use your coding as well.

***An experienced developer can easily charge $10,000, $20,000, $30,000 or more to design and create an app. However, with this platform you can do it yourself!  For rewards, specific backers of this project will receive information that would take users beyond just creating an app to promoting, marketing and selling their app to make money. This valuable information is to prevent reading tons of books and scouring the internet for hours on end and give practical steps from A to Z in one place. This is a Plus for everyone.***


When we reach our goal, we will add details of Phase 2 &

This all takes a team to come to completion. I am seeking to raise funds to help get this platform off the ground and put together the most professional information and Step by Step VIDEO.  These funds will allow for:
• Secure servers, backup data and storage that will able to support heavy traffic to my site!
• Ensure maintenance and general management costs to ensure a successful outcome.
• Create the Step by Step Video for Platform.

Because we have been working at this Platform this is not asking for as much considering what an endeavor of this magnitude commands.  Of course, you, my backers, will be personally given priority assistance with the steps needed to create your first App made with this platform and processed into the App Store (Apple for iPhone - iPad, Google Play for Android and Amazon for Kindle). Become an App Developer for personal or business purposes.  All the glitches will be worked out to smooth completion. You're on your way, Creator / Developer.
If we receive pledges in this amount we would have the opportunity to expand and build on our vision.  Our next step:
Receiving pledges in this amount would allow us to live our ultimate dream:
• Offer Live Step-by-Step Seminars: details to come...

Check out our website: www.idockmobi.com. It’s currently UNDER CONSTRUCTION because it’s simply not prepared to handle substantial traffic. We have been working at this for about eight months, but with your help I believe this can get this off the ground in the next three to four months!
Please email or message me with any questions – I would be happy to answer!
Friend, message or like us on Facebook iDockMobiApps: https://www.facebook.com/IDockMobiApps
Here are a few screenshots of what the site will become at – www.idockmobi.com

column1: Join us, the winning team, and let's create something new! Apps galore are here to simplify and enhance the lives of millions.  We would be delighted to have you join us creating positive change on so many levels.  The world is waiting for someone to take the next step of making new and great things possible for the everyday person who is ready and willing to advance.
We have minimized the risks and challenges with this project. Mainly because this is a proven platform in which a deal of my live apps have been created with.

With my active years of experience with Apple and Android Development and a team of professionals whom I've personally trained and are now experts on this platform, we plan to be ready for anything should anything unforeseen arise. With that said, we would like to get this project fully funded to be able to acquire a couple more local developers and a graphics artist.

We are working on our own wearable augmented reality computing solutions.
At the moment our device is at the  design stage, but we are quite sure that we will manage to ship it to the backers who have chosen the 299$ option very soon, still in 2013.
The first batch of the devices is intended first and foremost for the greatest enthusiasts and fanatics of newest technologies.
There are several kinds of glasses, which appeared in the market recently, that offer the possibility of taking photos and recording videos.

We do not only bring a piece of amazing hardware to you but we would also like to focus  to the great extent on providing you with a bunch of amazing apps. And what is more, all that comes at very reasonable prices.
* show you both the “real” and “augmented”  content at the same time,
* display information in a smartphone-like hands-free format,
* have the ability to take high quality photos
* have the ability to record 720p HD video
We are also working on software  which will enable the  glasses to:
* display weather, current time and date
* give directions (GPS for spatial and positional awareness)
* display received messages (texts, emails) (thanks to connection with your smartphone)
* have capability to interact with the Internet
* have capability to interact with social networking websites  (Facebook, Twitter)
* if our campaign is successful, we are planning to create at least one game in the nearest future
* Wi-Fi and Bluetooth to connect with smart devices
* 5-megapixel camera which takes pictures and records 720p video
All backers  will have the decisive voice on how the basic interface should look like. We will do it here and via our Facebook Fanpage
We’ve been designing and working on our device as well as technology it requires for the past 5 months now and currently we're at a stage where we need your help to finish this project.

Technologies necessary for creating system of this kind are already available. Compiling such system is not very difficult. We want to focus mainly on creating an interesting design and making right selection of the components and technologies so that the glasses could offer the best experience possible and be widely used.

Manufacturing is going to be one of the greatest challenges, and we need money that will mostly allow us to improve this process and provide for its costs and to cover the expenses of large component order.
Another challenge will be to work out reliable and attractive software therefore certain amount will be allocated for hiring of the programmers.
We also going to use some funds for research and development which will facilitate introducing interesting innovations.
We are convinced that with your support the first batch of the devices will be delivered in 2013.
It is hard to specify the exact date because at the moment it depends on a few essential factors. It should however happen in the last quarter of 2013.

Nobody can foresee the future and we can meet certain obstacles on our way, e.g. logistic, technological or legal issues. However, anybody who financially contributes to our project, can be sure their money is safe.
There are only 2 scenarios – delivery of the device or money refund.
The glasses will be available in few colour variants.

If you like our campaign, we count on your support in promoting our project online. Every share or mention about it on social platforms or forums is very important to us. It will help us develop better glasses.
Thank you all in advance for your interest!

column4: >I am a midwife with my own practice in the Portland Metro area.  Midwives and doulas are dedicated professionals who are on-call 24/7 and need to be reachable by their clients  at all times.  We live in a wondrous area where there are many places to hike, swim, and camp.  Many of these places are close by but have spotty or no cell service.  Midwives want to be available to their clients but also want to enjoy the outdoors with their families.

>I want to buy a satellite phone to have available for midwives and doulas to use on a day-to-day basis if they want to be out of cell range.  A small daily fee ($10-20) would be asked of them to contribute to on-going service and maintenance. A shared calendar where people can reserve and pay for the use of the phone will be maintained.  This campaign is asking for the money to buy the phone, it's accessories (chargers, battery, holster, etc.), and to buy some prepaid minutes.
>We also have a generous and wonderful anonymous donor who will match our fund raising up to $1000!  If we earn more than we need then the extra money will be applied to on-going airtime.

>Please consider contributing some money to help our birth workers have some outdoor fun with their families while having to ability to keep serving their clients. Spread the word!","I am a midwife with my own practice in the Portland Metro area.  Midwives and doulas are dedicated professionals who are on-call 24/7 and need to be reachable by their clients  at all times.  We live in a wondrous area where there are many places to hike, swim, and camp.  Many of these places are close by but have spotty or no cell service.  Midwives want to be available to their clients but also want to enjoy the outdoors with their families.
