column64: >What is needed / Qué se necesita
column66: >A completely functional prototype is designed and fabricated so the next step is to start a preproduction serie of Innodor. This phase implies a lot of steps including injection molding, pcb fabrication, pcb assembly, system assembly, electromagnetic compatibility tests, electronic components, etc, etc, etc, so an estimation of the total cost was made to make this project alive.
column67: >Se ha diseñado y fabricado un prototipo completamente funcional por lo que el siguiente paso es lanzar una preserie de Innodor. Esta fase implica muchos pasos en los que se incluyen la fabricación de moldes de inyección, fabricación y ensamblaje de circuitos, ensamblaje del sistema, pruebas de compatibilidad electromagnética, componentes electrónicos, etc, etc, etc, por lo que se ha realizado una estimación del gasto necesario para hacer realidad este proyecto.
column68: ><font size=""3""><font size=""3""><font size=""3""><font size=""3""><font size=""3"">The most unavoidable and expensive step is the fabrication of the moulds for the plastic pieces of Innodor. <b style=""font-size: 16px
column72: >are needed to fabricate all plastic parts with the cost of about
column78: >4.000-5.000 €. Apart from this, each Innodor kit needs obviously electric and electronic material to work so this one must be added to the total amount. In other hand, Indiegogo charges a 9% fee to the investment made by crowdfunders and paypal other 3,4% so keeping this in mind and trying to offer ""affordable"" perks, the final amount needed to cover the
column79: >fabrication of a pre-serie is about 45.000 € and 450 units.
column80: >El inevitable y más costoso paso es la fabricación de los moldes para Innodor. Son necesarios 5 moldes para fabricar todas las piezas de plástico con un coste entre 15.000-18.000 €. Las pruebas de compatibilidad electromagnéticas (EMC)cuestan unos 4.000-5.000 €. Además de esto, cada kit Innodor necesita material eléctrico y electrónico para funcionar por lo que esto se ha de añadir a la cantidad total. Por otro lado, Indiegogo aplica un 9% de comisión a las inversiones de los crowdfunders y paypal otro 3,4% por lo que teniendo en cuenta e intentando ofrecer colaboraciones ""asumibles"", la cantidad final que es necesaria para fabricar una pre-serie es de unos 45.000 € y 450 unidades.
column83: ><font size=""2""><font color=""GREY""><font color=""GREY""><font size=""3""><font size=""3""><font size=""3""><font size=""3""><font size=""3""><font size=""3""><i><font size=""2""><span style=""letter-spacing: 0px
column89: >If it doesn't reach 100% / Si no llega al 100%
column91: >As I explained before, Indiegogo and Paypal applies a total of 12,4% fee to all perks made by crowdfunders, in other words, Innodor project receives only the 87,6% of the each perk. This fact can affect the project in 2 ways:

column1: • If the campaign is completely funded each crowdfunder will receive the recompense kit/kits of Innodor as expected.

• If the campaign is not funded each crowdfunder will receive a refund of the total amount arrived to the project (87,6%). For example, if you made a contribution with 99 € and the project doesn't reach the goal you will receive back 86,72 €.

column3: >Como he explicado antes, Indiegogo y Paypal  aplican una comisión total del 12,4% a todas las colaboraciones hechas por los ""crowdfunders"", en otras palabras, el proyecto Innodor solo recibe el 87,6% tha cada colaboración. Este hecho puede afectar de 2 maneras al proyecto:

column1: • Si la campaña se completa totalmente cada colaborador recibirá el kit/kits Innodor como recompensa como estaba previsto.

• Si la campaña no se completa cada colaborador recibirá un reembolso de la cantidad total que ha llegado al proyecto (87,6%). Por ejemplo, si haces una contribución de 99 € y el proyecto no llega a su meta recibirás un reembolso de 86,72 €.
Inaid will make best effort to provide the reward but delivery it is not guaranteed.
column5:
>Gratefulness / Agradecimientos

Hope you like this project and help me promoting this idea around the world. As you know, the crisis hit terribly Spain and other countries so now is the time to really use the wit to continue forward. With a little of your help it may be possible to keep on my company and my job. And who knows, if things go well I could generate some jobs and help other people too.  

Thank you so much for your time and interest!
column6: >Espero que os guste  y me ayudéis a promocionar esta idea por todo el mundo. Como sabéis, la crisis ha golpeado terriblemente España y otros países por lo que ahora es el momento de utilizar el ingenio para salir adelante. Con un poco de vuestra ayuda puede ser posible mantener mi empresa y mi trabajo. Y quien sabe, si las cosas van bien podría generar algunos puestos de trabajo y ayudar a otra gente.

column1: ¡Muchísimas gracias por vuestro tiempo e interés!

Y puedes tirar de la cadena manualmente como siempre si lo deseas.What is needed / Qué se necesitaA completely functional prototype is designed and fabricated so the next step is to start a preproduction serie of Innodor. This phase implies a lot of steps including injection molding, pcb fabrication, pcb assembly, system assembly, electromagnetic compatibility tests, electronic components, etc, etc, etc, so an estimation of the total cost was made to make this project alive. Se ha diseñado y fabricado un prototipo completamente funcional por lo que el siguiente paso es lanzar una preserie de Innodor. Esta fase implica muchos pasos en los que se incluyen la fabricación de moldes de inyección, fabricación y ensamblaje de circuitos, ensamblaje del sistema, pruebas de compatibilidad electromagnética, componentes electrónicos, etc, etc, etc, por lo que se ha realizado una estimación del gasto necesario para hacer realidad este proyecto.The most unavoidable and expensive step is the fabrication of the moulds for the plastic pieces of Innodor. 5 moulds are needed to fabricate all plastic parts with the cost of about 15.000-18.000 €. The electromagnetic compatibility tests (EMC) costs about 4.000-5.000 €. Apart from this, each Innodor kit needs obviously electric and electronic material to work so this one must be added to the total amount. In other hand, Indiegogo charges a 9% fee to the investment made by crowdfunders and paypal other 3,4% so keeping this in mind and trying to offer ""affordable"" perks, the final amount needed to cover the fabrication of a pre-serie is about 45.000 € and 450 units.El inevitable y más costoso paso es la fabricación de los moldes para Innodor. Son necesarios 5 moldes para fabricar todas las piezas de plástico con un coste entre 15.000-18.000 €. Las pruebas de compatibilidad electromagnéticas (EMC)cuestan unos 4.000-5.000 €. Además de esto, cada kit Innodor necesita material eléctrico y electrónico para funcionar por lo que esto se ha de añadir a la cantidad total. Por otro lado, Indiegogo aplica un 9% de comisión a las inversiones de los crowdfunders y paypal otro 3,4% por lo que teniendo en cuenta e intentando ofrecer colaboraciones ""asumibles"", la cantidad final que es necesaria para fabricar una pre-serie es de unos 45.000 € y 450 unidades.If it doesn't reach 100% / Si no llega al 100% As I explained before, Indiegogo and Paypal applies a total of 12,4% fee to all perks made by crowdfunders, in other words, Innodor project receives only the 87,6% of the each perk. This fact can affect the project in 2 ways:
If the campaign is completely funded each crowdfunder will receive the recompense kit/kits of Innodor as expected.

If the campaign is not funded each crowdfunder will receive a refund of the total amount arrived to the project (87,6%). For example, if you made a contribution with 99 € and the project doesn't reach the goal you will receive back 86,72 €.

Como he explicado antes, Indiegogo y Paypal  aplican una comisión total del 12,4% a todas las colaboraciones hechas por los ""crowdfunders"", en otras palabras, el proyecto Innodor solo recibe el 87,6% tha cada colaboración. Este hecho puede afectar de 2 maneras al proyecto:
Si la campaña se completa totalmente cada colaborador recibirá el kit/kits Innodor como recompensa como estaba previsto.

Si la campaña no se completa cada colaborador recibirá un reembolso de la cantidad total que ha llegado al proyecto (87,6%). Por ejemplo, si haces una contribución de 99 € y el proyecto no llega a su meta recibirás un reembolso de 86,72 €.

Inaid will make best effort to provide the reward but delivery it is not guaranteed.Gratefulness / AgradecimientosHope you like this project and help me promoting this idea around the world. As you know, the crisis hit terribly Spain and other countries so now is the time to really use the wit to continue forward. With a little of your help it may be possible to keep on my company and my job. And who knows, if things go well I could generate some jobs and help other people too.  Thank you so much for your time and interest!Espero que os guste  y me ayudéis a promocionar esta idea por todo el mundo. Como sabéis, la crisis ha golpeado terriblemente España y otros países por lo que ahora es el momento de utilizar el ingenio para salir adelante. Con un poco de vuestra ayuda puede ser posible mantener mi empresa y mi trabajo. Y quien sabe, si las cosas van bien podría generar algunos puestos de trabajo y ayudar a otra gente.
¡Muchísimas gracias por vuestro tiempo e interés!",15.0,1,"1 Campaign

The app has 10 reminders: smile, breathe, stretch, listen, pause, love, trust, give thanks, have fun and feel the force. Pick the one you like or set the app to ""random"" and once a day, at a random time, your re-minder pops up on your mobile device encouraging you to take a deep breathe and enjoy the moment!
These mindful moments can be a private affair or you can share them via facebook and twitter along with a snapshot.
The re-mindful app is a part of the re-mindful project and the re-mindful project is dedicated to the idea of ""mindfulness for everyone"".

Yoga, meditation and mindfulness are proving to be great ways to improve the quality of life but not everyone has the time or interest to use these tools. ""Mindfulness for everyone"" means finding ways to bring the benefits of mindfulness to everyone, everywhere. In our tech rich, modern lives .... mobile phones seemed like a good place to start.

""Mindfulness for everyone"" also means calling attention to the mindfulness that we all naturally develop in our lives. Enjoying ""the moment"" is something we have all done without being taught how .... maybe as a child or in times of relaxation. To reap the health benefit of this natural mindfulness, maybe all that is needed is to recognize what we already do .... breathe, smile, love, feel the force, etc?

For me re-mindful is simply about feeling good! I know, if I take even just one deep breath, my day just got a lot better! Stressed, tired, distracted, over worked and a little freaked out about the state of the world ..... it’s easy to forget that little trick. I like to think of re-mindful as a design solution for the pace of modern life.
The re-mindful app is in the Apple App Store now! So if you have a iPhone, iPod or iPad .... check it out. It's free! Oh and if you enjoy it .... thanks in advance for your glowing review!
The plan from the get go was to built the app for Android as well as Apple. Unfortunately we have run out of $$. The funds from this campaign will be used to build the app for Android devices.
With your contibution ($10 or more), you get 20 re-mindful stickers to keep or give away!

With your contibution ($30 or more), you get the re-mindful logo t-shirt .... the re-mindful logo with the 10 reminders on a royal blue tee. This shirt is lite weight, a little stretchy and has a flattering fit. Women's and men's specific sizing and cut. The S and XS sizes work well for kids.
If you would rather have a hoody, an organic tee, a long sleeve tee, a tank top, an apron, etc ..... check out our great designs and products at the re-mindful store.
SO, if you like the idea of re-mindful ….. press the pink ""contribute now"" and please tell everyone you know about re-mindful by sharing this page!

re-mindful on IndieGOGO FAQs

Short Summary

Please take a look on the movie. In the last days in Romania a plane was landed forced and all passengers survived. They were doctors who were in mission to save a life.

One person called to 112, but they could not register the GPS coordinates.

They started to look after them in chaotic manner. After 6 hours they find out the survivors. Unfortunately two persons died  because they were not localized precised.

Our Goal is to create an mobile application with a Panic button which could call and send SMS with GPS coordinates to different numbers which were set before.

What We Need &
column2:
What You Get

We need the money to create:

* one Android and one IOS applications with widgets
column4:
The Perks is that everybody will could have installed the applications and this could save life in the end in critical situations.

PLAN:
column5:
>Scope:

- Mobile Application which could call and send SMS in a fastest way
column6: - It could be used in critical situation to call 112 / 911 or another number: attacks, ills, panic situation, accidents
column9: - Settings: GPS, WIFI, number for calling, SMS numbers (could be more) with a preformed messages + GPS coordinate + 3g cell info + wifi info
column11: - Widget which could be added to one screen

column1:
In configuration phase the user has to configure the call number and SMS number. Put on a screen the widget with a big button.

In the moment that you press the button you can have a confirmation message / button (configurable) and the phone starting to call the number with speaker on.

In the same time the GPS and WIFI are activated. After a while SMSs are send with data (GPS, WIFI, 3g Cell info).

Cancel button is active immediately.


The Impact

SAVE LIFE! 

Few seconds could be To BE or not To BE!

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help:
• Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.

And that’s all there is to it.

Additional Perk Details 

Love Foundation

Perk purchases will be donated to Love's Foundation. Supporters who donate $100 and up will have their names placed on a special page that will be built into the app recognizing them as Founding Donors. The concept for ""5
For Friends"" would never have originated if my wife and I had not
experienced the devastating loss of our 3<sup>rd</sup> child,
Love Speed. In honor of Love we have formed Love’s Foundation in support of
families who have experienced early infant loss. The Foundations initial purpose will
be to raise funds to support families by assisting them with hospital costs to lighten that burden while they grieve.

Pre-Purchase ""5 For Friends"" - It's Forever Free! 

""5 For Friends"" will be a subscription based service. The service will cost $0.99/year after a free 1 year trial for the basic version and $2.99/year for the premium version. 

However, campaign supporters that pre-purchase the app by choosing the $5 Perk or higher will receive a special promo code to receive ""5 For Friends"" for FREE Forever. Be sure to tell 5 of your closest friends and family to take advantage of this special deal so that you can talk for Free Forever on the app!! This offer will never be available again so take advantage now!

column1:
Aparicio ""Reese"" Giddins - Co-Founder/COO

I like Scott am an entrepreneur. I have always had this vision of being at the intersection of technology and the pursuit of happiness. We are now seeing how technology can play a major role in the lives of so many people. That is why I love this concept and agreed to join this journey with Scott to carry the vision to bring people closer together. I cannot wait until this app has reached the market. I think it will take off in a similar fashion to some pretty popular apps.

column2: >A friend once said to me, ""I feel like I'm losing one of my closest friends. We never have time to talk anymore."" She suggested that we make sure we text each other at least once a day. However, texting doesn't allow people to hear real human emotions like a smile in ones voice, the sorrow in ones heart, or the sounds of laughter. I truly believe that this app will enhance and enrich the lives of so many people by actually putting the ""social"" back into social networking. I'm excited to see it hit the App Store and for people to truly connect again.

>When Scott introduced me to the concept of 5 for friends, my sentiments immediately were, ingenious! I was instantly excited about how he envisioned a new techy idea that is able to capture the nostalgic feel of actually reaching out and touching someone. New technology, true innovation, real voice conversations. I can’t wait to see ""5 for Friends"" on the app store soon!

>I truly believe ""5 for Friends"" will be a game changer in the world of communication. In fact, Scott's idea has already inspired me to reach out to friends via phone to share messages of congratulations and condolences.  I am excited to see ""5 for Friends"" materialize into a mode to help people better connect by taking the guesswork out of staying in touch!

>I have always been not so great with keeping up with friends and family. It seems as if there is never enough time in my schedule. When Scott introduced me to his amazing vision for ""5 for friends"", I immediately knew that it was the solution to this communication dilemma that I along with many others face. I am so excited to see it come into fruition!

A friend once said to me, ""I feel like I'm losing one of my closest friends. We never have time to talk anymore."" She suggested that we make sure we text each other at least once a day. However, texting doesn't allow people to hear real human emotions like a smile in ones voice, the sorrow in ones heart, or the sounds of laughter. New technology, true innovation, real voice conversations. I can’t wait to see ""5 for Friends"" on the app store soon!

I truly believe ""5 for Friends"" will be a game changer in the world of communication. In fact, Scott's idea has already inspired me to reach out to friends via phone to share messages of congratulations and condolences.  I am excited to see ""5 for Friends"" materialize into a mode to help people better connect by taking the guesswork out of staying in touch!

I have always been not so great with keeping up with friends and family. It seems as if there is never enough time in my schedule. When Scott introduced me to his amazing vision for ""5 for friends"", I immediately knew that it was the solution to this communication dilemma that I along with many others face. I am so excited to see it come into fruition!

I was so excited when Scott introduced me to ""5 For Friends""! There is nothing out here like it. I think that it will help a lot of people who are busy like me stay in touch with family and friends seamlessly. I can't wait for this app to come out!",16.0,0,"1 Campaign
The Sentry™PowerPad is a unique personal power system that can be used to charge your personal electronic devices

Sentry PowerPad can Power your iPad and other electronic devices without ever needing to be plugged in.  It uses advanced technology to generate electricity and charge your devices.  Imagine never having to pay for electrictity to charge your devices again!

We are first and foremost innovators. We are looking to change and more importantly improve the world through technology. We have typically focused on military and government products/services in the areas of greentech, biotech and intelligence.

We are looking to expand into the civilian market segments by bringing relevant high quality tech to retail markets. We love the Indiegogo platform because it gives us something we rarely get, feedback on a large scale. By utilizing Indiegogo to fund projects we can readily discuss with you, the consumer, what tech you like and what tech you would like to see more of. This is very exciting to us as it creates a collaborate effort among all of us sharing this planet. We can work together to improve the globe environmentally and geopolitically. We cant wait to get started with you.

We have designed, redesigned and reimagined Sentry™ many times during the past 12 months, pouring countless hours into thinking about the user experience, the technical aspects of the project and how to deliver the world's smartest and cleanest power source to you at an affordable price point. You can help bring The UAT Sentry™ Alternative Power System-Civilian Power Pad (SAPS-CPP) to the world by being the very first to own them!
What is UAT Sentry™ Alternative Power System-Civilian Power Pad?

The UAT Sentry™ Alternative Power System-Civilian Power Pad is a thermodynamic silent power supply that does not need to be charged or plugged in. Ever! Our civilian Sentry™ can use ambient temperature and conductive heat exchange from your tablet to generate electricity to power your electronic devices. Utilizing cyclic compression and expansion or more specifically, a closed-cycle regenerative thermodynamic power system.
- Ease with which it can be used in almost any environment.

This compatibility with alternative and renewable energy sources has become increasingly significant as the price of electricity and conventional fuels rises, as well as concerns such as peak oil and climate change.
While simply turning off household electronic devices can save each household thousands of pounds of carbon dioxide each year, it is not necessarily practical.

A study by the KTH Royal Institute of Technology in Stockholm reveals the fact that our love affair with electronics is contributing almost as much to global warming pollution as the entire airline industry. The study shows that the combined telecommunication, media and entertainment sectors are responsible for roughly 3% of all greenhouse gas emissions, as compared to 4-5% for the airline industry when all of its supporting infrastructure is included.

This can be broken down to 1.3% for the IT and telecommunications sector and 1.7% for the media and entertainment sector. Together the two sectors contribute some 1.4 billion tons of CO2 equivalent emissions, based on 2007 data. That wasn’t very long ago, but long enough for some segments, such as cell phones to grow by an additional 50% since then.
While device efficiency continues to improve, it remains to be seen whether that will ever be enough to keep up with the enormous number of new users coming online every day.

According to an article in Discover published in 2010, a stunning 57% of all the energy produced in the US is wasted, through inefficiencies and losses in the system. Clearly this remains an enormous opportunity to improve those sectors that are contributing in double-digit percentages to our carbon footprint, such as transportation and buildings. Using information technology for data collection and control and to generally work smarter in these sectors surely will provide savings far in excess of the additional power required.

Digital delivery of content for e-readers is a rapidly expanding market. Many assume that, because trees aren't being cut down and used to manufacture paper for books, e-readers (including the Kindle™, Nook™, iPad™, and the like) are a greener way to read books and magazines. But a broader look at the use of these devices that includes the life-cycle of the e-readers themselves paints a much bleaker picture about how green they really are.

Considering the carbon emissions for an average adult reader who reads 6.5 books per year. Paperback books have a footprint of 26 kilograms (over 57 pounds) of CO2, as compared to just under 70 grams (about 0.15 pounds) for the e-reader. But the tables are turned drastically when the carbon footprint of the reader is added in. The carbon footprint for this average reader is almost identical (130 kilograms or 285 pounds) when expanded over 5 years.

But how many people still use 5-year old electronic devices? Assuming a 2-year replacement cycle, the chart shows that the iPad™ carbon footprint outstrips that for the print reader, and even the more efficient iPad2 has more than double the emissions over a 5 year period. High-volume readers and those who hold on to their electronic devices for longer periods may make the e-reader a more suitable choice, but technological alternatives aren't always all their proponents would like consumers to believe.
How much does it currently cost me to charge my devices without the Sentry™ Power Pad?
The Electric Power Research Institute (EPRI) found that it cost $1.36 for the electricity needed annually to power a tablet or just under $3 if you are a heavy user and need juicing up every day.

EPRI’s lab tests reveal that each iPad™ model consumes less than 12 kWh of power in a year -- based on a full charge every other day. Meanwhile, running an iPhone 5 will result in a power cost of $.41 annually at 3.8 kWh.

Apple has sold more than 67 million iPads since 2010, so EPRI calculations put the energy use of all iPads ever sold at 590 GWh. It is widely assumed that this number will triple over the next two years
column2: this consumption is the near equivalent of two 250 megawatt power plants operating at 50 percent capacity, the analysis estimates.

column1: This equates to roughly 787 GWh (787,000,000 Kilowatt-hours) annually or the equivalent of anyone of the following results(according to epa.gov):
555,268 Metric Tons of CO2 - Carbon Dioxide or CO2 Equivalent
Annual greenhouse gas emissions from 115,681 passenger vehicles.
CO2 emissions from 62,249,759 gallons of gasoline consumed.
CO2 emissions from 1,291,321 barrels of oil consumed.
CO2 emissions from 7,324 tanker trucks’ worth of gasoline.
CO2 emissions from the electricity use of 83,124 homes for one year.
CO2 emissions from the energy use of 28,578 homes for one year.
Carbon sequestered by 14,237,637 tree seedlings grown for 10 years?
Carbon sequestered annually by 455,138 acres of pine or fir forests.
Carbon sequestered annually by 4,287 acres of forest preserved from deforestation.
CO2 emissions from 23,136,160 propane cylinders used for home barbeques.
CO2 emissions from burning 2,386 railcars’ worth of coal.
Greenhouse gas emissions avoided by recycling 207,965 tons of waste instead of sending it to the landfill.
Annual CO2 emissions of 0.157 coal fired power plants.
In 2009, a total of 457 power plants used coal to generate at least 95% of their electricity (EPA 2012). These plants emitted 1,614,625,638.1metric tons of CO2 in 2009.

Carbon dioxide emissions per power plant were calculated by dividing the total emissions from power plants whose primary source of fuel was coal by the number of power plants. 1,614,625,638.1 metric tons of CO2 × 1/457 power plants = 3,533,098 metric tons CO2/power plant
If every tablet user was given a Sentry™ Power Pad we could negate the entire annual carbon emissions of Canada!

The UAT Sentry™ Alternative Power System or Power Pad never needs to be charged or plugged in. It generates enough electricity to charge your tablet or various personal electronic mobile devices for FREE! (excluding the retail cost of the power pad itself)
What can I do with my Sentry Power Pad?
Charge your iPad™ or any other personal tablet
Charge your iPod™ or any mp3 player

Manage your free electricity with The free Sentry™ App which will be available on the App Store and Google Play and we also have plans for a Windows, Mac and Linux app. If we achieve our goal we'll fast track the development of these apps across each platform.

The Sentry™ app is one of our favorite aspects of the entire project, and we've spent countless hours thinking about how you can interact with your Power Pad so that you can calculate how much CO2 emissions you have prevented from being released, manage your usage and control output.

A first generation civilian Power Pad to power your tablet, cell phone and many other electronic devices in your home or business. Oh, and basically unlimited free electricity to power all your personal electronic devices. For life!

We are preparing more details on the above designs and other options that will be available in the next few weeks including dimensions, colors and more. The more pledges we receive the more options will be available. Please direct message us if you have a preference for casing style/type that is not on the above list.

One of the things we love about the Indiegogo process and community is it allows people like us to crowd source funding but more importantly gives us access to direct and real-time feedback from consumers and supporters like you. We are committed to creating the world’s best, most advanced products and will adjust our thinking and approach to achieve this. Given the overwhelming response to our product we are also now planning to create a blog and Indiegogo hotline to include you on design changes and improvements!! Thanks again for your support - we're glad we can share this journey with you.
All UAT products are designed and manufactured here in the United States.
We are ready for full production with your support
So where are we in this whole process? We’ve:
• Formed an strategic team in New Jersey, California and Texas
• Engineered the system to be mass-manufactured
• Tested a wide range of material formulations
• Written and optimized thousands of lines of code
• Tested a production run of alpha units

We’re nearly ready to set up full-scale manufacturing to get your Sentry Power Pad delivered as soon as possible. We take this last crucial step seriously, and we’ll need a lot of support to do the job right. That’s why we’ve turned to Indiegogo to get the production lines up and running!

If you decide to pitch in, you’ll get a discount and be one of the first to have our product on your desktop. But more importantly, you’ll play a huge part in starting this revolution in clean energy. We can’t wait to see you walking down the street or on a bus using your Sentry Power Pad!
Similar to many Indiegogo projects, we face several key risks and challenges in sparking this revolution in free energy. The primary risks for us include:

To achieve the level of simplicity in user experience that we have, we have to design and engineer a very complex system. We have taken two key steps to ensure our engineering success. 1) We have formed an amazing team of engineers and designers, and 2) we test our products with an obsession for perfection. In the last year, we have built prototypes, we will have a run of beta machines with significant user testing, and we keep enormous amounts of data to guide our future work.

Many Indiegogo campaigns can encounter problems when taking their prototypes to production. This includes issues finding suppliers and engineering products for mass-production. Smooth execution is absolutely essential to overcoming such risks. We take this lesson seriously and have been working for months negotiating with suppliers, testing component quality, and building a team that can execute on our promises. Our plans are nearly in place, and we now mainly require the resources to execute them.

Finding the right people is a challenge for any endeavor. Success in alternative energy sectors requires a team of talented, passionate, and motivated designers, engineers, and entrepreneurs. We have already formed a truly remarkable team, but we will have to bring in more team members to realize this dream. In fact, we are actively looking for new members to join UAT and hit the ground running! Check out our website for more information www.umbraappliedtechnologies.com.
Dont forget to support our friends at https://support.woundedwarriorproject.org and www.employagi.org

“NFC” - BEAM CARD ! The tiny card with big capabilities!

Don’t have one of the newest and COSTLY smartphones that comes with NFC/Contactless communication Ability? Not to worry! With NFC-Beam Card EVERY phone (both old and new) with a microSD slot can be retrofitted with “Beam” Contactless Technology. Now you too can “Bump” phones to exchange data, “Beam” contactless payment and much more!

With present day technologies moving forward at light speeds, and new innovations and technologies being invented, we all see lots of new devices and gadgets with awesome capabilities. These new devices and gadgets come with a medium to high price-tag/cost, and not everyone can readily “foot the bill” to get these new gadgets with new features, even though we all want those features.

These new gadgets also make us aware that our current gadgets are becoming “old school”, because they do not have the new technologies, features and capabilities that the new ones bring with them. Some updates and upgrades can be performed on our current-gadgets to keep them in vogue and up to speed with the new-gadgets, but not all kind of upgrades are possible, especially not “hardware upgrades”.
One simple example/device that comes to mind is the mobile phone. Today’s mobile phone is called a “smart” phone
column2: few years ago, a mobile phone was simple called a “Phone”, “mobile phone” or “cell-phone”, but with the technology, features and capabilities that today’s phones ""pack"", it has to be “smart”.

column1: One feature/capability in today’s Smartphone that’s becoming a trend and the “talk of the town” is the Contactless/Near-Field-Communication feature. We’ve all heard of it, and we know what it’s about, some people more than others. (http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Near_field_communication gives a good brief explanation and insight). Only the latest smartphone’s come ready with Contactless/NFC technology, and since the Contactless/NFC Technology actually requires certain hardware-microchips to be embedded in the smartphone, it is not possible to perform an “upgrade” on “current and older” phones, at least up until now, thanks to the “Beam-Card”.

With Beam-Card any and all current and older phones with a SD-card-slot (standard, mini or micro) can be easily and readily equipped and retrofitted with the Contactless/Short Range Wireless Technology! Now, everyone can “Bump” phones and “Beam” data, with their current and old phones, without having to buy a brand new (and costly) phone! The Opportunities made possible by Beam-Card are endless! We’ll touch on the possibilities below.
The image above outlines some of the various applications of Beam-Card.

We have come a long way since the ideas for the product came to us and now we need your help and support to manufacture the Beam Card product and take it to the world. We'll ensure you get the Beam Card from the first batches out of manufacturing, and before anyone else does.

Currently, contactless payments is the major area/field in which Contactless/NFC technology is focused on, so because of this, we have focused our priority development/implementation for the Beam-Card on the contactless payments area/field, and will work on enabling other Application areas and prospects in the near future.

For our donors/contributors and early supporters ONLY, for only $100, we will give you one developer’s license/access to the product’s developers-codes you need without restrictions (except as necessary and to prevent misuse)
column2: so go ahead and donate/support today with only $100 for this awesome “time limited” access offer!

column1: WHAT WILL THE FUNDS BE USED FOR?

The funds will be used for manufacturing the Product mainly (i.e. Beam Card), to cover shipping and logistics from the manufacturer’s factory, and to complete the Software/Apps that will interface with the product on phones.

If the funding goal is reached and exceeded, the additional funds will allow us to quickly commence working on enabling other Application areas and functionality of the Beam-Card, thereby allowing users to perform other possible functions.

We have a working product and are ready for manufacturing. Pending successful funding, we should be able to have the factory/manufacturing-run begin within One to Two months from when we receive funding. Manufacturing and Packaging should take about a Month, and shipping will be right afterwards. We anticipate and aim to get products to our supporters and contributors by Nov/Dec 2013.

With all technology there are always risks, and one of the main risk/issue which we have is that of the capacity/capability of present day’s technology when it comes to achieving the possible functionality(ies) and memory capacity which we intend, on the very-small form-factor of the micro-SD-card
column2: (basically, it gets more difficult to achieve a higher memory space while also having the micro-chip(s) onboard the micro-SD-card necessary in order to provide the contactless/NFC-related feature). In addition, we are at a position/point where another main issue for us is the delay/lack of the available sufficient funding to manufacture and get the project/product to the market, and thus officially launch our company
column3: (basically in order to keep manufacturing costs reasonable, we need to attain certain manufacturing quantities).

column1: WHAT ELSE CAN YOU DO TO HELP?

We know it is not always possible to contribute funds, but you can help us considerably if you can share, forward and post our campaign link to your networks via Facebook, Twitter, Tumblr, Reddit or any other social media outlet. If you do contribute funds, we would be additionally grateful to you if you would still help us forward and post our campaign link to your social networks.
Thank you very much for your support.
I forgot to add shipping!  What should I do?
Please select/contribute the shipping amount ($10), and we will match your contributions up.
I have more questions. Who do I ask?

column3:
>

Currently, contactless payments is the major area/field in which Contactless/NFC technology is focused on, so because of this, we have focused our priority development/implementation for the Beam-Card on the contactless payments area/field, and will work on enabling other Application areas and prospects in the near future.

For our donors/contributors and early supporters ONLY, for only $100, we will give you one developer’s license/access to the product’s developers-codes you need without restrictions (except as necessary and to prevent misuse)
column2: so go ahead and donate/support today with only $100 for this awesome “time limited” access offer!

column1: WHAT WILL THE FUNDS BE USED FOR?

The funds will be used for manufacturing the Product mainly (i.e. Beam Card), to cover shipping and logistics from the manufacturer’s factory, and to complete the Software/Apps that will interface with the product on phones.

If the funding goal is reached and exceeded, the additional funds will allow us to quickly commence working on enabling other Application areas and functionality of the Beam-Card, thereby allowing users to perform other possible functions.

We have a working product and are ready for manufacturing. Pending successful funding, we should be able to have the factory/manufacturing-run begin within One to Two months from when we receive funding. Manufacturing and Packaging should take about a Month, and shipping will be right afterwards. We anticipate and aim to get products to our supporters and contributors by Nov/Dec 2013.

With all technology there are always risks, and one of the main risk/issue which we have is that of the capacity/capability of present day’s technology when it comes to achieving the possible functionality(ies) and memory capacity which we intend, on the very-small form-factor of the micro-SD-card
column2: (basically, it gets more difficult to achieve a higher memory space while also having the micro-chip(s) onboard the micro-SD-card necessary in order to provide the contactless/NFC-related feature). In addition, we are at a position/point where another main issue for us is the delay/lack of the available sufficient funding to manufacture and get the project/product to the market, and thus officially launch our company
column3: (basically in order to keep manufacturing costs reasonable, we need to attain certain manufacturing quantities).

column1: WHAT ELSE CAN YOU DO TO HELP?

We know it is not always possible to contribute funds, but you can help us considerably if you can share, forward and post our campaign link to your networks via Facebook, Twitter, Tumblr, Reddit or any other social media outlet. If you do contribute funds, we would be additionally grateful to you if you would still help us forward and post our campaign link to your social networks.
Thank you very much for your support.
I forgot to add shipping!  What should I do?
Please select/contribute the shipping amount ($10), and we will match your contributions up.
I have more questions. Who do I ask?
Please Contact us directly at “beamit@paycircle.com""",0.0,0,"1 Campaign

Contu is a simple yet cleverly designed phone case that protects your mobile phone from bending in your pocket.

Imagine this: you've just bought a new phone that has just been released or are considering to get one, and you chance upon viral videos of the phone going through the 'bend test'. Let's face it, the aluminium back cover is a soft material that bends easily with slight pressure applied. To protect your phone, you can choose bumper/armour cases that are heavily padded for shock absorption.

Such cases are massive to fit into pockets and are a hassle taking them around. A real bummer indeed! We have compromised with the available selection of phone cases in the market. But that was all before the introduction of CONTU.

New phones are made of lightweight materials like aluminium.

column1: However, aluminium bends easily at its weak points, typically at the button
cut-outs. We are doubtful the phone will survive well in your pockets!
As smartphone users ourselves, we wanted something clean and simple for our
phones. Something that is not clunky to carry around. Rather than settling for
less, we worked to created something pretty awesome for your phones.

We borrowed lessons from nature and applied them to mobile phones that we use on a day-to-day basis. We mapped the stress points of every phone and applied incremental contours. Graduated terrace steps add to structural rigidity of the phone case that will increase strength at stress points in mobile phones (generally found at button cut-outs).

CONTU uses a terracing design to help distribute stress throughout the phone. The gradual steps stack up more at weaker points found on the phone. What this means is that we are increasing strength at areas that need additional protection without making it too bulky to fit in your pockets.
THE MAKING OF:
CONTU cases, we utilized 3D printing because of its benefits as listed:
Customizability of cases to incorporate our terracing design and
Porous nature of the plastic helps to create a gradient effect
from dyeing so that every phone case is one of a kind
Ability to materialize complex designs so that we are able to
fabricate every case to its most precise dimensions (accurate to 0.01 microns)
Ability to maintain structural strength from its incremental contours
Tool-less - we reduce the need for mould casting which means
that the cost and lead times are kept to a minimum

column5: >After mapping the stress points of the phones, we send them to

column1: our vendor for 3D printing, dye the plain phone cases

As a group of individuals who loves to challenge the norm with the goal of improving the performance of current products, CONTU is our take of incorporating design aesthetics and functionality in one. Each case is crafted and handmade with different colours to choose from - adding the human touch and support to where it is needed. Hurray to the end of clunky phone cases!
We are ready to ship 3 months after packing and assembling packages at the end of this campaign. Rest assured that we will expedite your orders!

These are some colour variations that we have experimented with. Do indicate the colour choice that you prefer. However, do note that as we lovingly hand dye individual pieces, the colours may vary slightly.

column5: >We are realizing our dreams to develop this value-adding product

column1: and are certain that you will need this in your lives. Besides, CONTU will be a
small cost users pay to protect their phones. With your help, we are thrilled
to see CONTU materialize and set the new standard for protective cases. This
will be the first milestone for us to achieve and we see this sparking future
phases for CONTU to extend to other equipment you wish to protect.
If you like our project, help us realize it by funding us.
This is our maiden project launched on Indiegogo. We might not
have the experience from previous projects but are very confident of using 3D
printers as a medium of fabrication. This confidence comes from the fact that we
have done up CONTU's prototypes successfully and received favourable market
feedback from anyone we know (our professors, peers, friends and family).
We will also simplify the manufacturing process by working with
a reliable manufacturer that we have had recurring transactions with. That
being said, we are confident to overcome the minor challenges.

Safely add permanent outlets to any room
HardWirePro turns a single outlet into multiple outlets around the room. Add more outlets to high demand areas in older homes, apartments, cellars, garages, dorm rooms, and offices.
Installs in minutes in your home or business!

Leave those outdated conduit channels and clunky outlet boxes behind! Electrical contractors, property management companies and do-it-yourselfers can add electricity to any room without rewiring interior walls.
• An estimated 3,300 residential fires originate from extension cords each year, killing and injuring over 300 people.
• Continual use can cause the insulation to rapidly deteriorate, creating a dangerous shock and fire hazard.
• Numerous fractures and sprains are caused by people tripping over the cords.
The Electrical Safety Foundation International recommends that extension cords only be used on a temporary basis
column2: unplug them after every use. A heavy reliance on extension cords means you don't have enough outlets. See more at: esfi.org

column1: Made of VO flame rated, non-flammable materials, HardWirePro can be safely used for any 15 amp application.

Participants in this Indiegogo campaign have the opportunity to pre-order patented HardWire Pro systems at a discounted price. There are a variety of kits available for common uses: adding additional outlets to an old house, entertainment center or college dorm room, or extending the reach of an outlet from one wall to another.

The Contractor Kit offers property management companies, electrical contractors and other professionals everything they need to get started installing HardWire Pro at scale, dramatically reducing the time it takes to add outlets to any facility.
Here's where we are now: We have completed the design phase and been granted two patents for the HardWire Pro MultiOutlet Power System. Prototypes have been manufactured.
The money we raise going forward will be used for final tooling work, UL certification and the initial production runs, with the goal of delivering HardWire Pro units in mid-2015.

In addition to pre-selling product, the Elantric Corporation is using this campaign to offer investors a chance to purchase shares in the company. To give ourselves the most options to make the best product at the best price, for the most profit, we are seeking to raise an additional $250,000-$500,000 from private investors.
You can read our Prospectus here.
We are exploring a number of manufacturing scenarios that will deliver a product next year:

If we reach our funding goal of $250,000 to $500,000, we will be able to manufacture the HardWire Pro on our own terms, in the United States. We will sell it direct to end users on our website [hardwirepro.com] as well as wholesale to electrical contractors and appropriate retail accounts.

If we reach our $50,000 funding goal on Indiegogo but are not able to raise additional venture capital, we will partner with one or more OEM manufacturers to produce and distribute the product under their brand for a royalty fee. Under this scenario, there is no guarantee the product will be 100% Made in America.

HardWire Pro delivers power where it's most needed, giving everyone a way to permanently replace dangerous and ugly extension cords. We believe our product makes the world a safer place by reducing the risk of electrical fires. There's nothing like it on the market today.

Once we conquer the US with this powerful idea, we will begin an all-out effort to change the world! There is a great need for electrical solutions that are inexpensive, safe and easy to install, especially in developing countries, making our patented technology a perfect fit for homes and businesses around the globe.

Thank you for checking us out.
We are creating this loyalty software program + app because I
discovered the need for it while running my restaurant. I have a lot of beer to
sell (37 taps) but don’t have an exciting way to track purchases and reward people for
trying them. We do fundraisers quite often and have great specials but it can
be difficult to get the word out and get the turnout we would like. Imagine
having a loyalty program and app where several businesses in your town post all the great stuff
they have going on. And when you travel you can find all of those great things
too. The more KlubHub is used the better tool it will become for businesses and
out there but not like this one. This one serves a few purposes.
• Lets you earn rewards where you shop.
<li>Lets you explore specials, sales and events in
your area and where you travel.
<li>Lets you see where you rank loyalty-wise with everyone
else who shops where you do.
• Never carry or lose punchcards or loyalty cards again.
• Store all your loyalty points in one place, your phone.
• Just click one button to have points awarded to your account.
<li>And in version 2, much more will be added. Anyone that
contributes will get updates and will be offered the opportunity to give
• Share your specials, sales and events effectively.
• Access customer analytics with our comprehensive dashboard.
<li>And in version 2, much more will be added. Anyone that
contributes will get updates and will be offered the opportunity to give
So here is the deal. We are raising
this money to pay for the development of the loyalty software program + app. It started out as just a beer
club app to increase beer sales at my restaurant, Loggers Tap House, and share
it with other bars around the US and the rest of the world. But from the
original idea, it grew into something much better and more expensive to make.
At this point I’m out of money and would really like to get this app finished
up. It is set to launch at the end of September.
I truly believe this is going to be
a great app for small businesses and their communities. In addition to being a
business owner I am a part time business advisor providing free business advice
for folks in my community. I’m also working on a “buy local” website to help
Here is what you get. We want to
work with you. We are just a couple of guys with a good idea but we want to
take you on the journey with us. Every contributor will be on our thank you
page on our website and will be kept up-to-date on this adventure. Those who contribute
a little more will get an “I funded KlubHub” window decal. Those who increase
their contribution will get an “I funded KlubHub” t-shirt. Those contributing
$50 or more will earn free app time for their business or their favorite business.
The prize for the biggest level contribution is an opportunity to go whitewater
rafting with me, my dad, and a friend of yours. Of course that isn’t completely
selfless. I haven’t gone rafting in two years now. I spent all last summer
working on the new restaurant and I’m still struggling to make that work. This

would be a great opportunity for us all to get out and have some fun.

Goal: $30,000

Stretch Goal: $60,000. We are well on our way to developing the requirements for
version two. We’d like to get it going just after the release version one. We’ll
tell our contributors all about the great plans that we have for this loyalty
software program + app. A hint is that it will involve a lot of community
features and addition features for business owners.
KlubHub, and I have several community based project ideas. This project will
afford us the opportunity to start moving forward on those as well. We are
excited to help small businesses and their communities in the US where I served
14 years in the Army, in India where Vikram lives, and the rest of the world.
spreading the word about this app. There are a whole lot of retailers in the US
alone, 3 million actually. But we’ve got some ideas. We’ve put a marketing plan
together. Come on this journey with us and we’ll share with you.
contribute financially? I completely understand but there are opportunities to
help. Spread the word for us. Indiegogo has some great sharing tools. Share our
YouTube video. Share on Facebook and Twitter.

thank you so much for taking the time to check out our project.

What do we use our iPhones for? Well, what do we NOT use our iPhones for? 

iPhones have become an integral part of our lives, consolidating all the STUFF we used to carry in our bags into one easy, pocket-able device. With new multimedia contents and mobile apps coming out every second, you need space--lots of it--to maximize productivity and enjoyment on your iPhone. 

That is why we made i.dime, the ultimate storage expansion solution for your iPhone. When we designed i.dime, we wanted to improve upon all the existing ways in which you can get more space. And what good is extra space if you can’t share it? i.dime offers the simplest way to share and manage all your files at really affordable pricing. 

With i.dime, you can simply do more!

 

As Seen On

 

Problem
column5:
s=aa645a7f370da0b3040766a0893c83bd"" src="""" style=""""/>

A 16GB iPhone gives you around 12GB of user-accessible space. That means that even if you didn’t install a single app, store a single song or take a single photo, your shiny new iPhone can shoot just 32 minutes of 4K video.  

As technology keeps evolving, sizes of photos, videos and apps continue to increase. Do you really want to pay $100, $200 on top of the cost of a brand new iPhone to get extra storage every year or so?

Solution
column7:
showinfo=0"">

With i.dime, you can add up to 256GB of additional space to the iPhone. More real estate allows you to capture more moments, unleash your creativity and keep memories that you shared with your loved ones.  Whether you change or upgrade your device, i.dime is compatible across all the i.dime devices to stay with you throughout years to come. 

 

Dimensions

Four Capacities

Made to Share

Sharing contents to other devices is just a snap away. Whether it is a birthday video of your kid or 200 photos you took with your friends at a party last night, simply snap off the i.dime and place it on the USB holder provided. Then use it as a thumbdrive and plug it in to your computer. Lightning and micro USB holders are available as well for your tablets and non-Apple smartphones.

Blazing Speed

When the time comes to transfer your data, i.dime supports blazing fast 95MB/s read and 90MB/s write speeds. This ensures all content, whether it be 4K videos or high-resolution images, can be enjoyed with minimal lag or delay. For example, 16GB of photos and videos will take less than 3 minutes to transfer.

Does it work without the case? Absolutely.

With provided dongles that come with every purchase of an i.dime, you can simply snap i.dime on to the dongles to plug it into the bottom port of your phone to enjoy i.dime.

 

Front View

Back View

Dimensions

Design

Made of polycarbonate urethane, the slip-preventive i.dime case provides pleasant grip while protecting your phone from impacts. 

Colors

Currently, we are offering 5 different color options to choose from: 

Bottom Port Options

i.dime case comes in two options (lightning port or Micro USB port) for you to choose. 

Compatibility

column1: • i.dime case is compatible with iPhone 5, SE, 6, 6+, 6S, 6s+

• Many of you have expressed concerns whether our product will work with upcoming iPhone 7. The answer is YES, and if iPhone 7 were to launch before we begin shipping, you'll be given a choice to receive iPhone 7 case instead.

The i.dime application features intuitive user interface that makes managing your files on your i.dime and iOS effortless.

Photo/Video

  • Capture images and record videos directly onto the i.dime, rather than taking up more space on your phone.

File Manager
• Backup your native iOS contacts, photos and videos to the i.dime with a press of a single button.
• Manage files on the i.dime with full visibility of all the files stored.

Content Viewer 

View photos and video, play music and read documents of various types. i.dime app supports file formats that are not be supported by iOS including the following:
• Audio: WAV, AAC, AIF, AIFF, CAF, M4A, MP3
• Video: MP4, M4V, MPV, MOV, MKV, WMV, FLV, 3GP, GIF, AVI (subtitles as well: SRT, SUB, SBV)

column5:
s=854183b5027f59255bd7143bdcace83b"" src="""" style=""""/>

Lightning Holder

Whether it is for older generation iPhones or iPads, drop the i.dime on to the lightning holder and plug it into the lightning port to share your contents between iDevices. 

Micro USB Holder

Sharing files with Android as an Apple user has always been a nightmare. We made this holder to make cross-platform sharing completely effortless.

External Battery
column9:
s=d1a945f8570b65066cdf7bf3bb51f024"" src="""" style=""""/>

As a Charging Dock

Using the ports on the battery, you can sync and charge the phone at the same time. The battery supports 2X charge, meaning your phone will be fully juiced in half the amount of time you would need if you were just plugging it into a computer.
column11:
showinfo=0"">

As a Portable Battery

You can charge it using the i.dime port with the case on, or use the cable to charge it. Better yet, you can charge two phones simultaneously at the same time. 

  • Capacity: 4,500mAH (Charges your iPhone 6S 1.7 times over @ 2x charging speed which is same speed as the wall charger)

Keychain Holder
column15:
s=cf473f0ccd993803c8aa0590c597368a"" src="""" style=""""/>

The keychain holder (70 x 32 x 6.2 mm) allows you to securely carry up to two i.dimes and two types of dongles. The slide-out function let's you quickly access your i.dimes without any hassle.

Timeline

What People Think
column17:
showinfo=0"">

Our Story

Our team has put much thoughts into perfecting i.dime over time and had grateful and exciting moments with multiple awards including CES innovation award. 

We are very excited to finally bring i.dime to the market and strongly believe that you will like it.

Tech Specs

Special Thanks

Special thanks to music producer STUbeat KD for working many late nights with the i.dime team to create awesome soundtracks for our videos.

Spread the Word

Responsibility of Duties, Fees and Taxes

Please note that you will be responsible for any duties, fees and taxes applicable to receiving any i.dime products in your region. 

Risks and challenges

With more than 50 years of experience combined between the CEO, CTO and the Chief Designer, we have delivered multiple hardware products to the market in the past.

However, as with any newly manufactured hardware project, there are risks associated with manufacturing and supply chain that could impact the actual production time frame.

Our commitment to all our backers is that we will make every effort to deliver you a great product, on time, and will communicate with you regularly along our journey.

","What do we use our iPhones for? Well, what do we NOT use our iPhones for? iPhones have become an integral part of our lives, consolidating all the STUFF we used to carry in our bags into one easy, pocket-able device. With new multimedia contents and mobile apps coming out every second, you need space--lots of it--to maximize productivity and enjoyment on your iPhone. That is why we made i.dime, the ultimate storage expansion solution for your iPhone. When we designed i.dime, we wanted to improve upon all the existing ways in which you can get more space. And what good is extra space if you can’t share it? i.dime offers the simplest way to share and manage all your files at really affordable pricing. With i.dime, you can simply do more! As Seen On ProblemA 16GB iPhone gives you around 12GB of user-accessible space. That means that even if you didn’t install a single app, store a single song or take a single photo, your shiny new iPhone can shoot just 32 minutes of 4K video.  As technology keeps evolving, sizes of photos, videos and apps continue to increase. Do you really want to pay $100, $200 on top of the cost of a brand new iPhone to get extra storage every year or so?Solution With i.dime, you can add up to 256GB of additional space to the iPhone. More real estate allows you to capture more moments, unleash your creativity and keep memories that you shared with your loved ones.  Whether you change or upgrade your device, i.dime is compatible across all the i.dime devices to stay with you throughout years to come.  DimensionsFour CapacitiesMade to ShareSharing contents to other devices is just a snap away. Whether it is a birthday video of your kid or 200 photos you took with your friends at a party last night, simply snap off the i.dime and place it on the USB holder provided. Then use it as a thumbdrive and plug it in to your computer. Lightning and micro USB holders are available as well for your tablets and non-Apple smartphones.Blazing SpeedWhen the time comes to transfer your data, i.dime supports blazing fast 95MB/s read and 90MB/s write speeds. This ensures all content, whether it be 4K videos or high-resolution images, can be enjoyed with minimal lag or delay. For example, 16GB of photos and videos will take less than 3 minutes to transfer.Does it work without the case? Absolutely.With provided dongles that come with every purchase of an i.dime, you can simply snap i.dime on to the dongles to plug it into the bottom port of your phone to enjoy i.dime. Front ViewBack ViewDimensionsDesignMade of polycarbonate urethane, the slip-preventive i.dime case provides pleasant grip while protecting your phone from impacts. ColorsCurrently, we are offering 5 different color options to choose from: Bottom Port Optionsi.dime case comes in two options (lightning port or Micro USB port) for you to choose. Compatibility

column1: i.dime case is compatible with iPhone 5, SE, 6, 6+, 6S, 6s+

Many of you have expressed concerns whether our product will work with upcoming iPhone 7. The answer is YES, and if iPhone 7 were to launch before we begin shipping, you'll be given a choice to receive iPhone 7 case instead.

The i.dime application features intuitive user interface that makes managing your files on your i.dime and iOS effortless.Photo/VideoCapture images and record videos directly onto the i.dime, rather than taking up more space on your phone.File Manager
Backup your native iOS contacts, photos and videos to the i.dime with a press of a single button.
Manage files on the i.dime with full visibility of all the files stored.
Content Viewer View photos and video, play music and read documents of various types. i.dime app supports file formats that are not be supported by iOS including the following:
Audio: WAV, AAC, AIF, AIFF, CAF, M4A, MP3
Video: MP4, M4V, MPV, MOV, MKV, WMV, FLV, 3GP, GIF, AVI (subtitles as well: SRT, SUB, SBV)

HoldersLightning HolderWhether it is for older generation iPhones or iPads, drop the i.dime on to the lightning holder and plug it into the lightning port to share your contents between iDevices. Micro USB HolderSharing files with Android as an Apple user has always been a nightmare. We made this holder to make cross-platform sharing completely effortless.External Battery As a Charging DockUsing the ports on the battery, you can sync and charge the phone at the same time. The battery supports 2X charge, meaning your phone will be fully juiced in half the amount of time you would need if you were just plugging it into a computer.As a Portable BatteryYou can charge it using the i.dime port with the case on, or use the cable to charge it. Better yet, you can charge two phones simultaneously at the same time. Capacity: 4,500mAH (Charges your iPhone 6S 1.7 times over @ 2x charging speed which is same speed as the wall charger)Keychain Holder The keychain holder (70 x 32 x 6.2 mm) allows you to securely carry up to two i.dimes and two types of dongles. The slide-out function let's you quickly access your i.dimes without any hassle.TimelineWhat People ThinkOur StoryOur team has put much thoughts into perfecting i.dime over time and had grateful and exciting moments with multiple awards including CES innovation award. We are very excited to finally bring i.dime to the market and strongly believe that you will like it.Tech SpecsSpecial ThanksSpecial thanks to music producer STUbeat KD for working many late nights with the i.dime team to create awesome soundtracks for our videos.Spread the WordResponsibility of Duties, Fees and TaxesPlease note that you will be responsible for any duties, fees and taxes applicable to receiving any i.dime products in your region. Risks and challengesWith more than 50 years of experience combined between the CEO, CTO and the Chief Designer, we have delivered multiple hardware products to the market in the past.However, as with any newly manufactured hardware project, there are risks associated with manufacturing and supply chain that could impact the actual production time frame.Our commitment to all our backers is that we will make every effort to deliver you a great product, on time, and will communicate with you regularly along our journey.",23.0,3,"1 Campaign

column2: >Do we have a demo?

column1: What is SimplifyMe BPM?
Why this BPM App is different?
What are the modules?
(go back to menu)
Process Management. According to Wikipedia, is a field in operations management that focuses on improving
corporate performance by managing and optimizing a company's business processes.
will provide a simple example. Let's take into account the following scenario:
new office items because you are running out of inventory.
person ""A"" has to fill a form for the new request. This form will be sent
to person ""B"" who authorizes, denies or requests modifications to
this form. It's probably that you will end with a lot of printed forms and
delayed task because person ""A"" makes a lot of mistakes and forgets
A"" makes everything fine, you cannot control what he is doing, if he
is overloaded, identify and optimize bottlenecks in daily tasks, and other
important things to improve the company performance.
person “A” inputs the information in the application, a task will be assigned
to person “B” who authorizes, denies or requests modifications to the information.
When modifications are required, person ""A"" can do modifications
directly in the application and send the task several times to person
B"" for authorization. When the request is authorized, person “A”
will be able to print a PDF document which is automatically filled by the
application. In addition, you can control which tasks are delayed and send
reminders to users who have pending tasks.
(go back to menu)
SimplifyMe is a web BPM application which allows
users to design and execute business processes with their own business rules,
entirely from any major web browsers without requiring the installation of
additional plugins. It uses codeigniter as a framework and other technologies
such as bootstrap, jquery, datatables, jsplumb, among others.
Why this BPM Application is different from others?
(go back to menu)
There are a lot of BPM applications, maybe more
than 100 hundred, so why you should select this one? Here you have a list of
main key features (in parenthesis you will find the quantity of application
that might accomplish partially or completely the feature described):
using bootstrap framework, which is the most famous tool to make any website
adapt to any screen resolution. More than 80% of current websites use it.
Thanks to this, you will be able to design and execute your business processes
from any device, even from your smart phone.
• Manage from the web (5 ~ 10): you can design your
business processes, process logic, business rules, grant access to users,
interconnect other system with your business processes without requiring the
installation of additional plugins or “client – server” applications, and other
cool features, all from the web.
can connect your business processes with other systems like your inventory,
Very low cost per user (1 ~ 5): you will have
access to all application features with prices starting from only
• Very light application (1 ~ 5): it can runs without
problems in your personal computer, acting like server for other users. It runs
in any major operating system such as Windows, Linux-based OS like OS X,
dollars monthly per user, that allows you to design business processes, define
business rules, interconnect those processes with other systems, and other
features, all from your favorite web browser from any device (desktop, laptop,
tablet or smartphone) from any place of the world. Again, there are 0!!
(go back to menu)
• Executer: allows end users execute any process designed in the backend by the expert users. It has additional functionalities such as notifications, graphical status.
• Administrator: allows expert users design process definitions, business rules, connect external sources, manage users and system configuration and other functionalities.
(go back to menu)
• Contract a PHP developer and Web Designer for 6 months to finish the missing functionalities and improve the usability.
• Contract a designer for the application details.
• Buy two desktop computers and two monitors for local development.
• Buy a desktop computer to be used as server for local development and testing environment.
• Buy Zend Server licenses to detect possible slow queries or code problems.
• Rent a VPS to upload a demo where contributors will be able to see and use the application.

column2: >Develop module to create html web forms (example: a form to register customer information, product information, assign products to customer, etc).

column1: (go back to menu)
Yes. The following videos show how to create a process definition, functions, diagrams, business rules, external sources and PDF Form usage.

Note: The videos are in the gallery section. You should see these videos in HD because I did not use zoom. Sorry for that. If you did not like the music I added, sorry for that too, I selected random music from youtube's video administrator.
Video #1: Create a simple process for Car Loan.
In this video we create catalogs, parameters, process definition, process lanes, process screen and process diagram.
Video #2: Test the Car Loan process

In this video, we will test the process defined in the previous video. It shows three possible scenarios: #1 When user does not request approval, #2 When user requests an approval and Manager does not authorizes, #3 When user request an approval and Manager authorizes.
Video #3: Adding a function to a process
In this video, we create a function to calculate the monthly payments for the car loan.
Video #4: Creating a Business Rule for the Interest Rate
In this video, we create a business rule for the interest rate parameter.
Video #5: Consuming a Web Service for Currency Conversion
In this video, we configure an external source to get the currency exchange for specific currencies.
Video #6: Integrate the process with a PDF Form
In this video, we created a Word template, then saved it as PDF and prepared as PDF Form. This form is assigned to the process definition in order to be used in the front end.
(go back to menu)
My name is Javier Chung, I was born in Panamá (a small country between North and South America) 31 years ago.

Since I started to work, I have been dealing with different Workflow and BPM applications that I will not mention, but the true is that those applications were too complicated some years ago. Some of those applications have improved the usability, but they became more complicated and the prices are expensive for micro, small and some medium companies.

Eight months ago, I decided to code (in my spare time) an application that should be faster, cheaper and easy to use. Here comes SimplifyMe and that's why I'm requesting your financial support to finish what has been started.
(go back to menu)
Screen to define the parameters of the process and group them into containers
Front end screen from tablet and smartphone.
Screen to define process task and their connections
Screen to define connections' conditions between tasks
(go back to menu)
• Report a problem. (0%). Missing: screen to report problems with the application.
• Help: (0%). Missing: screen to show help to help the end users.
• About (0%). Missing: screen to show information about the application, company and contributors.
• User notifications: (50%). Missing: screen to see all expired processes and tasks.
• Process categories (100%): Helps grouping all process definitions
• Flowchart design (80%). Missing:  email task, start / stop conditions for task, calendar for time frames, parameters in / out for sub process task, assign PDF Form to task, general configuration.
• Create process screen for front end (95%). Missing: show tables in screen preview.
• Export / Import process definition in XML file (0%).
• Catalogs (90%). Missing: assign database query or external source result, name validation to disallow spaces.
• Parameters (95%). Missing: assign decimals for numeric parameters

• Functions: (70%). Missing: add plugin like EditArea to modify the ""body"" of the function, a user-friendly screen or wizard to add input and output parameters and build the body of the function, a name validation to disallow spaces.
• Forms (95%) . Missing: name validation to disallow spaces.
• Email templates (90%). Missing: add input parameters, integrate with process task type ""Email Task"", name validation to disallow spaces.
• Business Rules (95%). Missing: avoid changes on rules that have pending changes.
• Approve changes (90%). Missing: show the name of the person that should approve pending changes.
• From Web Service (90%). Missing: support web service that requires password.
• Email Server configuration (0%). Missing: create the windows to change the email server configuration.
• Database (0%). Missing: allow to create backups of database.
• Logs (90%). Missing: select the files and copying them to another folder for backup.
• OS Processes (0%). Missing: integration with Pheanstalk for queue and Supervisor for process daemons (reminders, verify start / stop conditions of process task).
